Created by Fenton Hutson, a classical music composer from Manchester, UK, the Paws of Coal soundtrack of the Burrows brings an instrumental, Romantic opera, similar to the Ring Cycles of Wagner.

The music is influenced by the Romantic works of Wagner, Brahms, Tchaikovsky, Rimsky-Korsakov, Mussorgsky, and other similar artists.

name: Racing Tanks!
detailed_description:
Racing Tanks is a short local multiplayer game in which you fight against your friends in a very short race.

You'll be in a random generated maze each round in which you'll have to find a way to reach the goal before your opponent, but be careful, because sometimes you'll have to eliminate your opponent first in order to make the goal accessible.

Meet the crew!

Choose between Darkar, the best soldier in the crew, or the cute general Skyty!
Get your gear ready in this exciting race!

Racing Tanks also includes a singleplayer mode in which you can play against an AI, so you can practice your strategies for when you'll face your friends or just to have a great time with the crew!

  • Local multiplayer for 2 players.
  • Singleplayer mode against an AI.
  • Two gamemodes.
  • Compatible with Steam Remote Play Together.

Welcome to the crew, soldier!

name: Sexaul Massage Shop - AKARI -
detailed_description:
【About the game】

◆ Caution ◆
All in-game text has been translated using machine translation.


◆ Story ◆
The protagonist, Yuma Kaneda, is a somewhat carefree salaryman. However, he has been swamped with work lately due to his colleagues leaving the company en masse. Seeing him gradually wearing out day by day, his boss gives him a free ticket to a certain massage parlor to help him refresh himself.
A few days later, he goes to the parlor for a breather, only to find out that it's actually a sensual esthetician that provides erotic services. After being satisfied with the services of a cast member named Maki whom he met there, he becomes addicted to her and starts visiting the parlor on his own, but...


【Character Introduction】


Name: Maki
Height: 160 cm
Three sizes: 103/64/98
Features: Bright, kind, and slightly sadistic?


【Voice Acting】
Maki: Honoka Yuuki

◆ Game Specifications ◆
・Novel game that progresses with a click
・Heroine fully voiced
・CG mode
・Scene recollection


◆ Content Warning ◆
This game includes content that may not be suitable for all ages and may not be appropriate for display in the workplace.
The game contains nudity or sexual content, as well as general adult-oriented content.
All characters are over 18 years old.

Desktop girlfriend NEO is a loyal girlfriend who loves you and will always be by your side so that you don't feel alone.

Features.
-Custom face
-Custom eyes
-Custom nose
-Custom mouth
-Custom hair and hair color
-Customize nail color
-Custom body
--Custom more...
-Custom scene lighting colors
--10 different endings of the plot play
-4 mini-games
-Characters and clothes with physics effects
-Realistic eye system

name: Spiritless Ltd. Demo
detailed_description:
Do you sometimes hear scratching, scraping or rumbling noises? And you are sure that those are neither rats nor termites nor stone martens – and definitely not your neighbor with his wife? Then you might have a poltergeist in your home.

But don’t panic. The most professional ghostbusting company is here to help you! We, the well-known Spiritless Ltd., will eliminate any evil ghost from any house.



"Spiritless Ltd." is a weird story set in a monster occupied world, in which annoying ghosts are likely to be a part of your everyday world. Charles Stone is a ghostbuster working for Spiritless Ltd. and has Hank as his boss, who is barely capable of running the business.

As a complaint about a malfunctioning ghost trap is delivered to the office, Hank sends out his best (and only) employee to repair the faulty machine in an old mansion in the outer borough. As soon as he arrives the trouble is about to begin.





  • In the tradition of the old 2D-Point-and-Click Adventures
  • All graphics hand-drawn
  • Exciting story with spirited innuendoes
  • Witty dialogues with freaky characters
  • English interface and text
  • Innovative and entertaining help system

name: Dream of Echo
detailed_description:
Dream of Echo is a small game so the main goal is to finance my biggest project. I prefer to avoid any donation or to go through sites such as Tipeee with superb screenshots and often promises difficult to keep. #supportSoloDev

In Dream of Echo your first goal is to find the only real portal that will allow Echo to wake up and get out of his dream. Be careful, however your shadow will not let you any respite

Game Mode And Specificity:


- 2 game modes : Main Story (find the real portal) and Challenge (face to face card 2vs2)
- No dialogue, easy to take in hand, easy to play
- UltraWide 32/9 support
- Artificial intelligence is tricky
- Unreal Engine 5 with "Lumen" and "Chaos



This little game is only to support my work and find finances for the universes and stories I want to create and share.

A big thank you to all the people who will buy the game and who will support me in this fabulous adventure.

By purchasing these DLCs, you'll not only enhance your gameplay experience but also support our team's ongoing efforts to improve the game.

With this package, you'll receive lifetime updates to all contents.

name: CorpoBots
detailed_description:
Join Our Discord!


About the Game

Get ready for the ultimate bot battle with CorpoBots! A twin-stick action hack n' slash designed for 4 players, where you can build your own household appliance battle bot, choose your weapons, and advertise your brand by fighting competitor bots in an always changing arena. Fight your way up to the top and become the Boss in an epic battle against your friends!


A wide variety of parts are at your disposal to create your own battle bot!

You'll have access to over 4,000 different bot combinations to build with, providing endless possibilities for customization and creativity. With so many unique combinations to choose from, you'll never run out of ideas or possibilities for your custom bot. Fine-tune your bot's movement, weapons, and abilities to create a fighting machine that perfectly suits your style of play. Whether you prefer to engage in close combat or long-range attacks, you can build a bot that can handle any challenge and emerge victorious on the battlefield.


Engage in battles against bots controlled by your friends in a constantly changing arena!

The constantly changing arena will require you to adapt quickly to new obstacles and terrain as you maneuver around the arena to gain the upper hand. Don't forget to keep an eye on your own defenses, your friends' will be launching their own attacks in an attempt to take you down. With lightning-fast reflexes and strategic planning, you just might emerge victorious in this intense and exciting battle of the bots. Keep an eye out for power-ups and special upgrades that can give you an edge in battle.


Become the Boss, defeat your friends!

Becoming the boss requires you to use your bot effectively. Your skills and strategic planning will pay off when you return to the arena bigger, stronger, and faster. Defeat your friends before they team up in an attempt to destroy your bot first. It's not just about defeating your opponents. It's about proving that you have what it takes to be the ultimate bot. So gather your friends, build your bots, and prepare for an epic battle that will determine who will come out on top!


The CorpoBots Arena is grateful to their megacorporation sponsors for their generous contribution of parts and funding, without which this thrilling and fast-paced bot event would not be possible.

  • Clean Companions, makes vacuums with personality, family friendly and keeping things clean!
  • Mother+, was voted most trusted & loved pre-crime prevention service worldwide 30 years in a row by everyone.
  • Samurai, has been hiding its military contracts under the guise of making blenders and other kitchen appliances Samurai has been the CIA’s go to when it comes to concealed weaponry.
  • Toasty's, gives you the taste the good o' days with their vintage Kitchen Appliances!
  • WALT, gets the job done with efficient construction tools and equipment.

name: Midnight Shift
detailed_description:
Midnight Shift is a first-person sim were the player takes the role of a gas station attendant working the midnight shift. The player will need to perform standard tasks and attend the to the costumers needs. Everything will seem fine until you start receiving harassment calls and a stranger starts stocking you.



SYNOPSIS:
Although you are having car problems; you make it to work on time. Your midnight shift starts like any other night. You clock in and take care of your routine tasks all while attending customers. Everything seems fine, until a particular set of events start to unravel, and you are faced with what can only be described as a nightmare.

FEATURES:
First-Person View
Keyboard & Mouse Controls
Multiple Camera Filters
Interactive Objects
Creepy environment
Hair-raising chase



FOR BEST EXPERIENCE:
Use headphones
Play in the dark

name: Slime Knight
detailed_description:
You are a humble slime that has recently found refuge for you and your family in a small village. Everything seemed peaceful...until a gigantic wurm, thought to be a myth, emerges from the deep underground and devours the entire civilization in one enormous gulp!

Separated from your family, you awaken inside the beast's maw, and discover the corpse of a knight wearing a suit of armor. After imbuing the corpse with your slimy essence, you are able to deftly maneuver around the hostile creatures that lurk around you, as well as fight back with your stretchy, toxic appendages!

Your family must be deeper inside the belly of this beast. Will you be able to fight your way through and rescue them before it's too late?

Take Control of Slime Knight!

The slightest touch of your gooey essence will damage almost anything it touches. Use this to your advantage and take enemies by surprise by stretching your arm out, and whipping it in their direction!

Swing, Punch, Grab, Throw, Survive!

Your extendable arm is deceptively simple, but offers you a bevy of tools to handle a variety of situations.


Swing your arm through hordes of enemies to damage them en masse. Punch creatures out of your way with your first. Or, grab them and throw them at their allies to really stir some chaos!

Use it to its full extent to tackle any challenge that comes your way!

Devour the Devoured

As a slime, you have one more trick up your sleeve that could turn the tides of battle.


If you deal enough damage to an enemy while it is clutched in your gooey fist, you can finish them off by devouring them completely. Doing so will grant you unique abilities that could help get you out of a desparate situation.

Different enemies grant different abilities when devoured, so be sure to experiment and plan your targets strategically!

name: Sol: Last Light
detailed_description:
Experience the action-packed gameplay of SOL: Last Light. A third-person action-adventure set in a post-apocalyptic world. Learn to control your newly discovered power to harness the energy of the sun and battle against robots as you climb higher up the mountain to find your captured sister.

Play through 5 unique levels as you unlock key abilities to defeat enemies. Uncover the secrets of this shattered world and find clues that will lead you toward saving your sister.

“The world is scarred from the sins of the past. The Sun has dimmed darker than ever recorded, lowering the atmosphere of Earth to apocalyptic conditions. Humans now roam the Wastes of what was the North American continent as groups of nomads, scavenging the landscape for any means of survival.” - John Black IV

name: Destroy All Zombies
detailed_description:
Zombies again......

They still haven't disappeared? Looks like you wasn't efficient enough. The indie-casual game of Destroy All Zombies comes to finally close this stage. Your mission is to destroy zombies that have remained hidden with the help of a slingshot. Aim well to knock down as many as possible in one throw.

The magic skull will destroy them instantly, you just have to hit them. The idea seems simple, but how well will you manage?

Game Features :
- 2 modes (Easy / Hard)
- Zombies hiding behind stones/wood
- Magic skull slingshot

name: Rocket Jump Frenzy
detailed_description:
You Deserve A Medal For That.




Rocket Jump Frenzy is a punishing platformer where you have to climb a mountain with nothing but a rocket launcher and a lot of will power. This game was heavily inspired by Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy and Team Fortress 2.
This game is intentionally difficult so don't expect forgiveness for your mistakes.

  • Explode your own feet.
  • Climb a mountain.
  • Fall.
  • Rage.
  • Repeat.

name: 先端恐怖症
detailed_description:
━─━─━─━─━─━─━─━─

　あなたは恐怖症、 ありますか？

━─━─━─━─━─━─━─━─

恐怖症とは――――特定のある一つのものに対して、心理学的および生理学的に異常な恐怖を感じる症状である。
私も実は、恐怖症あるんだよね……先の尖ったものがすごく怖い。


----------


このホラーゲームでは、プレイヤーは先端恐怖症になった看護師として、病院内で業務を進めながら彼女の先端恐怖症の原因を探ります。
しかし、深く掘り下げるにつれ、驚くべき事実が明らかになり、衝撃的なラストへと導かれます。

小規模ながらもプレイヤーを引き込む深いストーリーと、緻密な演出による臨場感あふれる恐怖体験を提供しています。

name: Snakedate
detailed_description:
Welcome to Charmr, the premier dating app for snakes! Looking for love? Cruise around the club and wrap around your dates to show your affection!

When the Charmr app pops up, you'll see a potential date. If you think they're compatible, swipe right and go find them in the club. Be warned, you'll abandon your current date if you have one!

Every successful date is worth a certain Charmr Score based on compatibility. High score dates will need more coils around them to be satisfied. Relationships today are about volume, so get as high a score as you can!

CONTROLS:

Left Mouse (Left Arrow, A) Turn left, Swipe left on Charmr

Right Mouse (Right Arrow, D) Turn Right, Swipe right on Charmr

Middle Mouse (Escape, Space, S) Pause/Unpause

FEATURES:

  • Physics-based speed-dating arcade action!
  • 11 lonely horses to date!
  • Theoretically infinite replayability!
  • Also an infinitely long snake (no relation to the snake from Snake)!

WHY DID WE MAKE THIS?


Snakedate is part of Young Horses: Free Range, where we collect our smaller side projects and release them for free!

Back in 2015 we took a break from developing Bugsnax to try our hooves at Ludum Dare game jam #34. The two themes for the jam were 'Two Button Controls' and 'Growing'. Over a hectic 72 hours, we developed Snakedate using the Horsepower engine. It was a modest success, scoring third in the humor category for the jam!

So give it a try! It's free, so there's only so disappointed you can be!

name: Mystery Case Files: The Last Resort
detailed_description:
GrandMA Studios proudly presents the next exciting case in the blockbuster Mystery Case Files series! After your last case, a ski trip is just what the doctor ordered, but this is no vacation! Step back into the shoes of the ever-scrupulous Master Detective for an unforgettable new adventure that will take you into the wilderness beyond the quiet town of Mountain View in search of a group of missing travelers, including a member of the royal family. But beware! The town, the hotel, and even the mountain itself hide terrible secrets that could drive a lesser detective mad. You’ll need all the skills you’ve perfected in your career to crack this case, detective! Get ready to hit the slopes in this riveting new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure game!

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.

• Discover what lurks on the mountain
• Put your seeking skills to the test!
• Challenge yourself with new Super-Puzzles!

name: Kid Chaos
detailed_description:
Originally released in 1994 for the Commodore Amiga, this cartoony platformer from Magnetic Fields saw players take on the role of Kid Chaos, a cave-kid captured from prehistory by evil scientists from the future, fighting to escape and find the time machine that can return him home! Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version.

Gameplay

As Kid Chaos, you must fight through the evil scientists' artificial environments by causing as much destruction as possible. Jump to swing your club in the air in an arc, or gather up speed and 'whizz' to attack enemies and also reveal secret hidden passages. Use springs to gain speed and ramps to launch yourself into the sky. Each world also features unique bonus levels.


This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including:

  • Saving/loading the game at any point
  • Support for most modern game controllers
  • Full control remapping
  • Image scaling and smoothing options

name: Rich Dad Simulator
detailed_description:
Try Free Prologue

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2394260/Rich_Dad_Simulator_Prologue/


About the Game



Welcome to the exciting world of running your own store! In this game, you get to take on the challenge of building up your small shop into a massive retail empire, complete with your own chain of hypermarkets.

As you start off with a small shop, your first task is to keep the shelves stocked with inventory to ensure that customers keep coming back. You'll need to manage your finances carefully, as you'll need to purchase the right amount of stock to keep up with demand without overstocking and wasting resources.



As your business grows, you'll be able to expand your store and create a unique shopping experience for your customers. From the layout of the aisles to the color of the walls, you'll have full control over the look and feel of your store. You can even hire staff to help you manage your growing business, allowing you to focus on the bigger picture of expanding your brand.

But managing your store is only half the fun - you'll also get to explore the city around you. Whether it's attending local events or scouting out new locations for your next hypermarket, there's always something new to discover. You might even stumble upon new suppliers or rare items to stock in your store.



Of course, running a successful business is all about the people you hire. As you grow your business, you'll need to find the right employees to help you run your stores efficiently. From cashiers to stockers, each member of your team plays an important role in keeping your business running smoothly. You'll need to manage their schedules, salaries, and training to ensure that they stay motivated and productive.

Overall, this game is all about the thrill of building a successful retail empire. With so many different aspects to manage, from inventory to employees to store design, you'll have endless opportunities to flex your management skills and create a brand that customers will love. So what are you waiting for? Start building your retail empire today!

name: Dating Izzie
detailed_description:
Meet your date!
Izzie is an intelligent and curious woman with a love for all things geeky. She's a fan of sci-fi, fantasy, comics, video games, and all things pop culture. She's always up for a good debate or discussion and loves to learn new things. In conversations, Izzie is bubbly and enthusiastic, with a natural charisma that draws people to her. She's quick-witted and has a great sense of humor, always ready with a clever joke or witty comeback. She's not afraid to be herself and is comfortable in her own skin, which makes others feel at ease around her. Izzie loves to use the word "Fascinating".

Story
You are about to go on a date with Izzie. If everything goes well, you might just be the lucky one to capture her heart. However, things are never easy, and as you go on more dates with Izzie, you begin to discover that she has her own unique quirks and challenges that make the dating game even more interesting.

Gameplay
Dating Izzie is a unique puzzle game with visual novel elements that challenges you to win over Izzie's heart through the power of match 3 puzzles. As you go on dates with Izzie, you'll need to solve classic match 3 puzzles, matching gems of the same color to progress to the next level. You also get skills to use to influence the game and win just in time before you run out of turns!

Before and after each puzzle, you'll engage in conversations with Izzie that will help you get to know her better. As you progress through the game, you'll collect images of Izzie that go into your gallery as a reward for winning a level. The more levels you complete, the more images you'll unlock, giving you a deeper glimpse into Izzie's personality and interests.

Features

  • Engaging storyline with quirky and interesting character
  • Challenging match 3 puzzle gameplay that will test your skills and strategic thinking
  • Spicy scenes with adult-only content
  • Beautifully crafted graphics and artwork that bring the world to life

name: Gambit Shifter Demo
detailed_description:
Dethrone the King. Simple as that


Move across the board, defeat enemy pawns and clear your way to the King.
Checkmate!



One pawn to rule them all


Change your form and become any other chess piece, acquiring their move set.



An uncommon board


Special tiles can be both a blessing or a curse. Teleport, block the enemies, create new paths.
But beware to not get stuck!

Features:


  • 80+ hand-crafted levels

  • Control one single pawn in this original and relaxing gameplay

  • Unique mechanic for each world

  • No chess knowledge needed, for both chess lover and newcomers!

  • Originally composed soundtrack

name: Just Survive
detailed_description:
The world is looking for a new hero!

Just Survive is an indie-action game in which all the tactics of a real soldier are applied. Parachuting will seem like a normal thing to you the more often you do it. Your mission is to clear the area of enemies and turn it into a peaceful one.

Act as quickly as possible because the chopper is waiting for you to fly to another conflict zone. Ready ?

Game Features :
- Multiple missions
- Driving Skills
- Limited ammo & life

name: CHARGED: RC Racing - Starter Edition
detailed_description:
GET CHARGED

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2196680/CHARGED_RC_Racing/


JOIN OUR DISCORD



About the Game

CHARGED: RC Racing Starter Edition gives you access to the first 3 championships, 11 RC-Cars, as well as multiplayer access and the RC Pass up to level 7!
Your progress will be carried over when getting full content version of the game!

They may be small... but they are FAST!

In CHARGED: RC Racing you get in control of an RC Car and race against 1-7 opponents.
You will have to make use of different items to strike down your opponents and win all championships by placing first position in each race.
Each championship your cars will become faster and faster!

Career

Race through 8 championships by placing P.1 in each race. Earn money to buy new cars and earn XP to level up and unlock new championships. Each championship has its own regulations and makes the races more difficult.

Cars

Unlock 38 RC-Cars and use their parts to build your own RC car. Vehicle stats are set by selecting a Cassis. Other parts like the body or the antenna are just visual elements.

Tracks

Race on over 20 different racetracks. Master each track and maintain speed without flipping the car. You can race through a mall, suburbia, shrunken worlds, RC tracks and more.

RC-Pass

Currently the CHARGED RC-Pass has to offer 20 levels of unlocking cars and parts for your custom RC Car. You can unlock new levels by racing online or offline. Placing first position gives you the most XP. More levels will be added to the RC-Pass soon!

Multiplayer

Challenge your friends or random people around the world and show them your creation. Use our new Discord channel to connect with people playing this game.

Items

Using items is the key to success in CHARGED: RC Racing. Use 8 different items or keep the items tactical to secure your first position.

Starter Edition content

  • 12 tracks
  • 11 RC-Cars
  • 3 championships
  • visual RC Car customizing (chassis, springs, wing, body, tire, antenna)
  • Free CHARGED RC-Pass up to LVL 7
  • 8 players online racing
  • controller support

name: Magic Toenail
detailed_description:
Magic Toenail is a strategic wizarding roguelite where every step you take is a tactical maneuver. You shoot when you move and move when you shoot, so even the simplest enemy encounters can quickly become multi-faceted puzzles!

WIZARDY WITH PIZAZZ

Each enemy you'll face is made of either Goo, Sparkles, or Whimsy, so you'll have to rearrange your spells each turn to hit these fiends with your desired magical energy ball.



Dozens of hats, cloaks, and eyeballs provide a wealth of varied yet impactful changes to the way your wizard wizzes, but you can only carry one of each at a time, so build your character wisely!

3+ HOURS OF GAMEPLAY!

  • 12 bonus challenges!
  • Thousands of item combinations!
  • Unpredictable synergies and interactions!

name: IGNISTONE
detailed_description:
IGNISTONE was suddenly taken from them one day. The adventure of the main character, the lizard tribe, and his companion, the mame tribe, in pursuit of the secret of IGNISTONE begins.
IGNISTONE is a full-fledged action roguelike game with easy controls.
Enjoy the cute world view, deep gameplay, and the activities of the main character and his companion Mame!

Game Description
IGNISTONE is a roguelike game in which players advance through dungeons by devising combinations of weapons and amulets.
Weapons and amulets with various skills are compatible with each other.
Find the combination that best suits your taste, whether you prefer attack power, durability, or special moves.

Game Features
IGNISTONE features a combination of roguelike elements, in which you combine weapons and amulets to advance, and Sento action elements, in which you use just gat and special moves.
Whether you advance with careful preparation or trust your own skill to keep going, the push and pull of the game is IGNISTONE's greatest pleasure.

[Story.
Today is the village ore festival. While all the Mame people in the village gather in the plaza, there is one Mame person who is working suspiciously.
We are going to defeat him today!"
He is working hard on something.

[Creator's comment
IGNISOTEN is a title developed with the hope that many people can enjoy a full-fledged roguelike game easily.
There are many weapons and amulets in the game, but we carefully made it as simple and easy to understand as possible.
I am sure that roguelike enthusiasts and beginners alike will enjoy the game.
Please warmly watch over the adventures of the main character and his companion Mame.

name: Story Of Infinity: Xia
detailed_description:
Update Notes

To all warriors:


[Story of Infinity:Xia] has been updated on steam on April 20th, 2023. Welcome to download and experience! In order to make you familiar with the game as soon as possible, the updated content is announced as follows:

1. Balanced Monster Attributes: Slightly weakened the defenses of the latter two layers of enemies.
2. the balance of the Starfall Seven Frost Swordsmanship.
3. updated the new Wu (skill) - Five channels to dispel evil, and supporting inheritance and Secret Book.
4.Fixed a bug of the Starfall Seven Frost Swordsmanship：where swordplay could only inflict one damage when you had both inheritance - Ceremonial Rites and Concealed Sleeves.Fixed a bug where the [QI Blade] buff only works on one layer.


The above content can help you to explore adventure, We wish you a happy trip!

YOUGU Studio
04.20.2023


About the Game

About this game


Game QQ group: 576048026

Description

"Story Of Infinity: Xia"is A martial arts style Roguelike adventure A·RPG standalone game. According to their own carry different martial arts into the copy, with different weapons, secrets, role growth, to achieve a lively sense of attack through the random fantasy map, explore the background of the whole Reiki world.

Core System

There are hundreds of items in the game, including martial arts, weapons, secrets, heritage, treasures, etc., all with unique backstories. Try different combinations, you can play the best of each character, and clear the fantasy more easily.

Characters

Each character has a different martial arts inclination and story setting, also has a different talent, good use of each character differences, the game can be easier!


Random Map

Each time you enter the Fantasy, the composition of the battle rooms on each floor is random, and sometimes getting through may require a bit of luck.



Weapon

Sometimes, having a good weapon is half the battle!



Inheritance

Please carefully choose every martial arts inheritance enhancement, it will directly affect whether you can pass the customs!



Secret Book

Collect lots of different items to discover the truth of this world!

name: 游龙传说
detailed_description:
《游龙传说》是一款国风仙侠角色扮演类游戏。游戏掉落大量钻石,装备回收换钻石等真正的打金仙侠游戏,精致的美术表现、丰富的系统玩法,更有多种酷炫外观与坐骑免费掉落等福利,身临其境体验畅快的修真之旅

游戏系统
1.神兵系统

一、 系统开启入口
通过主界面的功勋入口即可打开神兵系统
二、 系统开启等级
开服第十四天角色修真等级达到大乘期

三、 系统规则说明

神兵总共有8把，激活神兵需要消耗指定的神兵原型，激活神兵之后即可激活神兵的专属技能。
每把神兵总等阶为20阶10星，升阶消耗神兵源石，神兵源石可以通过钻石商城购买获得。
神兵升阶到一定等级可以提升神兵的技能，技能等级越高，技能属性越强。
神兵可以穿戴4件神兵装备，神兵装备等级越高，属性加成越高，穿戴高阶神兵装备，还可以激活神兵装备套装属性:全属性加成。

2.战盾系统
一、 系统开启入口
通过主界面的功勋入口即可打开战盾系统

二、 系统开启等级
开服第九天角色修真等级达到元婴期

三、 系统规则说明
Ø 战盾总共有10个战盾，激活战盾需要消耗对应的战盾原型。激活战盾后可以进行洗炼。
Ø 玩家可以通过击杀普通BOSS获得魂魄值，魂魄值将储存在魂魄池中，魂魄池最大储存上限为2500，超过将不在获得。
Ø 可通过洗炼将战盾属性洗练至当前最大属性。
Ø 可消耗钻石进行战盾洗练，每日可洗炼次数为5次。也可消耗战盾洗练石对战盾进行洗炼，消耗战盾洗炼石洗炼次数不限。
Ø 使用魂魄值可提升战盾等阶，战盾等阶越高属性越高。
Ø 可消耗对应的战盾原型激活/升级专属技能。

3.勋章系统
一、 系统开启入口
通过主界面的功勋入口即可打开勋章系统

二、 系统开启等级
开服第九天角色修真等级达到化神期

三、 系统规则说明
勋章总共有6个勋章，分别为神魔勋章、乾坤勋章、传说勋章、天尊勋章、圣者勋章、至尊勋章，系统开启之后完成钻石挑战可以获得神魔勋章激活卡。
每个勋章总等阶不同，升级消耗勋章图腾，升级可提升角色基础属性和生命值加成，勋章品阶越高，生命值加成越高。勋章图腾可以通过跨服BOSS获得。
上级勋章满级之后，自动激活下级勋章。
勋章附带专属技能，总共6级勋章之力，指定勋章满级之后即可激活对应等级的勋章之力。
about_the_game:
《游龙传说》是一款国风仙侠角色扮演类游戏。游戏掉落大量钻石,装备回收换钻石等真正的打金仙侠游戏,精致的美术表现、丰富的系统玩法,更有多种酷炫外观与坐骑免费掉落等福利,身临其境体验畅快的修真之旅

游戏系统
1.神兵系统

一、 系统开启入口
通过主界面的功勋入口即可打开神兵系统
二、 系统开启等级
开服第十四天角色修真等级达到大乘期

三、 系统规则说明

神兵总共有8把，激活神兵需要消耗指定的神兵原型，激活神兵之后即可激活神兵的专属技能。
每把神兵总等阶为20阶10星，升阶消耗神兵源石，神兵源石可以通过钻石商城购买获得。
神兵升阶到一定等级可以提升神兵的技能，技能等级越高，技能属性越强。
神兵可以穿戴4件神兵装备，神兵装备等级越高，属性加成越高，穿戴高阶神兵装备，还可以激活神兵装备套装属性:全属性加成。

name: Melody Mania
detailed_description:
Enjoy a fun singing party!

Sing along your favorite songs and try to hit notes for points, alone, in a duet, or with friends.
Feel like a superstar while you break the highscore!
Invite your family and friends to rock the virtual stage together!

Songs

Jump right to the fun with the demo songs that are included with the game.

Or add other songs in the community grown UltraStar format, or the industry proven MIDI format.

The integrated editor of Melody Mania lets you create a sing-along version of your local music library, so you'll never run out of options.

Feature Highlights

  • Score Modes - Challenge your friends or sing cooperatively. As alternative, turn off all ratings to enjoy old school karaoke without competition.
  • Duet Songs - Sing a duet where both players have different lyrics and notes.
  • Team & Tournament - Play multiple rounds or start a knock-out tournament.
  • Pass the Mic - Switch players in the middle of a song. Fun for groups of all sizes!
  • Song Queue - Play multiple songs from the queue without interruption.
  • Medleys - Play a shortened mix of songs in the queue.
  • Mute Vocals - Silence the vocals of any song to enjoy a classic karaoke experience, thanks to AI powered audio separation.
  • Playlists - Mark songs as favorites and organize your song library with playlists in M3U or UltraStar format.
  • Webcam - Use your camera as background video or take a snapshot for your profile image

Song Editor

Create a sing-along version of any song.

  • Add notes via button tapping or by dictating lyrics
  • Isolate the vocals via AI tools to apply pitch detection and speech recognition
  • Edit notes via drag & drop
  • Add videos and images
  • Import MIDI files
  • Quickly switch between editing and singing

Companion App

The free Melody Mania Companion App for Android provides additional goodies for the game.

  • Use your smartphone as mic. No need to buy new equipment!
  • Search and enqueue songs while others are still playing. No need to interrupt the game flow!
  • Navigate the game remotely. No need to hang around your keyboard!

Themes

Melody Mania was designed to be to be customizable and extensible. You can not only add your own songs but also your own images and colors.

Enjoy Yourself

Don't be afraid, just sing with passion and let the pitch detection guide your voice.
Start now with Melody Mania, soften your lips and let's sing it at the top of our lungs!
This revolution of karaoke never gets old.

Have fun with Melody Mania!

Supported file formats

  • Audio files: ogg (recommended), mp3
  • Video files: vp8 (recommended), mp4 (h264 / AVC1), avi
  • Image files: png, jpg

name: Dickland: Tower Defense
detailed_description:
Dickland: Tower Defense is Tower Defense in Lowpoly 3D graphics. The main feature of the game is black humor and a visual environment, namely the world of penises. Here you have to build the economy and various defensive towers to resist hordes of enemies.



To do this, you can choose different strategies, such as abandoning the economy to quickly build defenses, building the entire map with simple but cheap towers, or building a few, but very strong and durable upgraded towers.



When the towers can't cope with the hordes of genitals, or some one bespectacled ass was able to slip, then you can use various elemental super-attacks.



In the game you will find many different levels, both in terms of construction and visuals, from steppes and glaciers to real hell! You'll also find yourself in a pleasant but sometimes tense atmosphere, with a cute soundtrack and surrounded by cocks of all shapes and sizes!



Good luck to you, prove to all the sagging and crooked that you are Alpha here!

detailed_description:

By completing potions they will become more difficult to complete and you will need to be quicker! How many potions can you create?

Increasingly Difficult Speed
Increasingly Difficult Recipes

name: Slave of the Succubus
detailed_description:
You are a petty thief that owes money to a powerful crime boss. In desperation, you decide to rob a wizard's home for a tome that is purported to summon a succubus. The problem is that the tome is a trap and you end up enslaved by a succubus instead.

As the succubus' slave, she gives you a variety of orders, chiefly clearing her home of a monster infestation. The game features RPG elements and turn-based combats with a variety of spells that coincide to have additional effects. The game features no grinding or random encounters, focusing on unique, individual battles.

The house of a succubus is full of puzzles and prizes also. Solve a variety of puzzles to progress and explore, as well as earn loot to craft various equipment.

But that's not all. The succubus feeds on sexual energy and will be using you for that purpose. The game features numerous, uncensored NSFW scenes.

name: Fantasy Survival in Another World Demo
detailed_description:
Welcome to Another World


"Survival and Building in Another World" is a role-playing game with Japanese-style fantasy elements, combining survival, ARPG, and building mechanics. In this game, you play as the protagonist, who has been exiled by the knight order and is now alone in this strange world. Explore every corner of the map, discover new locations and quests, and collect various resources and treasures.

ARPG Survival Simulation


Explore a mysterious world full of danger and wonder, with a blend of survival, ARPG, and building elements, along with a rich open world and dynamic weather system. You need to search for food, water, and shelter, explore the hazardous environment, and stay alert because there are various creatures and monsters roaming around. Craft weapons and gear to enhance your abilities and build your character's skills in various disciplines to better combat your enemies.

Building Your Shelter


Build your own shelter or simply pitch a tent, light a fire, cook the food you hunted, and fill your belly before resting.

Dragons and Demons


Challenge dragons, defeat demons, kill all the monsters that threaten you, clear out all the dark monster dens, and gain a peaceful place.

Not Just Your Survival


This world is filled with various monsters, animals, and fantasy creatures that, like you, need to fill their bellies and find a safe place to rest in this vibrant world.

name: ZOMG!
detailed_description:
Welcome to ZOMG! - The Zombit Invasion, an infectiously entertaining and brain-teasing puzzle game! Take control of your horde of zombits and feast on the unsuspecting bitizens in each challenging and immersive level. Each stage will test your strategic thinking, as you master the unique abilities of your zombits to work together and complete the stage. Can you infect the world with your zombit army and satisfy your insatiable hunger?

Key Features:

🧟 Diverse Zombit Abilities: Each zombit has its own special abilities, such as speed, strength, or stealth. Learn how to use their powers in tandem to solve intricate puzzles and outsmart the bitizens who stand in your way.

💀 Unique Stages: Explore a wide range of environments, from bustling city streets to quiet suburban neighborhoods, and even secret underground bunkers! Each stage is filled with cunning traps and obstacles that will challenge your strategic thinking.

⚰️ Challenging Puzzles: With a multitude of diverse bitizens, each with their own behaviors and routines, ZOMG! presents you with progressively more complex and challenging puzzles. Plan your moves wisely to ensure your zombits feast on every last morsel!

🧟 Achievements: Track your progress through an array of achievements and become the ultimate zombit mastermind!

💀 Stunning Visuals and Sound: Immerse yourself in the world of ZOMG! with captivating graphics and a hauntingly atmospheric soundtrack that will keep you engaged and entertained throughout your zombit invasion.

Are you ready to take on the challenge and unleash the power of your zombit army? Join the ZOMG! - The Zombit Invasion now and let the feast begin!

name: On The Wind's Breath
detailed_description:
On the Wind's Breath is a unique and enchanting game that puts you in the role of a dandelion seed, floating on the whispering breeze. As you drift through the air, you must navigate through various obstacles and challenges to grow into a beautiful flower.

The graphics are clean and uncluttered, with a focus on simplicity and easily understandable environment. The controls are intuitive, allowing you to move your dandelion seed with ease, and the gameplay is straightforward but challenging.

Your goal is to find a fertile soil to land on and thrive, but beware, not all surfaces can sustain your growth. You must avoid landing on grass and instead find a suitable spot for growth. Along the way, you will also encounter rocks that provide a safe landing spot, but they won't nourish you.

As you progress, you will face the elements of nature and struggle against the wind that carries you. You must learn to take control of the wind and use it to your advantage, guiding yourself towards your goal.

With beautiful graphics and a soothing soundtrack, On the Wind's Breath is a calming and meditative experience that will take you on a journey through many regions. So put on your thinking cap, sharpen your reflexes and get ready for an adventure like no other!

name: Hero World Toon Style DLC
detailed_description:
The Hero World Toon Style DLC is an expansion pack for the game Hero World that contains three different cartoon shaders. With this DLC, you can experience the story of Hero World in a completely new look. Unlike other shader packs, the three shaders in this package are not activated separately, but are delivered with their own story. This means that each shader offers its own version of the same story, presented with different visual effects.

When you purchase the Hero World Toon Style DLC, you get access to three different story modes, each presented with a different shader preset. These modes give you the opportunity to experience the story of Hero World in a new visual environment and enjoy a unique gameplay experience each time.

The three shader presets in this DLC offer different visual styles and bring the game world to life with vibrant, colorful, and cartoon-like optics. Each shader provides a unique gameplay experience, as it presents the story of Hero World in different ways.

Overall, the Hero World Toon Style DLC is a great way to experience the story of Hero World in a completely new way and improve the gameplay experience.

Unique game mechanics

Players can change gravity to explore the level.While changing the gravity, the player will also change the colour. Characters of the same colour can only stand on the corresponding platform.

Diverse ways to play

Meet your past self

If you could go back in time and see your younger self, what would you have said to her? In the midst of chaos, the grown-up protagonist has met her past self. The two must work together to escape this time space

name: Notes of my silence
detailed_description:
Notes of my silence
A non-linear visual novel in the genre of drama and slice of life. Immerse yourself in the silence, which will be interrupted only by the heartbeat and fragments of classical music, rooted in the memory of the main character. Learn sign language, but be prepared for the fact that it will not always be possible to use it.
Plot
Stefan is a young, but promising musician. After his debut performance, he gets into an accident, as a result of he completely has lost hearing and along with that his job, hobbies and any sense to continue living. Now he has a choice: to climb out of the depths of despair, or to sink even deeper into them.

name: Panzer Corps 2: Axis Operations - 1945
detailed_description:
Germany lies in ruins. Relentlessly assaulted on all sides and pounded mercilessly by Allied Strategic Bombing, the German Reich still refuses to admit defeat. Last ditch counteroffensives are put into action in a desperate attempt to turn the tide of the Second World War. Will these desperate gambles pay off, or will they continue to heap misery and death upon the German Wehrmacht?

Panzer Corps 2’s Axis Operations at long last approaches the end of the Second World War in Europe... one way or another!

The War Concludes

In the Historical Campaign of 1945 East, you will experience the final months of the Second World War from a perspective so rarely covered in other games of the genre as you prepare your Wehrmacht forces for their final, desperate offensives.

To properly tell this story, the historical campaign focuses extensively on not just the final battles on the Eastern Front, but also the surrounding context. What did last ditch attacks such as Operation Bodenplatte or Spring Awakening really accomplish, but also at what terrible costs did they come with?

As you fight to the bitter end, learn the real fates of both true Historical German figures and also uncover the fates of the Axis Operation’s unique cast of characters. In doing so, find out for yourself some of the truths of why so many rank and file Wehrmacht soldiers continued the fighting well past any hope of achieving victory in the Second World War.

The War Continues

But once again, the latest Panzer Corps 2 Axis Operations content pack contains yet another campaign! Be ready to continue the story of Ahistorical 1944 right where it left off after victory at the Battle of Ploesti.

Despite repelling the Western Allied landings at Normandy and halting the Soviet invasion of Easter Europe, Germany still stands at an impasse. Total victory seems further than ever, as Allied resolve is merely shaken and apparently nowhere near broken. And now another major offensive is prepared in the East, but to what ultimate end? Can it actually bring total victory, or will it just continue to bleed all nations involved?

Discovered the uncharted history of the Axis Operations 1945 Alternate campaign, and see where it ends... or where it will merely end up next!
To give players the most freedom of choice, both campaigns are immediately available for all players to begin. There are no prerequisites or barriers to launching either campaign. Newly formed Panzer Corps or deeply imported forces have equal choice in which campaign path to pursue and explore.

CONTINUE WITH YOUR OWN PANZER CORPS

Players can import their core forces that completed the previous Axis Operations 1944 East campaign or use a preset core force to directly launch into the Axis Operations 1945 East campaign.

While imported forces can seek additional growth and challenges through increased difficulty settings, advanced game modes, and new elite objectives, the preset force contains a moderate amount of experienced units and an assortment of heroes enough to allow any player to succeed in this new campaign.

Total freedom of choice is on offer in Axis Operations 1945: There are no prerequisites or barriers to launching either campaign. Newly formed Panzer Corps or deeply imported forces have equal choice in which campaign path to pursue and explore.

For veteran campaigners with a force ready to import into this latest DLC, it is recommended to continue with your Historical or Ahistorical campaign paths to fully experience the content’s extensive narratives.

THE END OF THE AXIS OPERATIONS?

The end of 1945 East is (potentially) not the end of your campaign though, it is merely the latest step. At the conclusion of Axis Operations 1945 East, players will again be presented with the option to save their core force for use in the next installment of the Axis Operations Campaign, should there be one!
Any campaign of the Axis Operations can be played individually as a standalone campaign.

18 Scenario List (Beware of Spoilers!)

• Operation Puma
• Operation Wagtail
• Operation Tannenberg
• Munich
• Operation Feuerkartoffel
• Reichstag
• Zahidan
• Operation Hydra
• Case Bruno
• Tata
• Operation Bodenplatte
• Operation Konrad III
• Operation Southwind
• Operation Spring Awakening
• Vienna Offensive
• Battle of Seelow Heights
• End in Berlin
• End in Salzburg

name: Solo Hunt: Ten Floor
detailed_description:
Welcome to Solo Hunt: Ten Floor, the ultimate dungeon crawl game! Descend through ten treacherous levels filled with fearsome monsters, deadly traps, and puzzles to be solved.
As you delve deeper into the dungeon, you'll encounter a variety of challenges and opportunities. Will you fight your way through hordes of goblins, or use your cunning to outwit a cunning dragon? The choices you make will determine your fate in this perilous underground realm.

Upgrade your weapons and armor to destroy your foes. But beware – the dungeon is filled with danger at every turn, and even the mightiest warrior can fall in the face of overwhelming odds.

Do you have what it takes to conquer the Ten Floor and claim the ultimate prize? Only the bravest and most skilled adventurers will succeed in Solo Hunt: Ten Floor.

name: UP UP UP
detailed_description: This is an interesting elimination casual game that changes your position from the bottom to the top by eliminating the same graphics. By holding down the left mouse button and connecting adjacent and identical shapes with a line, you can eliminate them and move your position to the position of the last eliminated shape. Each level starts from the bottom layer and selects any starting position. Once you reach the top layer, you will pass through this level. Every time you pass a level, you can collect an exquisite CG. Please go to the gallery and savor it carefully!

name: Crescent Lands - The Farm
detailed_description:
In a world where food safety is considered paramount, where rarely anyone touches food that has not been thoroughly tested by reputable auditors beforehand.

You start your journey to become a highly rated Direct-To-Customer Farmer, who supplies crops and animal produce on order.

A highly lucrative career as illustrated by the list of wealthiest people in the world, where 7 out of the top 10 are direct-to-customer farmers.

You used all your savings to buy a beautiful farm on a faraway island and open a Farmer's Account with a reputable auditing company, Factoria, a mega corporation with their hands in everything from dining in air, to mining underwater, to auditing edible and non edible items.

Now, with an account which gives you access to customers and mere pennies left in hand, it's all on you to reach the top of the farming world.

  • Grow variety of crops as your heart wants.
  • Play around with and take care of your farm animals.
  • Take Direct-To-Customer farming jobs from Factoria and supply crops & animal produce on order.
  • Complete Factoria Jobs on time to get great reviews on your Farmer's Profile and increase your Factoria Farmer Ranking or Get Penalized for Late, Incomplete or Sub-Standard Job Completion by reducing profits and lowering your Factoria Farmer Ranking
  • Reinvest in your farm
  • Enjoy seasons pass by with seasonal music

Note : This game does not contain a Town or other Town Characters that you interact with.

name: Billy Bumbum: A Cheeky Puzzler Demo
detailed_description:
Solve challenging puzzles as a cube with a butt. Flip, push and fart your way through colorful levels as you rescue your adorable friends in need. Fart for freedom!

Play over 100 challenging puzzles spread across a myriad of colorful worlds, constantly introducing surprising new mechanics to keep you delighted until the end.

Meet cute and quirky critters as you rescue your friends with magic winds*.
* Farts, they’re magic farts.

Get behind Billy's behind, possibly the best one you’ve ever seen (on a cube) and watch him wiggle it to our super funky soundtrack you’ll bump up the volume for.

name: exclusion| 間引き
detailed_description:
One day, the main character accidentally gets on a train that has a train accident.
The victim was only a six-month-old baby.
The accident, which became a national news story, set off a chain of tragedies for those who were present.
Who is the victim and who is the perpetrator?
A half non-fiction horror game depicting the limits of modern Japanese child-rearing and the tragedy that lies at its end.
Number of endings: 3
A story in which you become a woman raising a child and spend your daily life taking care of your own child. In the midst of this, you will slowly experience a strange phenomenon that is gradually approaching you.
The game is a walking simulator in which you make choices and progress through the storyline. The game contains horror scenes, descriptions of accidents, and bloodshed.

name: Potato Arena Prologue
detailed_description:
Full Version

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1937540/Potato_Arena/


About the Game

Potato Arena Prologue is a Party Game in which you are playing with total of 4 players. Lots of fun and challenging parkour maps are waiting for you to discover and overcome! Grab your keyboard or favorite gamepad, and join the party!

Enjoy offline with your friends at this party of potatoes!

Player gathering higher score among other players wins the game!

Battle bizarre obstacles, participate to other potato competitors, and conquer the party as you stack up your points in each unique world. Leave your kindness toward other people outside, and do everything necessary to fry your enemies!

Co-op Competitions: Dive into a series of enjoying challenges and uniquely created parkours with 1-3 of other potatoes offline, all with the aim of annoying your poor enemies to get higher points!

Competitive & Cooperative: Mostly you will find yourself alone among other players; however there will be a map that you should work with your teammate to win! Also don't forget the old saying: "Enemy of my enemy is my friend!"

Single Player: Don't you have an internet connection, or bored from being fried online again and again? You are free to play with AI's offline. However, beware that they won't be "very" friendly, too!

Customizable Character: Isn't playing with same outfit again and again boring? You will be able to change your clothes and exhibit your sense of fashion to other players!

name: Highland Panic
detailed_description:
Highland Panic is an exciting and fast-paced Scottish/Highland themed multiplayer card game designed for 2-4 players. If you enjoy classic games like Nertz or Dutch Blitz, you'll love Highland Panic! The game is built around the familiar mechanics of solitaire, but with a unique twist that makes it even more challenging and competitive.

In Highland Panic, players race against each other to play all the cards from their panic pile first. Points are earned for every card played to the common Clan pile area, but be careful - points will be subtracted for any cards left in your panic pile at the end of a round! The first player to score at least 75 points wins the game.

With easy-to-learn gameplay mechanics and quick, fast-paced rounds, Highland Panic is the perfect game for parties, game nights, and casual play. Whether you're a seasoned card player or a newcomer to the world of card games, you'll find something to love in Highland Panic. So gather your friends, sharpen your wits, and get ready for an epic battle of strategy and skill!

Race to be the first player to play all the cards from you "panic" pile to the common "clan" piles. It's a thrilling game of strategy and skill, perfect for game nights and parties.

name: Idle ShowOff
detailed_description:
Most Insignificant Little one?

This is an Idle game where you can hardly feel any sense of existence. It has a simple and rough level system, which is the whole game. Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.


Most Prominent Big Monsterrrrr ! ! !

This is an Idle game where you can feel your Presence fully. With the "Show Off" function, you can break through the dimensional wall in the form of custom text and display your inner beast to your STEAM Friends List!

Most richest Little Imagination

In future development, I would like to add various casual games with classic mechanisms (such as vertical-scrolling shooting games, platform jumping, classic poker, etc.), and incorporate elements of roguelike and unlimited challenges, allowing it to have a small body and big content.

Most thirsty for creativity Big Plan

This is a small game that is designed for high customization from the beginning, and we also plan to launch a workshop in the future (where you can freely import game backgrounds, add casual games you want, and express your unique sense of existence!).please give me feedback in the community on how to improve it. Let's make this idea into a delicious snack together.
if It brought you a little bit of fun, please leave a review so more gamer can know and join in this crazy party!

name: Abscission
detailed_description:
Abscission is a Lovecraftian, story-driven horror point-and-click investigation game. It involves searching crime scenes for evidence, combining clues and questioning suspects. Puzzles can have multiple solutions as you guide the protagonist - Detective Will Stanhope - through the story.

Stanhope will sometimes be presented with alternative ways to handle a conversation, based on four temperaments:

Melancholic (detail oriented)
Phlegmatic (calm)
Sanguine (sociable)
Choleric (driven)

There is no one approach that works best for all conversations, and Stanhope will need to use all of them in order to be the best he can be.

This game adapts to your choices. People will remember how Stanhope spoke to them and may respond differently in the future, so consider each response carefully. Will Stanhope's destiny is in your hands. Choose wisely.

name: Tower Walker Demo
detailed_description:
From the developers of Dino Nest and Boxing School comes a new fresh auto-grinder, idler fantasy RPG game rich with features. Create and manage your own hero. Explore the huge ancient tower. This is a pure offline singleplayer MMO Grind Simulator!

KEY FEATURES

  • Create and manage your hero, choose between 3 starter classes
  • Progress up in the ancient tower, explore and discover
  • Defeat powerful bosses and gain infamy with enemy factions
  • Loot weapons, armor, rings, artifacts and other powerful items
  • Level up your character and learn new skills at the trainer
  • Over 20 classes and 5 expertise grades for weapons and armor
  • Trade with merchants in the basecamp or unlock secret vendors
  • Craft items, fully featured recipe based crafting system
  • Find and level up companions with extra buffs and combat abilities
  • Complete normal or heroic quests in the journal to reveal lore
  • Enchant your weapons, armor and rings (old school style) with no limits
  • Shared stash transfer capability in inventory storage
  • Offline Singleplayer with up to 8 character save slots
Your journey in Tower Walker always continues through new expansions
(Upcoming: Abyss Realm - the first raid instance, normal and hard mode)

OFFLINE SINGLEPLAYER ONLY

Tower Walker does not contain any online features, multiplayer or microtransactions. This is a pure oldschool offline singleplayer experience with local savefiles only.

name: Below the Surface:Uncovering the Truth in the Sewers
detailed_description:
案件简介:

废弃的下水道，深不见底……
在这废弃的地下世界里，没有阳光，没有鲜花，只有死亡的气息。黑暗笼罩着一切，只有微弱的灯光照亮着前方的路。潮湿的墙壁上，长满了青苔和霉菌，发出刺鼻的恶臭。
你扮演的警探Chen被困在这里，心跳加速，汗水从耸立的汗毛上滑落，但作为警探的你必须不断前行，找到答案，揪出背后的真相。否则，你将永远被困在这座死亡的地下城中，沦为下水道的一部分。
真相只有一个，只有坚定的推理和勇敢的行动才能将凶手绳之以法。
快来破案吧！

游戏玩法:

玩家首先需要在案发现场搜证线索，然后在脑图中推理合并线索，最终抵达真相。您可以根据线索雷达的提示，来寻找物证，遇到拿不准的线索时，可以使用线索分析仪来辅助推理。

name: Life Saver
detailed_description:
Earth is on the verge of World War 3. The Great Nations of our civilization are poised to press the "launch missiles" glowing red buttons that we've all seen in the movies! But now it's real! Now, the world is finally about to succumb to nuclear explosions, devastating fire and endless turmoil. The people or our great globe are in uncontrollable panic and chaos is over-flowing amongst the lands!

But never fear..

Because Super Star Dan is here!

In "Life Saver", you control Dan the Super Star and must make your way through the almost endless emotions that have both caused this nuclear war. Dodge and destroy the raw fear and emotions of the people scared for their very lives! Balls of anger, trapezoids of rage, and pyramids of desolation are just a few of the obstacles in your way.

Your job isn't to stop the war.. rather, your job is to build a hard drive capable to storing the DNA of every life form on Earth. To save humanity (and "Cleo" the cat and "Spot" the dog too), you'll need to find and collect all the essential parts to make a life saving super SSD drive. The super computer and life restoring factories have already been built and are protected far beneath the earths surface. The one missing piece is by far the most difficult. The solid state drive that Super Star Dan (YOU) must acquire the components for!

Without your help and without a successful mission, all of life as we know it will be gone forever! ..Are you ready to do what it takes to save us all?

name: 月藍傳奇REMAKE古文明之謎
detailed_description:
author's note

Hello everyone, I'm Angel Cake.
Moon Blue Legend 1 and 2 are independent games that I created during my university years using RPG Maker 2003.

The Moon Blue Legend Remake, while being a remastered version of the first game, has undergone a major overhaul in terms of its gameplay content.

Whether you're an old player from back in the day or a new player who's never experienced it before, we believe you'll be drawn in by this game that is both funny and heart-warming, as well as full of passion.

Story Summary:

Lu Weipi goes about his daily missions of "hunting and teasing female villagers."
With no grand ambitions, he just wants to find a wife.
But his dull life is eventually shattered as he travels throughout the kingdom and gradually uncovers the veil of an ancient civilization.

The young man is not a great hero, nor does he have any extraordinary abilities, yet he discovers that ordinary people can also achieve extraordinary things...

Game Features:



1.Rich emotional ups and downs:
The story of this game is about 60% satire and 40% serious, full of a lot of silly and sometimes slightly suggestive jokes. In addition to the humor, the plot also touches on many topics related to life and death, as well as family relationships. We won't hold back when it comes to making you cry, so you'll definitely experience a fun and emotional gaming experience.


2.Diverse gameplay:
The gaming experience of this game is very similar to the JRPG designs of 20 years ago and has a variety of gaming elements. In this game, you can experience the following gaming experiences:
(1) Rich storyline
(2) Dungeon exploration
(3) Playing as a Japanese-style hero searching houses
(4) A large number of puzzle-solving mechanisms
(5) Exciting boss battles
(6) Various equipment combinations



3.Unexpected endings:
The story of this game actually has many foreshadowing elements. When the truth is revealed, will you exclaim, "I knew it!" or "How could this happen!?" Let's wait and see.

name: Blue Maiden
detailed_description:
YOU CAN ALSO CHECK OUT MY OTHER GAME

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2095140/Locked_in_my_darkness/


About the Game

Blue Maiden is a Japanese first person psychological horror game that focuses on exploring and finding answers to the mystery of the old neighborhood.

Story


You are Tachi Tachibana, a graduated university student, after graduating you decide to return to your neighborhood to help at the family business, you have been dreaming the same nightmare in which you find a mysterious girl, when You finally arrive in your neighborhood, you notice that something is not right, and you must find out what is happening.

Features


Most of the time you have to walk and explore different traditional Japanese locations to find clues and solve the mystery of the Blue Maiden.

  • Immersive Experience: An Atmospheric Graphics.
  • Japanese Theme: Environment inspired by Japanese horror games.
  • Psychological horror: The game contains some jumpscares that could be disturbing.

After two stages, the Sprite will evolve into different forms depending on your actions.

Fun mini-games
Attractive original music

detailed_description:
Welcome to Zone VX, an adrenaline-pumping vehicular combat game set amidst the unforgiving sands of a mysterious desert. Engage in high-octane battles as you fight to survive against relentless waves of enemies in a compact arena.

In Zone VX, you'll pilot a highly advanced vehicle engineered from unearthed alien technology. As you progress, you'll encounter increasingly challenging enemies that adapt and grow stronger, pushing your skills to the limit. To keep up, you'll need to collect powerful upgrades and utilize your environment to your advantage.

name: Hotel Manibella
detailed_description:
Welcome to Hotel Manibella, the ultimate horror puzzle game that will leave you trembling with fear and excitement! Step inside the doors of this eerie hotel and prepare to be transported to a world of terror and mystery.

As you make your way through the dimly lit hallways, you'll encounter all sorts of creepy creatures and spine-tingling puzzles. Each floor of the hotel brings new challenges and scares, and the deeper you go, the more intense the horror becomes.

But don't worry, you're not alone in this terrifying journey. You'll have to use your wits and skills to uncover the secret storyline behind the hotel's dark history and find a way out before it's too late.

What sets Hotel Manibella apart from other horror games is its unique art style, which perfectly captures the unsettling atmosphere of the hotel. Every detail, from the creaking floors to the ghastly monsters, has been meticulously crafted to give you an immersive and unforgettable horror experience.

So if you're looking for a truly spine-chilling adventure, Hotel Manibella is the game for you. Buy it now and brace yourself for a journey into the unknown. But be warned, once you enter the doors of this hotel, there's no turning back!

Initially, you find yourself confined in a room. Upon successfully escaping the first room, you advance to the next level by means of an elevator. In the subsequent level of the building, you must navigate through a maze to elude another monster. The pattern repeats in the following levels where you must also evade a monster and continue to progress.

name: Beach Invasion 1945 - Pacific
detailed_description:
Join our Discord


About the Game


Beach Invasion 1945-Pacific is a WWII FPS game where you defend the fortified Pacific island beaches against invading forces who will attack you with troops, tanks, planes and more! Use a variety of iconic and authentic WWII U.S. and Imperial Japanese weapons such as machine gun, naval guns and anti-air cannons. Get additional defenses with mines, explosive barrels, artillery strikes and weapon upgrades!

For the first time, in this sequel to Beach Invasion 1944, Beach Invasion 1945-Pacific also adds the option to play COOP multiplayer with a friend. The players take the role of either an American or Japanese soldier operating machine guns and cannon turrets to defend the tropical islands of Pacific. During these immense amphibious and airborne operations, player's task is to destroy as many of the invading forces as possible, utilizing several machine gun, anti-air and naval gun nests and bonuses from the supply drops.

Two sides and two maps to choose from: either take control of Japanese defenses of the volcanic island of Iwo Jima, or take control of American defenses in the Manila bay in the Philippines.

Hardcore action in an immersive WWII setting with realistic sounds and special effects which will make you relive the memorable and epic moments from your favourite WWII movies and TV-series. Non-stop action with continous naval and airborne attacks through day and night with changing weather conditions.
Huge variety of enemies, including marines, paratroopers, bazookas, flamethrowers, attack boats, jeeps, tanks, amphibious vehicles, fighters, bombers and more!

Ability to call artillery strikes and rain destruction on your enemies.
Getting temporary upgrades on your weapons which include Poison Gas, Armor Piercing, Explosive and Incendiary ammunition.

Strengthening your defenses with anti-personnel and anti-tank mines, explosive barrels.
Earn medals for achieving diffferent actions as you progress.


The game will support following languages on release: English, Spanish, German, French, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Turkish, Arabic.

name: Arcane Warlords
detailed_description:
Explore and conquer a vast kingdom full of mystery and wonder! Arcane Warlords features three key components: a world map, your stronghold, and various battlegrounds.
On the world map, you'll have the freedom to explore and encounter a variety of events, raid valuable locations, track down dangerous foes, and recruit new fighters from towns to join your ranks. In your stronghold, you'll manage your legion, prepare for the next battleground, and upgrade your skills and equipment. When it's time for combat, you can utilize your arcane powers and abilities, and employ strategic thinking and careful planning to emerge victorious against your enemies.

Features

  • Recruit the perfect blend of Monsters, Mages, Knights, … Arcane Chickens to dominate the battlefield.
  • Whether you're facing hordes of monsters or armies of knights, your strategic battlefield placement can make all the difference.
  • With a wide range of spells and abilities at your disposal, you can adapt to any situation and support your legion in any battle, no matter how challenging.
  • Upgrade your skills, legion, and stronghold to become unstoppable.
  • Pause the game anytime to regain control and stay on top of the action.
  • Gain control over the entire kingdom.
  • Procedural generation, Randomization and Character Stats keep the game fresh and exciting each time you play, with new challenges and surprises to discover.
  • Compete with other players on the optional leaderboards.

Your legion awaits - lead them to glory!

detailed_description:
1984 is a first-person survival adventure set in Orwell's timeless dystopia. As Winston Smith you must carefully plot your secret rebellion against Big Brother, while avoiding the suspicions of the Thought Police. Adaptation by the Narrative Designer of Subnautica, Talos Principle and FTL.

1984 is part walking simulator, part adventure, and part survival game. Each day you go to work, acquire the resources you need to stay alive by whatever means necessary, and conduct your illicit rebellion as surreptitiously as possible. Your actions are largely narrated from Orwell's original prose, but you'll have many opportunities to make personal and dialog choices which redirect the story.

War is peace.
Freedom is slavery.
Ignorance is strength.

Major Features

  • Fully-realised 3D dystopia: Explore iconic locations from Airstrip One, including Winston's flat, the Ministry of Truth and Room 101, all rendered in Unreal Engine 5
  • Choices matter: Burn the diary, inform on your comrades, save yourself
  • Complete audiobook: Orwell's novel is narrated as you play
  • Survival gameplay: Work to earn your rations, trade essential goods, do whatever it takes to survive

Things You Can Do in This Game

  • 'Rectify' history: Work at the Ministry of Truth to forge articles in favour of The Party, earn money and maintain your cover
  • Manage your relationships: Start an illicit affair, decide which of your comrades you can trust (if any), and always say the right things at the right times to avoid suspicion
  • Handle revolutionary documents: Write a diary confessing your hatred for Big Brother, learn about the promise of Oligarchical Collectivism, or turn it all over to the Ministry of Love
  • Drink Victory Gin: Luxuries are in high demand, but just might keep you going for one more day

name: Reflectile Demo
detailed_description:
‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎

Reflectile is a minimal precision-puzzle game that yearns for the early 2000's era of video games. It will test your ability to cut corners, squeeze through tight corridors, and make split-second inputs to reach the goal of each stage. You’ll encounter stages of varying difficulty, all with unique challenges and stylish designs to boot.

‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‎ ‎‏‏ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‏‏‎

‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‎ ‎‏‏ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‏‏‎

‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‎ ‎‏‏ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‏‏‎

‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎

The gameplay in Reflectile is deceptively simple: Reflect, direct, and slow down your tile to get to the end of each stage. Each world in Reflectile will have you discover and interact with different types of puzzle blocks, including bumpers, speed boosts, number tiles and many more!

‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‎ ‎‏‏ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‏‏‎

Your tile has three different speeds, slow, normal, and fast. Going fast is optimal for speedrunners or completionists, but there's no shame in taking the game at a normal pace! Slow is great for making accurate turns through narrow corridors, pacing yourself between moving objects, giving yourself more time to think about your next move. But be careful - you can only slow down so much before you combust!

‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‎ ‎‏‏ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‏‏‎

‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‎ ‎‏‏ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‏‏‎

‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎

All the worlds in Reflectile take place in a geometrical microcosm in which there are thriving, diverse biomes; each with their own unique aesthetic and charm. You will embark on a journey across this fascinating and enchanting digital universe by completing levels to unlock more and more worlds that you can explore and conquer. The world of Reflectile is a completionists’ dream!



‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‎ ‎‏‏ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‏‏‎

name: Alchemist's Fantasy R ~ A Girl's Alchemic Furnace ~
detailed_description:
"Alchemist's Fantasy R ~ A Girl's Alchemic Furnace ~" is an RPG game produced by みじいし and published by Hanabi games.

Game Plot

The young alchemist Meti from the village, along with her boyfriend Nero, begins a quest to find their missing master. Meti's ability to synthesize magical creatures helps the couple overcome various challenges they encounter on the way, and they discover a secret that changes their lives.

Game Content

This game is a role-playing game featuring a turn-based combat system. It is characterized by a rich and immersive storyline, accompanied by excellent visual effects and atmospheric music. Players explore a vast world.

Game Features

  • Jrpg
  • Captivating story
  • Turn-based combat

name: Dreamy Trail
detailed_description:
Welcome to Dreamy Trail, a captivating walking simulator that takes you on a peaceful journey through a mystical forest. Immerse yourself in the serene atmosphere as you explore the forest, collect items, and uncover hidden secrets.

Gameplay

Dreamy Trail is a game that allows you to explore the lush forest environment at your own pace. The game mechanics are simple, intuitive, and designed to provide a relaxing and calming experience. The game focuses on item hunting, which adds depth to the story and unlocks new areas for you to explore.

Graphics and Sound

The world of Dreamy Trail is brought to life by stunning graphics, with vibrant colors and intricate textures that create an enchanting atmosphere. The game's soothing soundtrack complements the visuals perfectly, adding to the overall peacefulness of the game.

Features

  • A serene and immersive walking simulator experience
  • Calming atmosphere with a focus on relaxation and item hunting
  • Stunning graphics and a soothing soundtrack
  • Discover hidden secrets and unlock new areas by collecting items
  • Simple and intuitive gameplay mechanics

Dreamy Trail is a game that offers a relaxing and immersive experience that is perfect for those who love walking simulators and exploring new environments. Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of the forest and uncover its hidden secrets today.

name: Phoenix Springs: Prologue
detailed_description:
It begins with an investigation: find your brother Leo. You already know where it ends.



Point and click your way through the first 20-40 minutes of Phoenix Springs, a mystery adventure game that updates the classic genre for the modern player.
Immerse yourself in the first act of an atmospheric neo-noir universe with frustration-free controls and a streamlined UI.

Connect leads and clues with the world around you, or mention them in conversations to progress.

Discard false leads and red herrings as you solve logical puzzles designed to challenge and delight fans of story-rich interactive experiences.



  • Fully-voice acted
  • Handdrawn art and animation
  • Streamlined UI
  • First act only (20-40 mins gameplay)

name: The Chef's Shift
detailed_description:
Get ready to cook up a storm in "The Chef's Shift" - a fast-paced typing game set in a bustling restaurant! With your keyboard as your weapon, you'll need to cook and serve delicious dishes to hungry customers before they lose their patience. But that's not all - you'll also need to juggle all kinds of crazy distractions, from rat invasions to unruly customers.

- THE RECIPE -

- INGREDIENTS -

  • 1 teaspoon of chaotic, fast-paced gameplay
  • 1 package of easy-to-pickup hard-to-master TYPING mechanic
  • 1 cup of fun time management bits

- DIRECTION -




Type words above the dish to prepare em up. Ready-to-serve dish goes to the tray. Press DELETE to discard a dish on the tray.



Type to serve the costumers. Serve them before they lose interest in consuming Italian cuisine.

When in doubt, press BACKSPACE to reset your typing
(and allowing you to choose another word to type)



Ocassionally, you’ll meet your official business competitor, Mr. Whisker, trying to fetch your recipe by sampling the whole thing. Type the words above the rat to do cleansing.



Type words on cashier to attain wealth from satisfied customer. Meet the sales target by the end of the shift to advance to next level!

name: Topple Tactics
detailed_description:
Topple Tactics is a physics-based multiplayer tower defense game where one huge player places towers whilst the little players must get to the end of the map in order to defeat the huge player!

As a huge player: Place and upgrade towers and use your abilities in order to make crossing the map as difficult as possible for the little players.

As a little player: As a minion in a tower defense track, you must upgrade your player in order to face the increasingly difficult onslaught built by the big player!



Features:
- Physics-based characters
- PvP
- A large tower and ability arsenal for the huge player
- A large upgrade tree for the little player
- & much more!
