name: Fantasy Grounds - Pathfinder RPG - Pathfinder Player Companion: Dragon Empires Primer
detailed_description:
"Pathfinder Player Companion: Dragon Empires Primer (PFRPG)


The distant continent of Tian Xia rests on the opposite side of the world from the Inner Sea region, and it shows. From the treacherous jungles of naga-ruled Nagajor to the sorcerous kingdom of Dtang Ma, and from the trackless and unforgiving deserts of Shaguang to the wondrous city of Goka, countless opportunities can be found for any character or adventure in amazingly expansive Tian Xia. While the extensive Dragon Empires Gazetteer unveils dozens of the mystical continent's secrets, the Dragon Empires Primer provides information pertinent to creating characters for campaigns set in this vast and diverse region. This volume of Pathfinder Player Companion provides players and Game Masters alike with all of the settingspecific traits and trappings they need to customize and play characters in the Dragon Empires.
Inside this Pathfinder Player Companion, you'll find:
  • Overviews of all of Tian Xia's nations, including important details for players to integrate into their characters' backstories and new character traits for every region to give characters boons that further tie them to their homelands.
  • Rules for Tian Xia's five most prominent races: the shapeshifting kitsune, ophidian nagaji, transmigratory samsarans, avian tengus, and shadowy wayangs.
  • Four new archetypes with distinctly Tian flavors, including the lotus geisha (bard), sword saint (samurai), white-haired witch (witch), and yokai hunter (ranger).
  • New feats for combative characters that bolster prowess in martial arts and swordplay.
  • An extensive look at the gods and philosophies of the Dragon Empires, as well as rules for the moon subdomain.
  • A new bloodline for sorcerers tainted with oni blood, and a new school of magic for wizards who wish to harness the power of the mysterious void.
  • New rules mechanics for establishing and maintaining one's honor in the Dragon Empires.
This Pathfinder Player Companion works best with the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game or the 3.5 version of the world's oldest fantasy roleplaying game, but can be easily incorporated into any fantasy world.
Written by Tim Hitchcock and Colin McComb
This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and Features the Following additions:

  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • Individual area descriptions linked to maps, containing new encounters, treasure parcels and descriptions for just that area
  • Tokens for each encounter are pre-placed in starting locations on the map. You can edit these on the fly
  • Drag and drop treasure parcels and Encounter XP that is easily awarded to your players to keep the game moving ahead
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
"

name: The Last Z VR
detailed_description:
The Last Z VR :

The Last Z is an immersive co-op adventure built entirely for VR for up to 12 players over LAN.

The Story :

Following scientific experiments in a secret laboratory located in an unknown city in Arizona, a virus escaped and contaminated the entire region, with the authorities completely overwhelmed. By chance, they developed a vaccine that could save humanity from the zombie invasion.
You play as a team of soldiers and your mission will be to survive as long as possible so that the research team arrives in time with the vaccine.
Good luck !

Single or multiplayer :

You can play The Last Z alone but for more fun, we recommend that you play with other players.
Indeed, the game is playable up to 12 players in network [LAN] and the level of difficulty changes according to the number of players.
Players can talk to each other in-game using voice chat and a scoring system is displayed at the end of each game.

But how do I fight zombies ?

To fight the hordes of zombies, you have several different guns to choose from. a pistol, a shotgun and an ak-47 which will be very practical;). In addition to the standard weapon set, you can also use the Gatling gun which you can find on the map.

What is the difficulty of the game ?

Do not panic !
The difficulty is increasing,
the zombies are not difficult to fight at the beginning of the game but the more you progress in the game, the more zombies will arrive in number and will be more difficult to fight.

name: Little Postman
detailed_description: You are a little postman exploring different archipelagos. You move safely tile by tile on a grid-based environment. You will find some magical triggers that allow you to rotate small islands.  By modifying the landscape, do your best to create a path towards the end of each level and give letters to the inhabitants ! Each of the nine levels propose a unic puzzle around this concept.

name: Fantasy Grounds - Arcadia Issue 012
detailed_description:
"

Arcadia Issue 012 - January 2022

Welcome to ARCADIA! Inspired by old-school tabletop magazines, ARCADIA is MCDM's digital magazine for 5th edition GMs and players. We hope you like it!

So Your Best Friend Is a Monster by Jessica Marcrum with art by Elisa Serio. You know how sometimes the characters make friends with a monster and instead of battling to the death, they decide to save the creature? Or you know how sometimes you can turn into a half-spider demon after, say, pissing off a certain eight-legged goddess? Well, we got you covered! This article presents rules for uncursing driders, harpies, and medusas and turning them back into humanoids plus rollable tables for generating quick and dirty curses.

Fey of the Shadowfell by Jonathan Connor Self with art by Faizal Fikri & Zuzanna Wuzyk. This article gives you new dark fey creatures to add to your game. When fey move to the Shadowfell, whimsy and passion can turn to pain and rage. These creatures make excellent villains and NPCs for your next adventure! Say hello to new hags and fomorians and unique creatures like the bogie and lubberkin.

The Stuff of Nightmares by Carlos Cisco with art by Gustavo Pelissari. Run one of these two nightmare encounters and your characters won't take long rests for granted again! If they dare to stay at the Helm Street Inn, they'll find the murderous Glass Ghost stalks their dreams. When a hypnagoug crosses their path, they'll have to act fast or become the first victims of an aberration that uses their energy to tear into our reality. 

The Dimensions of Dowda by Robert J. Kuntz with art by Nick De Spain. You get a bonus article in this issue! We're presenting a magic item with adventure inside for the first edition of the game. Dowda's Lantern contains an entire secret dimension. Defeat the item's four challenges, and its power is yours. A conversion guide for using this article with fifth edition rules is included.
"

"

name: Tuya
detailed_description:
A short horror adventure game set in rural Japan is now available!

Synopsis.
The protagonist returns to his parents' house in a hurry after hearing the news of his grandfather's death, and there he encounters a terrifying sight!

Contents
This is a walking simulator game where you explore your surroundings, find items, and advance the story.
Hints of the hidden storyline are scattered throughout the stages.
By reading them all, you can reveal the hidden sad story of this game.

Play time: 10 to 30 minutes.

name: Reflectile
detailed_description:
‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎

Reflectile is a minimal precision-puzzle game that yearns for the early 2000's era of video games. It will test your ability to cut corners, squeeze through tight corridors, and make split-second inputs to reach the goal of each stage. You’ll encounter stages of varying difficulty, all with unique challenges and stylish designs to boot.

‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‎ ‎‏‏ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‏‏‎

‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‎ ‎‏‏ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‏‏‎

‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎

The gameplay in Reflectile is deceptively simple: Reflect, direct, and slow down your tile to get to the end of each stage. Each world in Reflectile will have you discover and interact with different types of puzzle blocks, including bumpers, speed boosts, number tiles and many more!

‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‎ ‎‏‏ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‏‏‎

Your tile has three different speeds, slow, normal, and fast. Going fast is optimal for speedrunners or completionists, but there's no shame in taking the game at a normal pace! Slow is great for making accurate turns through narrow corridors, pacing yourself between moving objects, giving yourself more time to think about your next move. But be careful - you can only slow down so much before you combust!

‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‎ ‎‏‏ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‏‏‎

‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‎ ‎‏‏ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‏‏‎

‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎

All the worlds in Reflectile take place in a geometrical microcosm in which there are thriving, diverse biomes; each with their own unique aesthetic and charm. You will embark on a journey across this fascinating and enchanting digital universe by completing levels to unlock more and more worlds that you can explore and conquer. The world of Reflectile is a completionists’ dream!



‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‎ ‎‏‏ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‏‏‎‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‏‏‎

THANK YOU for playing the demo! If you liked it, please wishlist the game to help support development.

‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎
about_the_game:
‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎

Reflectile is a minimal precision-puzzle game that yearns for the early 2000's era of video games. It will test your ability to cut corners, squeeze through tight corridors, and make split-second inputs to reach the goal of each stage. You’ll encounter stages of varying difficulty, all with unique challenges and stylish designs to boot.

name: Fantasy Grounds - The Foulest of Spirits - Chapter Two of the Red Star Rising Campaign
detailed_description:
"

The Foulest of Spirits - Chapter Two of the Red Star Rising Campaign


The Sul has risen following the last day of Carnivalle, but the morning brings no comfort. The terrifying events of the previous night still burn within your minds - and the shades of death that menaced the camp still darken your hearts. Now, some of your troupe have gone missing and others lie as if dead. And though you wish to stay and help your kin, you must complete a critical (and secret) mission in the depths of the Duskwood to find an item of great importance. But it is Darktide - a day of dire portents - and nothing is as it should be.
Vile monsters and grotesque undead gather in the shadowy forest - driven mad by the evil of the day. Bloodthirsty gangs of thugs prowl along the paths and roads, awaiting their chance to murder and maim. And beyond all this, something hunts your troupe - a fearful and ancient evil that burns in your dreams. Then, fires devour your people's tents, as thieves abscond with valuable Hanataz treasures! But there are more sinister plots afoot than simple arson and robbery. Baleful powers scheme in the shadows, waiting for their chance to set their murderous plans in motion. Be on your guard, for everything you believe may be false!
This is an adventure the like of which you have probably never seen. Along with a crafted tale that is fun to read for GMs, it also provides all manner of GM support tools and special handouts to make running the game easier while making the experience far more immersive for your players. Get the Foulest of Spirits today. And bring some more game to your table!
An Immersive Experience: More fun for players. Easier to run for GMs.
Far more than just a supplement:
  • Adapted from over 150 pages of content (Adventure Book & GM's Reference)
  • 65 special items (coded if meaningful)
  • 47 full-color NPC portraits with character notes
  • 82 full-color handouts
  • Over 30 maps and battlemaps (all resized and with a preset grid)
  • More than five of these maps have been specially made for this module and have not previously appeared in print or digital versions
  • 136 tokens linked to NPC records
  • There are five difficulty levels for each encounter. 
  • The tokens for each encounter of each difficulty level are all already placed at the starting locations on the map. You can edit them during the game.
"

name: My monstrous roommate. (étude)
detailed_description:
Today you were lying on your bed, looking up at the ceiling, waiting... You go on living knowing that it will come soon, there is no point in running away. It is always there, sometimes knocking on your door, sometimes watching from the rooftops. It's in your closet, in your books and spoons. Your heart trembles, and the silence is torn by its roar... It's always there,it's your monstrous neighbor.

Short point and click horror visual novel;
Experience about 20 minutes long.

name: Afterimage: Artbook
detailed_description:
Experience the exquisite hand-drawn art of Afterimage in the Artbook, and appreciate the rich and colorful charm of Engardin!

- a rich content of 95 pages
- character design sketches and final drafts of our heroine Renee, along with designs of other various NPCs
- unique and distinctive scene art, together with monster designs closely related to the ecologies of different scenes
- detailed designs of weapons, armors, accessories and various items
- additional original artwork including the key visual, OST cover, promotional arts, etc.

name: Inferno Quest: Journey Through the Lava Cavern
detailed_description:
Inferno Quest is an old-school single-player action-style obstacle/puzzle game.
Inferno Quest is an attempt to make a simple action game with fairly difficult obstacles and puzzles that get progressively more difficult as you move through each level. There are only four levels to complete but each one will have more fiendish traps to beat or puzzles to complete all while attempting to beat the clock. Control your all terrain drone orb and collect gold coins while navigating this tomb to gain your freedom.

[Difficulty]
Game difficulty will be measured by how many lives you start the game with and how many collectible coins you will need for an extra life. It will also affect how much time you will have to complete each level and how much time is added as you move to each level. Can you complete the game on 'Extreme'????

name: 2 Volt
detailed_description:
Welcome 2 Volt, the sequel to Volt.

You are refurbished and recharged lithium-ion battery and somehow found yourself back in a fully automated manufacturing facility.

2 Volt is a single-player puzzle game and your goal on each level is to reach the exit.
Use electric beams to Interact with environment and discover its secrets.

  • Solve puzzles using logic, timing, and skill.
  • Discover and earn achievements on each of 40 levels.
  • Experience the physically based world of 2 Volt in it's relaxed ambience

name: Bor Dungeon
detailed_description:
ABOUT THIS GAME

Bor Dungeon is a fast paced action RPG mixing with platformer and simple puzzles. Smashing your way through dark dungeons defeating hordes of enemies and collecting loot, become the ultimate Bor!



Play as third person Bor, collecting loot, gain unique skills and smashing huge Bosses!

KEY FEATURES

Action packed with physics: the game aims to have as much interactive environment elements as possible. You can jump on, smash, and examine anything in the level as your physics playground!
Smooth and responsive movement and combat
Cutesy design in enemies and environment
Defeat big bosses to gain additional skills and unleash your full potential!
No loot boxes, microtransactions or ANY additional purchases required- all content is available to unlock in game by playing.
Each weapon type comes with different skill set.
Solo developed by Spikebor

BOUNCY BOI

FLYING PLATFORMS

TONS OF LOOT

name: Nox Archaist: Lord of Storms
detailed_description:
You have learned of Lord Estintar’s suspicions that the cult has something to do with the increase in storm activity. He charges you with investigating. The task will not be easy, but you accept this duty. Your quest will take you to uncharted reaches of the Isles of Wynmar. Traps, puzzles, and powerful magic items await, which may or may not be able to help you. Those brave and foolish enough to face these perils will come face to face with the Lord of Storms!

The Nox Archaist: Lord of Storms digital download includes:
  • 15+ hours of new content, including a new quest line
  • New mobs and new unique items
  • New features, including character renaming
  • PDF of the manual

This is an expansion pack for Nox Archaist, and requires the full game to run. To play the Lord of Storms expansion, you must start a new game of Nox Archaist. You cannot import a saved game from the pre-expansion version. The Lord of Storms Expansion includes the complete original storyline along with the expansion content, so once you start a new game you will be able to play the full Nox Archaist scenario. To activate the new content, talk to Lord Estintar in Nourtheld Castle. Ask him about STORMS. After doing this, you can continue with your current quests, or you can work on the quest given by Lord Estintar.

Like all of the Nox Archaist quests, you can start the Lord of Storms with characters at any level. Nevertheless, the Lord of Storms content is designed for a level 4 or 5 party that has been trained and is using level 4 or 5 gear. For players who want to focus more on puzzles and have less challenging combat, a level 5 party would be better. Parties below level 4 may find the adventure too challenging, while those significantly above level 5 may be overpowered. For players who want to dive into the new content, the expansion includes two pregenerated parties of levels 4 and 5.

name: 琉璃异闻录：远行序章
detailed_description:
Elementcore Revelations：Journey Prologue is a casual RPG game that features idle leveling, synthesis and upgrading of hundreds of weapons, and a variety of treasure chests to discover. Players can choose a character and embark on a journey to visit familiar and unfamiliar locations, upgrade their character's equipment, configure talents, defeat monsters along the way, and discover the stories of each girl's journey, while uncovering the reasons behind the increasingly chaotic world.



As the first game in the Elementcore Revelations, Journey Prologue portrays the personal stories of the characters that appear in this game series. This game will allow players to experience the gameplay of one of the main characters in a free format, while other characters will gradually appear as DLC. Different characters will have different skills, talents, applicable weapons, storylines, and more. It is hoped that this character will provide players with a clearer understanding of the gameplay and a greater curiosity about the world within the game.

name: Soul Cliff
detailed_description:
Soul Cliff is a souls-like game about an individual who is attempting to save another trapped beneath a collapsed sink-hole. The gameplay is very close to a souls-like experience with the added element of an ultimate ranged ability but without a riposte mechanic.

The gameplay involves rolling, parrying, shielding, heavy/light attacking, activating your ultimate, and drinking potions to beat your opponents. There are currently four main boss fights. Due to the Early Access state, the final boss needs more design work. The other bosses are essentially complete.

The story begins after the Self survives a sink-hole incident where his significant other was consumed by the earth. Desperately he tries to soften the caved-in rocks but to no avail. Not all options are considered due to the seriousness and time-sensitive nature of the event, and he converse with his thoughts The Self in an attempt to free her.

Soul Cliff is named coincidentally with the souls-like gameplay. The soul is the Self, the person separate from the body. Food nourishes the body, but what nourishes the soul? There is a cliff in the game positioned above the sink-hole. Thus Soul Cliff.

name: Swordmin'z Dream
detailed_description:
Swordmin'z Dream is a mini-maximalist two-to-four player fighting game focused around quick matches and a volatile neutral space. Built with an emphasis on fast, high-risk play, matches can be won or lost with a single well-placed hit, but you can turn the tide quickly with strong parry mechanics.




A whole cast of strange little characters awaits, each with their own quirks and strategies.
Alongside fundamental characters like SWORDMIN and BLADEMIN you'll meet characters like VERY STRONGSMIN, who has a one-hit-kill attack, SHOOTSMIN, who just Has A Gun, or Júlian St. Clair who cannot attack at all.



In your travels you'll span the breadth of MINTOPIA and see all the sights it has to offer.
From thriving cities to barren wastelands to tropical paradises and mountain peaks, there's always something nice to look at.


Nearly every move in the game can be countered with a well-timed parry.
Punches, kicks, sword slashes, bullets, balls of concentrated ki, even explosions can be swiftly deflected if your timing is right.
If you have the meter for it, you can even parry out of hit stun, for high-stakes reversals.


Great for parties! Four players can play two simultaneous matches with the winners facing off seamlessly.


Movelists are small yet impactful, matches are quick, and characters have clearly defined win conditions.
Swordmin'z Dream's Mini-Maximalist ethos means each design element is a small idea taken to a logical extreme.

name: Magical Town
detailed_description:
Years ago, in a great war, the town's wizards created a magical shield with a powerful spell. This shield was used to protect the town from evil creatures. However, one day, the spell around the shield was broken and the town fell under the influence of magical creatures. Now, you have been tasked by the archwizard to form a team of friendly sorcerers and save the town. You will embark on a journey through the dangerous creature-filled town, complete challenging quests, and secure the town once again. You have been assigned by the archwizard to rescue the town besieged by magical creatures.

Features
  • Complete quests to unlock bonus runes and locked characters.
  • Kill creatures to earn gold and experience points.
  • Use gold to purchase new spells.
  • Acquire permanent extra bonuses for gold.

name: Kill Baby Kill
detailed_description:
Get ready for the ultimate power couple's co-op crusade in this explosive top-down action game!
Unleash your inner fighter and join forces with your partner to seek vengeance and reclaim your children in a thrilling revenge story. Inspired by the intense combat of Hotline Miami and Kill Bill, this game will have you at the edge of your seat as you battle through the Sakamoto tower filled with enemies.

But what sets this game apart is its emphasis on unique co-op movements that will leave your jaw dropping. With an incredible focus on men-women relationships, this game blends serious tones with dark humor and meta-jokes. The neo-noir vibes and cinematic visuals of this game's unique top-down perspective with 3 visible levels will transport you to a world like no other.

Are you ready to team up and fight for what's yours in this epic couple's co-op crusade?

name: Lotte
detailed_description:
What if death did not mean it was GAME OVER?

Lotte is a five-minute experience about death, where everything you see is drawn by hand. You play as Lotte, a woman who happens to become a fly when she dies. Run, jump and fly your way through an abstract forest and solve puzzles on your way.

short_description: A minimalistic five-minute puzzle platformer, where you become a fly when you die. Immerse yourself in a soothing forest and use your ability to become a fly to solve puzzles.

name: RushLane
detailed_description:
Welcome to RushLane, an adrenaline-pumping, high-speed racing game set on the scenic forest roads! Take control of your car and navigate through the twists and turns while avoiding oncoming traffic and collecting points to unlock new vehicles.

Key Features:

Intuitive keyboard controls: Use the left and right arrow keys to steer and dodge vehicles.
Collect points: Grab points scattered across the road to unlock new and exciting cars.
Boost your speed: Press the spacebar for a temporary speed boost, but use it wisely!
Stunning forest road scenery: Immerse yourself in the beautiful and challenging environment.
Multiple vehicles to unlock: Collect points and unlock a variety of cars with unique features.
Experience the thrill of RushLane and become the master of the forest roads!

name: First Christmas
detailed_description:
Wishlist & Follow



About the Game

On Christmas Eve 1987, Betty arrives at the family cabin and finds herself faced not only with a seemingly endless list of tasks to prepare the perfect Christmas for her new boyfriend, but also tackling a stream of unwanted visitors.

  • Pick-up-and-play: easy to start, but hard to put down
  • 4 Unique endings
  • Dark humour
  • Puzzles
  • Choices matter
  • Detailed hand drawn graphics
  • Original music score
  • Instant scene transition with a double click
  • Hotspot finder
  • Achievements

name: Reflections of Life: Spindle of Fate
detailed_description:
Grandma Studios returns with the newest spell-binding adventure in the Reflections of Life series!

Countless years have passed since the Spindle of Fate brought chaos and destruction to the worlds, making the artifact little more than a relic…or so you thought. That is until the warlike people it wiped out come back with a vengeance! The Nilds have returned for the Spindle they created, capable of shaping the fates of all the realms. And if they find its parts first, everyone will be at their mercy. Only a Guardian of your caliber can find the fabled keepers of the artifact and stop the Nilds from using their power to wreak devastation! Can you traverse new and challenging lands to save them from ruin in time? Find out in this breathtaking Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

Weave your own fate to save the worlds!
Experience a vibrant fantasy world of stunning visuals!
A stirring soundtrack brings a sense of adventure!

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.

name: Cyber Tamer
detailed_description:
Cyber Tamer is a life simulation game that brings a different perspective to the Cyberpunk universe and you have to manage time and money effectively.

The Mystery of Our Family's Death


The only thing we know about our family's demise is a baby Cybermon! Your main goal is to reveal the truth about your family's death by strengthening your bond with Cybermon. So, in this dystopian world, among the banality of death, will you be able to solve this mystery?

Time and Economy Management


Time moves in the game only as you do things that will waste your energy. Since you have the control of Cybermon as well as your own character, making money by using the time of two characters, training to prepare for fights, improving your skills by learning and refreshing your energy by sleeping are among the things you need to balance. Can you build your strategy well in this game about the life of the Cybermon trainer?

What is Cybermon?


In this dystopian world inhabited by creatures called Cybermon, the integration of humans with mechanics is prohibited by the state. Even if there are cyberpsychics who break this rule, the Cybermons in this universe are the main companions of their trainers, their soulmates. If you connect with Cybermon once in this universe, you have sworn a lifetime technological allegiance. You both need to support each other in tough times.

Become a Master Cybermon Trainer


Will you be able to join the three master trainers in the region? Develop your unique style among trainers as agile as a lizard, as strong as a bull or as sharp as a hawk! Participate in tournaments, try to win and put all your strength into becoming one of the famous trainers of the region!

Develop, Learn and Win!


Your Cybermon is dying to evolve, what about you? You can develop both your main character and your Cybermon in the game. Everything you spend time on will diversify your gameplay and make it even easier for you to balance mind, body and soul!

Are you ready?!


  • Unleash your minds by evolving your Cybermon!
  • Learn together, evolve and fight against powerful enemies!
  • Try to survive by making new friends and enemies!
  • And unlock the secrets of the past with your only friend in this world!




But are you ready to be the best Cybermon trainer in the world by using your time strategically?

name: GUNSHIP
detailed_description:
Welcome to the Gunship video game.
GUNSHIP is a short single-player 3D simulation game.
Experience that will take you into the cockpit of the most fearsome aircraft ever built.



Gunship is all about precision and accuracy, and players will need to master the controls of the aircraft to successfully complete their missions. With realistic physics and advanced AI, the game offers a truly immersive experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Whether you're a fan of action games or just looking for an exciting new challenge, Gunship is sure to deliver.

name: Deadnaut: Signal Lost Demo
detailed_description:
From the developer of cult hits Deadnaut, Zafehouse Diaries and Fear Equation comes Deadnaut: Signal Lost. In this slick, fast-paced roguelike you’ll take control of a single Deadnaut, unlock suit upgrades and abilities, fight cosmic horrors, and investigate drifting wrecks and abandoned moons. But remember: your Deadnaut is not your friend – earn their trust, do your job well, and they might return the favour.

The demo version provides a taste of the full game. Try out two of five suits, three missions and a small selection of early gear and upgrades.


Equip your Deadnaut with a wide array of weapons and gear and lead them through a series of procedurally generated missions, fighting where you can – and running when you must.


The cosmos is tearing itself apart. Wrecks are full of horrible, interdimensional creatures, the dead roam surfaces of moons, and you’re being hunted by technically advanced soldiers. Experience the world of Deadnaut up close.


Your Deadnaut may not like the idea of being torn apart by unknown horrors. If you do a good job, they'll happily accompany you. If not, pay them off or turn them into a mindless space golem. But remember: everything has a price.


There are many ways to play, from weapons and sensors, to shields and hacking. Will you take the heavy duty Labour suit and slice your way through the ship, or will you slip through the shadows in the ghostly Sensor suit? Maybe you prefer you manipulating gravity, placing drones or sniping from long-range? Play the way you want.




Encounter dozens of enemy types, each with their own strengths and weaknesses. Avoid – or exploit – the security system in each level, from the Watchers that roam ships to the malfunctioning security Towers and Sentinels that guard settlements.


Tailor your armour and damage potential, develop your Deadnaut, and discover powerful combinations and synergies among over 100 upgrades.

FAQ

Is this a sequel?
Deadnaut: Signal Lost is not a sequel. It is focused on a single Deadnaut, rather than a whole squad. The action is more intimate and tactical, and you can develop your Deadnaut with numerous suit upgrades and abilities. Furthermore, the gameplay is turn-based, not real-time, which helps focus the action.

How does this relate to the original Deadnaut (2014)?
Deadnaut and Deadnaut: Signal Lost are both situated in the same universe and feature similar, mission-based gameplay in procedurally-generated locations. Furthermore, in both games you take on the role as a remote handler who controls the action ‘at a distance’ via a physical console. The Deadnaut also uses similar weapons and suits; battles against security systems; trades ‘knowledge’ for gear; and can be cloned upon dying.

What does the full version offer?
Here's what you can expect in the complete game:
  • Five suits: Security, Tech, Energy, Sensor and Labour
  • Over 180 suit upgrades
  • Many weapons, enhancements and exotic equipment
  • A full campaign with up to 24 missions
  • Dozens of enemies, each with unique challenges
  • Dynamic upgrades that change from game to game
  • Customise your Deadnaut's attributes and portrait
  • Unlockable sigils that dramatically alter how you play
  • And more...

name: シロナガス島への帰還ドラマＣＤ　少女達のドタバタ騒動
detailed_description:
Caution! : This is a voice drama in Japanese. If you do not understand Japanese, you cannot enjoy it.

Return to Shironagasu Island Drama CD
A story about the girls' daily life after "Return to Shironagasu Island".
The slapstick drama woven by the four girls now opens!

Episode 1 Alex's Detective Experience
Alex visits Ikeda's office and experiences Ikeda's work as an apprentice detective.
She and Neneko, who was also there, set about the task of finding a lost cat.
It seems like an easy job, but something unexpected happens......

Episode 2 Akira's Shopping Spree
Neneko's uniform gets dirty due to an unexpected problem.
Akira comes to the spot just in time and forces Neneko to go shopping for clothes.
This is the beginning of Neneko's misfortunes.

Episode 3 Mistaken Identity of Girls
Neneko hears a conversation between Alex and Ikeda, who was helping her in the office, and misunderstands the content of the conversation.
The misinformation is passed on to Akira, who becomes even more misinformed.
The two invite Alex to lunch, but the misunderstanding spirals out of control and becomes irreversible.

Running time: 75 minutes
Illustration: Muchimaro

Cast
Sen Ikeda: Akio Otsuka
Neneko Izumozaki: Yuka Iguchi
Akira Edgeworth: Kaori Ishihara
Alex Werner: Yu Kobayashi

name: Millennial Simulator
detailed_description:
Are you tired of living your sad, pathetic, miserable life? Would you rather be sad, pathetic, and miserable simulating your life instead? Then Millennial Simulator is for you!

  • Simulate your utter desperation to buy your very own home
  • Tirelessly endure Karens at dead-end jobs whilst paying rent to fund landlord Derek's 6th investment property
  • Waste what tiny glimmer of hope you have for a better life by sending yourself into exorbitant debt to get an education
  • Splurge your fleeting funds on that delicious avo on toast
  • Hone your snowflake senses by hitting the gym or boosting your stats in the upgrade store
  • Get rejected by hot babes
  • Somehow become even uglier by suffering Covid-19
  • Explore a misleadingly enjoyable and colorful world
  • TRY. TO. SURVIVE.

And if through your trials, you finally do make enough for that deposit...your journey has only just begun...

name: Check & Clean
detailed_description:
Join Our Discord


About the Game


Check&Clean is a tactical First Person Shooter that immerses you in a rhythmic universe, alternating analysis sequences and gunfights.

You will have multiple tools to escape your robbery nightmare: Weapons, C4, cameras, ammunition boxes and mines. Take care of analyzing different rooms before entering in. Informations are crucial in our game. You will not survive if you enter a room without analyzing environment first.

« Every night, I have the same nightmare. I’m pulling a heist. Stuck in a room, there is only one exit : a locked door. It can be a hotel, an office, a basement, or a laboratory. But everytime, it begins the same way… I choose a weapon. »

WEAPONS

There are several weapons you can unlock by completing levels. Each weapon can be customized and adapted to your style with unlockable In-Game attachments.

CAMERAS

In each level, there are 5 cameras giving you perspective to 5 different rooms. Cameras allow you to anticipate enemies position, ammo boxes position, and mines position. CHECK !

C4

Use C4 to destroy doors and clean areas. Pay attention to know all the details hidden behind the door before destroying it. CLEAN !

AMMUNITION BOX

Different ammunition boxes are concealed in the rooms. You won’t survive without finding them.

MINES

Several mines are hidden in the rooms. Be extremely vigilant, and use them to your advantage.

RANDOMIZATION

Check&Clean also claims to be a memory game. There are several randomization systems to force the player to analyze their environment and optimize the replayability experience. Randomization affects enemy positions, ammunition boxes position, and mines position.

Check&Clean is a tactical First Person Shooter that immerses you in a rhythmic universe, alternating analysis sequences and gunfights.

You will have multiple tools to escape your robbery nightmare: Weapons, C4, cameras, ammunition boxes and mines. Take care of analyzing different rooms before entering in. Informations are crucial in our game. You will not survive if you enter a room without analyzing environment first.

« Every night, I have the same nightmare. I’m pulling a heist. Stuck in a room, there is only one exit : a locked door. It can be a hotel, an office, a basement, or a laboratory. But everytime, it begins the same way… I choose a weapon. »

WEAPONS

There are several weapons you can unlock by completing levels. Each weapon can be customized and adapted to your style with unlockable In-Game attachments.

CAMERAS

In each level, there are 5 cameras giving you perspective to 5 different rooms. Cameras allow you to anticipate enemies position, ammo boxes position, and mines position. CHECK !

C4

Use C4 to destroy doors and clean areas. Pay attention to know all the details hidden behind the door before destroying it. CLEAN !

AMMUNITION BOX

Different ammunition boxes are concealed in the rooms. You won’t survive without finding them.

MINES

Several mines are hidden in the rooms. Be extremely vigilant, and use them to your advantage.

RANDOMIZATION

Check&Clean also claims to be a memory game. There are several randomization systems to force the player to analyze their environment and optimize the replayability experience. Randomization affects enemy positions, ammunition boxes position, and mines position.
short_description: Check&Clean is a tactical First Person Shooter that immerses you in a rhythmic universe, alternating analysis sequences and gunfights.

name: Bullet Blaze
detailed_description:
In Bullet Blaze, players take on the role of a heroic warrior with multiple bullet types, traversing obstacles and enemies, protecting peace and saving the world.

Your mission is to jump and run, dodging enemy attacks and obstacles, while also using a wide variety of bullet types to defeat your enemies. There are six different bullet types in the game, each with a different firing speed and frequency. Upgrade your weapons by defeating enemies and collecting coins to make defeating enemies easier in future levels.

There are also many interesting props to collect in the game, such as explosives, which can destroy your enemies and make you escape from their pursuit. Also, you can collect coins to unlock new characters.

The game interface is simple and easy to understand, and the operation is simple and smooth. Bullet Blaze offers an exciting gaming experience, giving players a great shooting game experience. Hurry up to download and experience it!

name: The Seven Realms - Realm 2: Pythonium
detailed_description:
After the events in Terran, it's time to discover Pythonium, the Realm of Demons and Witches.

On a journey to save one of your oldest friends and find the perpetrator of her suffering, you seek the Witch Queen's help.

What should have been a simple request becomes more complicated as she refuses to fulfil half of your demand for unknown reasons. All is not what it seems as you uncover Pythonium's dark secrets.




Will your choices bring peace or war?
Will they put a strain on your relationships?
Will they leave Terran in a stronger position or a weaker one?




Meet three new interesting ladies:

Kagome is a prankster Demon, the daughter of the Demon King.

Seraphina is a powerful Witch and the sister of their Queen.

Lilin is one of the Generals of the Demon King's army.




This episode will give you more time with the girls you met during Realm 1: Terran.

Learn more about your best friend, Tasha. Explore your relationships with Leyala, Kali and Naya during tender moments and tense meetings. Will you share their points of view or try to show them what being a ruler truly means?

Ling Guo seems even more mysterious and cunning than ever, while her daughter, Mei, appears to be enjoying life.

Will you help Yuki grow more independent, or will you keep her submissive? Will you let Gina continue worshipping the ground beneath your feet?




Witches or Demons? Who will be your ally on this epic quest through the Seven Realms? While Witches are known for their knowledge in spells and curse-breaking, Demons are one of the most powerful entities in existence. Both have strengths and drawbacks. Will you let logic dictate your choices or emotions?

name: Shades of Rayna - Outlaw Class
detailed_description:
Outlaw class for Shades Of Rayna.

Outlaw is a class in the game and uses double pistols and just like other classes, has 10 active and 5 passive skills.

Actives:
Barrelad - Shoot an explosive arrow towards mouse location
Rapid Gun - Shoot a couple of bullets in succession towards mouse location
Dynamite - Throw a dynamite towards mouse location
Thunderfall - Shoot an orb in the air that shoots 4 lightning bullets around
Hall of Fire - Shoot an orb in the air that shoots 3 lines of fire bullets toward mouse location
Noxious Blast - Throw a poisonous orb, then shoot it with a bullet to create a poisonous explosion
Bullet Rain - Shoot bunch of bullets in the air to create a rain of bullets on mouse location
Wheel of Frost - Throw a rotating wheel that has pistols attached to itself
Tornado - Shoot a bunch of bullets while rotating around yourself
Spiral - Launch yourself towards mouse location while shooting multiple bullets

Passives:
Minade - With 35% chance, you leave bombs on your location when you dodge. Side dodges leave multiple bombs
Steal - Your basic attacks steal 0.2% of your max health amount of life to your health
Second Chance - When your health reach 0, you resurrect with %50 health (Triggers once in a map)
Expullet - With 35% chance, your basic attack bullets explode and deal area damage
Deadeye - Every damaged enemy fills up Deadeye bar. When maxed, all enemies in basic attack range gets shot

name: Warside
detailed_description:
Warside cuts to the core of what made classic turn-based-tactics games so great. A great story campaign, unique Commanders with different playstyles, awesome Battle Powers, and a wide variety of terrain and units.

Choose your Commander, assemble your forces, and battle your way to victory.

Over 25 Unit Types


Wage war with artillery and tanks. Master the seas with submarines and warships. Command the skies with fighter and bomber aircraft.



Command a variety of specialist infantry, including snipers, medics, mortar teams, and saboteurs.

12 Playable Commanders


Choose a Commander to lead your forces. Each Commander has a unique set of passive attributes and a Battle Power.



Battle Powers can be devastating, but they need careful timing to have the most impact. Choose wisely for maximum effect.

Story Campaign


Test your skills with over 30 missions in our single-player story mode campaign. We mix classic battle gameplay alongside escort, rescue, infiltration, and awesome story events.



Battle in forest, desert, and snow biomes, plus indoor close-quarters missions. Fight your way through a secret lab with hero units.

Multiplayer


Battle your friends with cross-platform multiplayer supporting local and internet play.

Highlights

  • Intuitive turn-based gameplay with a familiar feel for fans of the classics.
  • 12 playable Commanders, each with unique passive skills and Battle Powers.
  • Control 25+ unit types. Simultaneously battle over land, air, and sea with ground forces, aircraft, and naval units.
  • Faction unique units with mechanics specific to each faction.
  • Single-player campaign with over 30 missions.
  • Forest, desert and snow biomes, plus indoor close-quarters missions.
  • Challenge friends and foes with multiplayer battles. Local andinternet play are supported.
  • Design your own maps with the built-in mission editor for both single and multiplayer.

name: Fantasy Grounds - D&D Tyranny of Dragons
detailed_description:
"

D&D Tyranny of Dragons

THE RETURN OF TIAMAT! Defy the Queen of Evil Dragons in this adventure for the world's greatest roleplaying game.
Tyranny of Dragons combines and refines two action-packed Dungeons & Dragons adventures--
Hoard of the Dragon Queen and
The Rise of Tiamat --into a single sweeping campaign. It also includes a gallery of concept art providing a behind-the-scenes look at the creation of an epic adventure spotlighting Tiamat, one of the most legendary foes in D&D.

  • A wonderful re-introduction to 5th Edition's first published adventures for new fans
  • Begins as a low-level adventure suitable for new players and evolves into an epic, sprawling campaign bringing players all the way from level 1 to level 15
  • Adventure has been rebalanced to be easier for a new Dungeon Master to run and a better play experience.
  • Book includes gallery of concept art spotlighting Tiamat, one of the most legendary foes in D&D

"

name: Here There Be Bears
detailed_description:
Here There Be Bears is an interactive media project - part film, part escape room, part virtual reality video game - that immerses the player in the experience of Post Traumatic Stress Disorder. Look through the eyes of Sam and follow the fragment memories of the caving accident that left her with residual trauma years later. In the middle of her panic, a mysterious emanating from her phone serves as a guide. Slowly, the player will approach the shameful secret surrounding Sam’s accident, and will come to discover the true nature of the voice on the phone. The ultimate goal is escape, but the player will have to balance the need to escape with the urge to dig deeper into Sam’s mind to uncover all of her memories, even as each iteration makes it harder to break free.

Here, trauma is the bear, lurking somewhere in the penumbra of the cave, seen only in shadow and heard only in echoes. Those with trauma must learn how to deal with their own personal bear - by running from it, hiding from it, confronting it, or being consumed by it.

Here There Be Bears is a first person adventure narrative that introduces the player to the experience of dealing with the impacts of PTSD. Through map puzzles, labyrinthine navigation, and interactive mini games, the player will uncover Sam's history and present and see how relationships with others and oneself can be affected. Along the way, the phone serves as a central tool to interact with the environment, though reliance on the phone and its guide might lead you to loop forever.

name: Fantasy Grounds - Pathfinder 2 RPG - Gatewalkers AP 3: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires
detailed_description:
"Pathfinder 2 RPG - Gatewalkers AP 3: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires

The gatewalkers' quest for answers reaches its exciting conclusion when they return to the spooky town of Lepidstadt for a reunion with their cryptic employer, the eminent researcher Dr. Ritalson. The occasion turns sour, however, when the characters discover that matters at home have been far from quiet. The final leg of the party's quest to unravel their memory gaps and fulfill Sakuachi's destiny takes them to the Crown of the World, where ice-rimed temples, dream-devouring monsters, and ancient alien evils await.

Dreamers of the Nameless Spires is a Pathfinder adventure for four 8th-level characters. This adventure concludes the Gatewalkers Adventure Path, a three-part monthly campaign in which a team of paranormal investigators unravel the mystery behind a mass amnesic episode which left them with lost memories and strange powers. This adventure also includes an article about the mysterious elven goddess of twilight, Findeladlara; new rules options perfect for paranormalist adventurers; and strange new creatures to befriend or bedevil your players.
This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and features the following additions:
  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • Individual area descriptions linked to maps, containing new encounters, treasure parcels and descriptions for just that area
  • Tokens for each encounter are all pre-placed in starting locations on the map. You can edit these on the fly.
  • Drag and drop treasure parcels and Encounter XP that is easily awarded to your players to keep the game moving ahead
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
"
about_the_game:
"Pathfinder 2 RPG - Gatewalkers AP 3: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires

The gatewalkers' quest for answers reaches its exciting conclusion when they return to the spooky town of Lepidstadt for a reunion with their cryptic employer, the eminent researcher Dr. Ritalson. The occasion turns sour, however, when the characters discover that matters at home have been far from quiet. The final leg of the party's quest to unravel their memory gaps and fulfill Sakuachi's destiny takes them to the Crown of the World, where ice-rimed temples, dream-devouring monsters, and ancient alien evils await.

Dreamers of the Nameless Spires is a Pathfinder adventure for four 8th-level characters. This adventure concludes the Gatewalkers Adventure Path, a three-part monthly campaign in which a team of paranormal investigators unravel the mystery behind a mass amnesic episode which left them with lost memories and strange powers. This adventure also includes an article about the mysterious elven goddess of twilight, Findeladlara; new rules options perfect for paranormalist adventurers; and strange new creatures to befriend or bedevil your players.
This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and features the following additions:
  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • Individual area descriptions linked to maps, containing new encounters, treasure parcels and descriptions for just that area
  • Tokens for each encounter are all pre-placed in starting locations on the map. You can edit these on the fly.
  • Drag and drop treasure parcels and Encounter XP that is easily awarded to your players to keep the game moving ahead
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
"
short_description: "Pathfinder 2 RPG - Gatewalkers AP 3: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires The gatewalkers' quest for answers reaches its exciting conclusion when they return to the spooky town of Lepidstadt for a reunion with their cryptic employer, the eminent researcher Dr. Ritalson.

name: コンプレックスループ
detailed_description:
「何度この時が繰り返されようとも、あなたを救うことを諦めない」

この結末は予測不可能。
張り巡らされた伏線に気づけるか――

大作ＳＦ映画のような体験をあなたに贈る、ループもののアドベンチャーゲームです。

【概要】

過去と未来、複雑に絡み合う多重の視点と繰り返す時間を描いたストーリー。
限られた20分間を何度も繰り返し、死の運命にある少女の救出を目指します。
探索と謎解き、数字と図形を使ったパズルによる戦闘をクリアしていき、１年前の悲劇の真相に迫りましょう。
プレイ時間は8時間から9時間程度です。

【あらすじ】

無実の罪で囚人となったレイン・クライマーは、「使い捨ての駒」として過去へのタイムトリップを強要される。
目的は過去を変え、１年前に死んだはずの少女を生存させること。
何度も同じ時間を繰り返すことで、徐々に少女へと近づいていくが、正体不明の敵が襲い掛かる。
定められた過去が変化し、その先の未来が崩壊する。

【探索と謎解き】

探索ステージではアイテムやヒントを駆使して、ステージクリアを目指します。
様々な人物と会話し、情報収集を行う場面も。
サポート機能が充実しているので、詰まった場合でもすぐに解消することができます。

【新感覚の戦闘】

過去へ飛ぶと様々な敵が襲い掛かります。
図形を覚えて、数字のヒントから答えを導き出し撃ち抜く。
記憶力と論理力を使った新感覚のパズルでの戦闘をお楽しみいただけます。

【日本語のフルボイス】

メインストーリーは日本語のフルボイスです。
実力派声優達の入魂の演技によって迫真のストーリーを体験ください。
●レイン・クライマー（安西 麻里那）
●ナラ・フレイシス（燈咲 唯羽）
●グレイ（アサイ ユウスケ）
●メーガン・アップル（蠍媛）
●ジェイソン・リーバーマン（コガリョータ）
●エルテア（安西 麻里那）
●ピーター・クロムウェル（羽山 太洋）
●アッシャー・キルベーン（雅之 雅之）
●スーザン・エドワーズ（非公開）

ウイルス対策ソフトが反応する場合があるようですが、Unityとの通信を行っているだけですのでご安心ください。
※遮断しても問題ございません。

name: Inkubus Sukkubus - She of a Thousand Names
detailed_description:
Play as a medieval witch collecting hidden items (CD albums) in a variety of environments. 16 of the albums to be collected are then added to your jukebox, which can then be played whilst you explore further.

Travel through several different environments including ancient temples, a medieval village, spooky woodlands, vampire’s castles, and a storm-lashed coastal outcrop to collect the various CDs and Vinyl releases of the band Inkubus Sukkubus. Sixteen of these albums will be added to your jukebox which you can then play whilst you continue to explore. Your collected items are automatically stored when you leave the game, so that when you return they will be there waiting for you. The Game can also be reset so if you wish you can begin all over again.

Inkubus Sukkubus are a Pagan Gothic Rock Band Who have been touring and releasing albums since they formed in 1989. They have played in Australia, Russia, Mexico, USA, Scandinavia, Most of Europe and the UK, They have to date released 27 albums, and the band are currently playing live and working on new material.

Inkubus Sukkubus formed in the summer of 1989 when Tony McKormack, Candia Ridley and Adam Henderson met at college studying graphic design. They shared an interest in paganism, witchcraft and vampirism as well as making original music from an early age, and so the type of band that was to emerge from the joining of forces was, quite naturally, an expression of this. Initially the band was called Incubus Succubus. The original aim of the band was (as it still is today) to be the vehicle in which the celebration of the Pagan experience could be conveyed.

name: Montaro 2
detailed_description:
Montaro 2 is a stealth-puzzle game where you are a clever doggo, navigating through various locations such as shopping streets, residential areas, schools, stations, and public swimming pools to complete sneaky missions and steal interesting items.
Sneak into different scenes, use the environment and props to hide from store clerks, and accomplish mission objectives.

Featuring:

  • Cute Shiba Inu
  • Busy humans
  • Underwear
  • Woof!

name: Soulvester VS Lil' Beezey
detailed_description:
Lil' Beezey Is Trying to Take Over Winkletown!


As Soulvester, you must fight off Lil' Beezey's army of Horrorballs and save Winkletown!

Take on the challenge now in this side scrolling shooter with roguelite elements, inspired by classic arcade games! Initially created in just 14 days for the #NoticeMe game jam 2022!



  • Full HD, lovingly animated 2D Visuals!
  • Fully voice-acted cutscenes and gameplay...get roasted by Lil' Beezey as you close in on him!
  • Random Upgrades & Perks! Levelling up not only makes both you and the enemy stronger; each item gives Soulvester a unique cosmetic upgrade!
  • Full custom soundtrack!
  • Stat tracking! Check how many runs you've made, how many times you have beaten Lil' Beezey, and how many Horrorballs you have mercilessly K.O'd.
  • Super accessible! Hit the arcade with only a two-button mouse required to play, or use your favourite controller!
  • Hours of fun at a pocket money price-point, all while supporting independent creators!



  • Steam Achievements!
  • Controller Support with on-the-fly-switching!
  • Additional Horrorball Skins!
  • New 'Elite' Horrorball enemy!
  • New Reticule graphics to choose from!
  • Quality of life fixes and general updates!
  • Steam Deck controller layout for perfect portable Horrorball slaying!

short_description: Show Lil' Beezey who the boss of Winkletown is in this addictive and fast paced 2D action roguelite! Created from scratch in only 14 days and nominated for GDWC Game Jam GOTY, Soulvester comes to Steam for the first time, now with controller support and achievements!
reviews:
“Soulvester is an exceptionally fun scrolling shooter. Fast-paced action, great sense of humour, tons of polish.”
CSH Picone

“THE BEST ROGUELIKE GAME OF 2023”
Indie Game Lovers

“Simple, fast, polished, and addicting shmup roguelike. Really dig the artstyle. Extremely chaotic by endgame, you'll feel pretty OP too. Also, the sound effects are very satisfying. Thumb way up!”
Cool Indies

name: Sinking Simulator: Legacy
detailed_description:
The original Sinking Simulator from 2013 now on Steam!
For all fans of Sandbox focused on Chaos and Destruction!

Ever wanted to sink the Titanic? or perhaps Destroy the Eiffel Tower? What about flooding buildings?
All of this is possible through soft body physics interaction generated by your own PNG images.

Simply follow the color palette provided with the game and let your artistic side take over!
The materials are defined by a Json file which you can modify to add your own!
This legacy edition contain 4 versions of the game, all available through the Beta Tab.

This steam release is meant for those who are unable to run the most recent Sinking Simulator and wishes to have a similar albeit downscaled experience.
This is also meant as a way to help preserve the game to ensure it remains available for as long as possible.

While this version of the game is no longer in active development, the funds generated by the sales will help toward future projects

name: The Witch, Wife, & the Wish
detailed_description:
Once upon a time, there was a witch who lived in the middle of a forest. A small village was right outside the forest where the witch resided, and the villagers were very fearful of this wicked sorceress. It was said that the witch would curse any villager who dared venturing near her cottage, so no one dared coming close to the witch to confirm their superstitions. Rumors said that even the witch was cursed herself, but the witch had long forgotten what spell had been cast, if any, that would cause such rumor and gossip. Even so, the witch and the villagers continued living their lives as distant neighbors, until one day a brave young man from the village came to ask a favor of the witch, for his ailing wife.

Features

  • 2 Beautifully illustrated CGs
  • 1 Ending
  • Platform : PC/Online
  • Rated : E10+

name: Blazing Ace Demo
detailed_description:
About Blazing Ace

“I want to be stronger…”

Summer bootcamp has begun!!! Let’s make your dream come true!
Beast Fella Foundation (BFF), an organization which monitors martial arts competitions among beastmen, has sent you an invitation letter. An unforgettable summer memory ensues.

Fight all the problems along with your teammates


  • Chikara
Cheerful powerhouse of the Judo club who is always willing to solve (and create) problems, especially those that make your heart skipping a beat.

  • Arato
Advisor coach of the Judo club, who can certainly guide you into great career paths from his extensive experience, although he might need some guidance about his love life.

  • Shirogami
Junior champion of beastmen fights. Your childhood friend who shares the same dreams with you. Not a person who is good with words. Strong when becoming an ally, but even stronger when you are his enemy (!?)

  • Taiyo
Shirogami’s best friend. Kind, warm, and super approachable. Another BFF participant who is always seen tagging along with Shirogami. What kind of strength does his small body hide?

Train hard. Sleep hard. And eat good food!!

Begin the legend of you and your friends!

features

  • Visual Novel filled with sweat and dreams of young men. Appropriate for both kids and adults alike.
  • Intense fighting scenes using digital arts
  • Martial arts dark secrets!?
  • Multiple endings included.

name: Delusion Out of Space
detailed_description:
Delusion Out of Space is a first-person adventure sci-fi game with shooter elements that features an immersive storyline and an amazingly original atmosphere.

After an emergency, you wake up on an alien spaceship and discover that most of the crew has perished. The ship is severely damaged, so your first task is to repair the basic life support systems. But it will not be that easy, as a mysterious entity has unexpectedly appeared in the neural network of the ship...



Immerse yourself in a unique world filled with mystical phenomena and supernatural technologies! But be careful: you will have to accept new rules and challenges of the otherworld, and the ship is your only home.

GAMEPLAY

  • Explore the huge terraformer of the aliens. Every step is a new mystery.
  • Solve puzzles to get access to new areas of the ship and occult devices needed to achieve your goal.
  • Communicate with other characters that may help or hinder you in this dangerous world.
  • Fight unfriendly crew members and laboratory-created creatures.
  • Find and use weapons and other devices that may help you defeat enemies and increase your chances of survival.

CURRENT STAGE

Delusion Out of Space is being at the early stage of development. A demo version of the game has been developed, which includes all the basic technical aspects and a demonstration of the atmosphere. The active development process of the full game is currently underway, so the final version may be visually different from the screenshots. We believe wholeheartedly in our efforts, and we are doing everything we can to create an incredible breath-holding game!

name: EvoWars: New Era
detailed_description:
DISCORD


About the Game

FIGHT! KILL! EVOLVE!


The rules are simple: collect orbs and kill opponents to get experience points and evolve into a greater warrior. Every hit by a weapon means defeat - no health points, no shields, no miraculous dodges. Therefore, you must always stay sharp!


Start as a primitive Caveman and evolve through dozens of fascinating evolutions: Viking, Knight, Spartan, Cyborg, Thor, Archangel, Minotaur, Dragon Slayer and many more for you to discover. Be the largest in the arena by the end of a match to earn victory!

EvoWars: New Era is simple in its concept but hard to master.

Main Features:

  • Simple rules - challenging fights,
  • Over 35 evolutions (and more to come),
  • 10 minute long online FFA matches with up to 60 players,
  • Surprising game-changing events,
  • Play either solo or challenge your friends,
  • NO pay to win - only your skill matters

name: The Lonely Hacker
detailed_description:
Turn your phone into the best digital weapon and become a true master of technology. You will hack everything you can imagine within an enormous open world and coordinate 100% realistic attacks with the tools we have designed exclusively for you.

Live a customized and different adventure each time you submerge into the cybercrime world. You will learn every method used by modern hackers and dominate all the attack vectors, from the most common up to the most exclusive ones, known only by security experts and the most dangerous cybercriminals.

The knowledge you obtain through the detailed tutorial that will teach you how to use each one of the tools available will also serve you in real-life to better understand the digital world we live in. You will be more aware of the dangers lurking behind each corner in the labyrinth that is the internet and you will feel like a true hacker.

Features:

- Big open world with all the real countries to travel to and hack every device possible!

- Realistic hacking software and hardware!

- Mini-games for when you get tired of hacking!

name: Contraption Maker Demo
detailed_description:
Play over 200 official puzzles and over 1,000 user created puzzles in the Workshop.


Create your own Cheese Factory or anything else that you can imagine.


You can make large elaborate endless machines.


Build your own ingenious contraptions and puzzles and share them.


Use the many characters that interact in amusing ways.



Make your own games with the built-in Javascript Editor using Contraption Maker's physics and parts.


Play online to build contraptions together with up to 8 players in the Maker Lab.

short_description: Contraption Maker is an open-ended sandbox puzzle game from the designer and programmer of The Incredible Machine. Play or build elaborate contraptions with hamster motors, trampolines, alligators, wrecking balls, zombies, gears, lasers, ghosts, and over 100 more parts
reviews:
“It's an amazing game and I love it to pieces”
Markiplier

“Contraption Maker is from the makers of that genre-defining classic, and it's already a recognisable heir to the throne...It's already worth your time and money.”
PC Gamer

“It is a from-the-ground-up modernization, with enough familiar elements to instantly excite old fans of The Incredible Machine and enough modern touches to fuel the imaginations of gamers who have never touched the original.”
Gaming Trend

name: Outlaw Kingdom
detailed_description:
Outlaw Kingdom is an accessible, yet-deep and content-rich Strategy, Auto Battle, Roguelite Game. Take control of your outlaws, rob, steal and fight your way to riches. Build up your camp and recruit more outlaws so you can take over the Kingdom.

Commander

A new run starts with choosing your commander, each with their own unique units, abilities and passive powers.

Build Your Camp

Upgrade your camp and build new buildings to get access to new units and building functionality.

Overworld

On the overland map you choose ambush location, and can scout for eney troop strength. Each day new ambush opportunities became available.

Plane Your Ambush

Strategically place your units and add them to different attack groups.

Battle

Wait for the right moment to strike and call the different attack groups to see your masterful plan play out.

Conquer The Castle

On the 10th day you attack the castle with all your troops, in an all or nothing battle for the Outlaw Kingdom.

name: Chrono Crystal
detailed_description:
Welcome to the mysterious continent of Falantero! We have been waiting for you for a long time.
As the power of darkness invades, the evil and greedy monsters and evil people start to move. The demon king who brought great calamity a thousand years ago is about to awaken again. He will break the seal and lead his army to sack everything ......

The armies are waiting for your command! Before the Chrono Crystal unleashes its powerful ability, you need to freely plan tactics within the countdown and use uniquely stylized defense towers to defeat the enemies attempting to destroy the Chrono Crystal, until the very last moment.

You will travel with the human prince through several distinctive regions and meet with regional leaders to find ways to cooperate. The various heroes you meet along the way will bring their unique talents to bear. Ultimately, you will work together to defeat the Demon King and find the truth behind this terrifying conspiracy.

Features

- Classic style strategic tower defense.
- Battle in many special areas such as forest, kingdom, sacred tree, mine, snow realm and volcano.
- 18 towers with different abilities and unique skill effects.
- 90+ different enemies.
- 6 heroes with unique skills that can move freely around the field.
- Many challenging main levels.
- 2 additional challenging difficulty modes are available: HARD and HELL.
- 40+ unlockable steam achievements.

Contact us

We are always happy to receive feedback and comments from our players!
Whether you want to leave feedback or report bugs, please keep in touch with us through our email address.

Build your towers, upgrade your heroes, and defend your crystal against waves of enemies—until the countdown timer runs out!

name: Magic City Detective: Rage Under Moon DLC
detailed_description:
Experience the life of a Magic City detective and become a real expert in the world of magical creatures! Additional locations with a dark, mysterious atmosphere, tricky riddles and numerous hidden objects await you in the bright city of Paris! You will have to not only reveal the truth about Animages disappearance, but learn more about their difficult life. Can a person contain both a human and a beast? Explore an ancient legend, learn how to brew a magical elixir, and make decisions that affect not only the investigation, but also other lives!

The fantasy adventure continues with the additional content "Magic City Detective: Rage Under Moon DLC" full of dangerous werewolfs, dark magic experiments and unexpected plot twists. Unlock new achievements after completing all quests!

✨ MAKE THE LUNAR ELIXIR!
Werewolves need your help more than ever! Gather all the ingredients playing mini-games and learn how to make the lunar elixir.

✨ FIND THE MAGIC HAT!
Explore the enchanting shady alleys and find your companion's magical hat! In return, you will learn some useful information.

✨ LEARN THE ANCIENT LEGEND!
Explore the legend of the Heart of the Beast, through which you will learn more about animages!

name: Home Designer Makeover Blast
detailed_description:
Design from scratch
Design from scratch and use a blueprint to match all of your clients’ desires. Create beautiful living rooms, bedrooms and kitchens according to their requests and watch as they ooh and aah over your work!


Play blast levels
Keep your mind active and exercise it by playing blast levels. Not only can you have fun, but also win coins for house decorations and progress through the game.


Choose the fitting furniture
When it comes to selecting furniture for your clients’ home, take the time to explore multiple designs and see which fits best with their style. With the ability to compare three different designs side-by-side you can make sure that the furniture you choose is exactly what you envisioned.


Follow the story
When creating designs, it's important to pay attention to your clients' stories. For example, Luke wants something comfortable and easy going. For Ben and Debbie, they're looking to create a cozy family nest. Anna's aim is to make her place inviting for her friends - she's a singer, songwriter, model, and playwright!

name: Bingo Beavers - Board game & Design
detailed_description:
Play Bingo:
Bingo is a timeless classic, and we've given it a modern twist that you won't want to miss! Play with two or four cards at once and customize your experience with male or female voiceovers and adjustable call speeds. With a variety of skill levels and endless opportunities for fun, you'll never want to stop shouting BINGO!.


Build a Beaver Mansion:
Join the industrious beavers and build them a cozy home that's perfect for any season! Customize every corner of their mansion with unique furniture and decorations, and watch as the beavers enjoy their new home. Whether you're a fan of interior design or simply want to have some fun, this game is guaranteed to put a smile on your face.


Collect Puzzles:
Solve puzzles and unlock new daubers in this exciting bingo adventure! Each level offers a new challenge as you hunt for elusive puzzle pieces and assemble stunning pictures.

name: Greymarsh
detailed_description:
Greymarsh is a text-based adventure game. RPG-style battle and inventory management are combined with a branching story. Atmosphere and dialog are important aspects. You will have to immerse yourself in the story to have a chance to succeed.

During the course of the game, you will get intimately acquainted with the bustling city of Greymarsh, with its inhabitants and locations. Built upon the remnants of an older, more advanced civilisation, it offers mysteries and challenges. There are abandoned ruins, arenas where you can fight for money, and streets where shady characters are waiting to trick you.

name: despelote
detailed_description:
Despelote is a soccer game about people. Get immersed in the streets and parks of Quito through the eyes and ears of eight year old Julián. Dribble, pass and shoot your soccer ball around town, and see what happens when you kick it someone's way. Feel the city change as Ecuador comes closer than ever to qualifying for the World Cup.

Features:

  • A bittersweet and sometimes dreamy semi-autobiographical tale of youth.
  • Explore a dense town space at your leisure, full of activities, interactions, and mischief to get up to.
  • A physics-based soccer ball that feels good to kick around in a first-person perspective.
  • A vibrant world full of characters that have funny, and genuine conversations.
  • Photos and audio recorded on location in Ecuador are used to create a strong sense of place.

name: Blazing Ace
detailed_description:
About Blazing Ace

“I want to be stronger…”

Summer bootcamp has begun!!! Let’s make your dream come true!
Beast Fella Foundation (BFF), an organization which monitors martial arts competitions among beastmen, has sent you an invitation letter. An unforgettable summer memory ensues.

Fight all the problems along with your teammates


  • Chikara
Cheerful powerhouse of the Judo club who is always willing to solve (and create) problems, especially those that make your heart skipping a beat.

  • Arato
Advisor coach of the Judo club, who can certainly guide you into great career paths from his extensive experience, although he might need some guidance about his love life.

  • Shirogami
Junior champion of beastmen fights. Your childhood friend who shares the same dreams with you. Not a person who is good with words. Strong when becoming an ally, but even stronger when you are his enemy (!?)

  • Taiyo
Shirogami’s best friend. Kind, warm, and super approachable. Another BFF participant who is always seen tagging along with Shirogami. What kind of strength does his small body hide?

Train hard. Sleep hard. And eat good food!!

Begin the legend of you and your friends!

features

  • Visual Novel filled with sweat and dreams of young men. Appropriate for both kids and adults alike.
  • Intense fighting scenes using digital arts
  • Martial arts dark secrets!?
  • Multiple endings included.

name: Calling Home
detailed_description:
CALLING HOME IS IN PRE-ALPHA SO EVERYTHING IS STILL SUBJECT TO CHANGE!

Calling Home is an exciting sci-fi simulation resource management game that draws heavily from games in the factory-building and exploration genres, providing a thrilling mix of building your base, researching, factory management, puzzle solving, exploration, and resource gathering.

DISCOVER A NEW ALIEN PLANET EVERY TIME

Experience stunning flora and fauna as well as many mysterious secrets throughout the vastness of space! With procedural generated planets, your experience will differ every time, offering new biomes, environments and other discoveries with every playthrough.

COMBINE THE BEST OF FIRST PERSON ADVENTURE & BIRDS EYE VIEW STRATEGY

Calling Home merges first person exploration with bird's eye view resource management to create a unique experience for players to get the best out of both goals - exploring & building!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR OWN BASE AND BUILD FACTORIES

Customize and automate your base to suit your tastes and to help achieve your goals! Build factories, research technology and construct facilities to optimize your resource gathering and production in various ways, not only to survive, but also to find your way back home.

EXPERIENCE AN UNDISCOVERED STORY

Outside of your base's safety, there is much to explore. Unearth lost relics and expand the planet's history in your own way.

name: Causeway Demo
detailed_description:
In the year 2056, humanity relies on AI systems
to maintain infrastructure in all areas of society.

A breach in the system leads to the disconnect
of highway and navigation systems, and it is
the player’s job to take over and build new roads.

Face new challenges at every
level with more areas needing to be connected,
obstacles to avoid, and power systems to manage.

This demo will let you play 7 levels!

name: Aya: The Tale of Tails
detailed_description:
Aya: The Tale of Tales is a beautiful third-person exploration game where a life story ends and another one is about to begin.



Once upon a time...

On a cold, yet enchanted winter night, after a recent family loss, a young girl gets read a storybook by her father and enters its ancient, magical world.



You write your own story

Meet and play the role of Aya's new friend - a mystical white wolf and together explore the mysterious faraway lands and their hidden tales. Begin a high-spirited journey, make new friends, save lives and discover your true selves in the mysterious land of tales.

Key Features

  • For fans of adventure story driven games like Journey, Firewatch and Stray.
  • A relatively short game focused on story with some light objectives, puzzle solving and platforming.
  • An emotional soundtrack, with an even more emotional story made by a solo indie developer.
  • Each update will unfold a new chapter with new lands and stories to discover.
  • Supports a fan-translation system for subtitles (see Steam forums for details).

name: Scraponauts
detailed_description:
A sandbox for those who could loose track of time making their own vehicles for hours. Inspired by games such as Kerbal Space Program, Cosmoteer and Space Engineers.




  • Sandbox: Build your own unique spaceplane to explore procedurally generated islands or space, finding and collecting scrap, discovering new parts and upgrading your ship to larger sizes as you progress.
  • Unique parts: Discover and experiment with countless unique parts such as; engine types like electric, hydrogen, VTOL and more to alter the way the plane flies and lands. Unique wings, landing gear, air brakes, power generation tech, weapons to mine scrap, automation tech and more.




  • Flight: Experience relaxing but unique 2D flight physics designed to not punish asymmetric building, but still provide a thoroughly modifiable flight model depending on your choices as you build your spaceplane.

  • Flight: Experience relaxing but unique 2D flight physics designed to not punish asymmetric building, but still provide a thoroughly modifiable flight model depending on your choices as you build your spaceplane.
short_description: You are a Scraponaut, create your own spaceplane with unique parts each affecting the way your plane behaves. Collect scrap while exploring procedurally generated islands, unlock and discover unique new parts to upgrade your spaceplane.
