name: Orc Covenant Demo
detailed_description:
Play the Free Demo of Orc Covenant! NSFW!

Gorgeously illustrated with hundreds of images, Orc Covenant is a sextacular romp into a fantasy realm full of sultry elves and beefy well-endowed orcs!



The sorcerer elf Xareth should be prince of Zellerwind, but his father was usurped by King Trum'kel, an inept conman. Xareth now seeks help from the orc tribe to take back his throne.

A NSFW visual novel with four love interests to choose from! Will Xareth regain his throne and fall in love? Or do the orcs have other plans for Zellerwind?













The Orc Covenant Visual Novel Contains:

  • Orc/Elf
  • Orc/Orc
  • Elf/Orc
  • And Orc/Elf/Orc!
  • Four Love Interests
  • 20 Hours of Game Play!
  • Hundreds of Color and Black and White Images!
  • A Hard-Hitting Music Sound Track!
  • Dozens of Possible Endings!
  • Deep and Compelling Storylines in Every Route!

name: Beat bricks
detailed_description:
This game is very interesting, using the rebound principle of objects to play the game. The new form of play is particularly interesting. Players can master their rebound movement trajectory based on their physical knowledge or life experience, better operation and performance, and achieve the game goals. The sense of game operation skills is stronger, and it will be more interesting!

Game Description

1. The game screen is simple, with colored rings of various colors interlaced together, which is still quite beautiful.

2. Control the bounce of small balls and choose a good angle so that these balls can be hit.

3. The movement of the ball is not irregular, and various bounces actually follow some physical principles, making it easy to control.

name: Vertex Rush
detailed_description:
Vertex Rush - A Fast-Paced Climbing Adventure!

Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping climbing adventure with Vertex Rush! In this addictive game, you'll need to guide your character up a tower while collecting diamonds along the way. But be warned - the blocks below disappear quickly, and one wrong move could send you plummeting to your doom!

To play, simply use the left and right arrow keys to climb up the tower. The faster you climb, the more points you'll earn - but be careful not to move too quickly and miss the diamonds. Each diamond you collect adds to your score

With its simple yet challenging gameplay, Vertex Rush is the perfect game for anyone who loves a good challenge. So what are you waiting for? Download Vertex Rush now and start your climb to the top!

Features:

Fast-paced climbing gameplay
Collect diamonds for extra points
Avoid disappearing blocks to stay alive
Simple controls make it easy to play, but difficult to master

Features:

Fast-paced climbing gameplay
Collect diamonds for extra points
Avoid disappearing blocks to stay alive
Simple controls make it easy to play, but difficult to master
short_description: Vertex Rush - A Fast-Paced Climbing Adventure!

name: [Chilla's Art] Night Security | 夜間警備
detailed_description:
Night Security | 夜間警備 is a Japanese psychological horror game about night security.

Key Features:

Immersive experience: An atmospheric, believable environment intensifies the horror experience.

VHS film aesthetic: VHS aesthetic emulates the look and feel of CRT screens, including phosphor screen trail and bleeding, VHS tape noise, interlacing, and jitter in the analog video signal adding extra immersion to the horror experience.

Gameplay: This game is primarily a "walking simulator" genre with puzzle-solving elements.

Psychological horror: The game will drive you insane.

Japanese Theme: Environment art inspired by Japanese horror films.

name: ParkerSpace
detailed_description:
ParkerSpace is a unique, spatial memory-based exploration and organization game that allows you to solve problems and memorize sequences effectively. By creating an immersive, 3D environment filled with memorable landmarks, you can easily store and retrieve information that is important to you.

In ParkerSpace, you will navigate a procedurally generated world with infinite map and storage capacity, where traditional sorting methods like chronological or alphabetical are replaced by intuitive landmarks and traversal. This method helps you to memorize and categorize vast amounts of data with ease.

key Features


  • Spatial Memory-based Gameplay: Utilize your natural spatial memory abilities to organize and memorize information in a more intuitive way.

  • Procedurally Generated World: Explore an ever-changing environment that adapts to your needs and preferences.

  • Infinite Map and Storage: Store and categorize as much data as you need with no limitations.

  • Quick-Loading Algorithms: Experience seamless loading and interaction with your stored data.

  • Frictionless Clipboard Interaction: Easily import and export information between ParkerSpace and other applications.

  • Immersive 3D Environment: Visualize all your files in 3D, with no media compromises.

ParkerSpace, developed by Gower Notch, offers a unique and innovative approach to data organization and problem-solving. Get ready to experience a game like no other and revolutionize the way you interact with your digital files.

What to Expect


1. Download Parker Space

2. Move With the Wasd Keys, Point With Your Mouse

3. Gather information from elsewhere on your computer

4. Place It and Move Around Within the Game World

5. Use portals and context-switching to create a real-life latent space designed for human understanding

name: 星际战线
detailed_description:
----------------------------------【游戏简介】----------------------------------


【星际战线】是一款以星际科幻为主题的SLG游戏，这里是帝国的坟场，无数尖端科技和顶级战舰正静静的躺在星河的每个角落，那横跨无数时空和光年的帝国遗产在这一刻又会掀起宇宙间怎样的波澜？

您将化身一名舰队指挥官，投身联邦并立志从邪恶的敌人手中解放银河系。在科技高度发达的未来世界里，驾驶最先进的太空战舰驰骋在浩瀚宇宙中，采集资源，击败海盗，从狡猾的星际商人换取自身所需。和盟友一起在星系间排兵布阵，征服那一座座宏伟的星系核心，收复那一颗颗价值连城的殖民星球，建立起属于自己的星际势力！

----------------------------------【游戏特色】----------------------------------


【真实星空，百变天体】
复杂星空战斗不断，巧妙利用宇宙陷阱击溃敌人收复星球！

【尖端战舰，划破星空】
新型战舰列装成功，装载能源立刻启航前往银河系最深处！

【传奇英雄，留名时空】
绝处逢生成就威名，立刻招募传奇舰长与您一起留名宇宙！

【征服星系，共建势力】
万舰齐发携手前进，组建军团攻下星区核心建立你的势力！

name: Tribal Legends
detailed_description:
Welcome to Tribal Legends, an epic 2D cartoon-style shooter in which you play as a young tribal archer. Defend your lands with your trusty bow and arrows against waves of vicious alien enemies. The difficulty increases as the game progresses, and you must strategize carefully, targeting different body parts of your enemies to gain an advantage in combat.

But it's not just about defeating your enemies - it's about restoring the world to its former glory. As you protect your lands, you'll see the environment flourish again. After each victory, you will get coins which you can use in the store to unlock new characters.

With its gorgeous hand-drawn graphics, intuitive gameplay and engaging storyline, Tribal Legends is sure to provide hours of fun and excitement. What are you waiting for? Grab your bow and arrow, let's defend our land together!

name: Somnus
detailed_description:
Somnus is an enthralling dungeon crawler game that takes players on a perilous adventure through a vast underground maze. The game features an ancient evil that poisons life deep underground, and players must embark on a quest to destroy this evil force.

As players venture through the game's numerous levels, they will encounter various enemies and obstacles that they must overcome to progress deeper into the maze. From intricate mazes to challenging boss battles, Somnus is designed to offer players a thrilling and difficult experience that will keep them entertained for hours.

One of the unique features of Somnus is the permadeath feature, which means that if players die, they must start all over again. This feature adds an extra layer of difficulty to the game and encourages players to be strategic and cautious in their approach.

Another key feature of Somnus is its roguelike elements, where the layout of the dungeon and items are randomized each time players play the game. This means that players will never have the same experience twice, keeping the game fresh and exciting even after multiple playthroughs.

Other key features of Somnus include a variety of weapons, equipment, and upgrades to help players on their journey, secret rooms and hidden treasures to discover, an engaging storyline and lore, and an immersive soundtrack and sound effects that enhance the overall gaming experience.

In conclusion, Somnus is a must-play game for fans of dungeon crawler and action games who crave a challenging and immersive experience. With its unique features and engaging gameplay, Somnus promises hours of fun and excitement for players of all skill levels.

Key features:

  • Cool pixel art
  • Various enemies and obstacles
  • Permadeath feature
  • Roguelike elements
  • Array of weapons, equipment, and upgrades
  • Secret rooms and hidden treasures
  • Engaging storyline and lore
  • Immersive soundtrack and sound effects

name: Pirate Skeleton Treasure (shooting series - chapter 1)
detailed_description:
"When I was a child, my great-grandmother used to tell me legendary stories of distant worlds, full of aliens, pirates, ghosts, monsters but above all ... TREASURES.
One day my great grandmother disappeared leaving me a note where she said that all her stories were real. Thus began my life as a treasure hunter.
This is the story of the treasure of pirate skeletons.
But I was already busy with another treasure, so I sent my little brother...."
There are 4 levels to pass: Governor's House, Fort Port Royale, Bandits Island and Pirate's Cove.
After these, you will be able to access the treasure island of pirate skeletons. Gameplay is easy and fast; your player will move on pre-established routes,
you will have to look around and shoot at the right targets and score as many points as possible.
At each level you will be able to activate (once only) a slowdown of 5 seconds which will help you in your action.
In the end, if you have conquered the treasure, you will be able to enter the top 20 ranking.
The philosophy of "Pirate Skeleton Treasure" is to have a fast game, which ends in an acceptable time, replayable many times to improve one's score, making the life of the game longer than the average; this is the first in a series of similar games set in different environments and eras

name: Chronicles Of Errodean Demo
detailed_description:
Welcome to the world of Errodean, an immersive medieval RPG that takes you on a journey through a mystical land filled with dangerous creatures and magical relics. With stunning graphics and an engaging storyline.

As a lone adventurer, you are tasked with uncovering the secrets of three ancient relics that have been hidden in different parts of the land. The Heart of Fire, the Eye of the Storm, and the Soul of the Earth are powerful artifacts that have been lost for centuries, and it's up to you to find them.

Explore dense forests, treacherous caves, and ancient ruins in your quest for these relics. Battle fierce monsters and rival treasure hunters as you uncover clues and secrets along the way. With a vast magical world to explore, there's always something new to discover in Errodean.

Craft your own weapons and armor, learn powerful spells, and upgrade your abilities as you progress through the game. Customize your character to fit your play style and become the ultimate hero in this epic adventure.

With challenging quests and a rich, immersive world to explore.

Are You Ready to Embark On This Epic Quest?

name: Linkito Demo
detailed_description:
Welcome to Linkito, the creative puzzle game that will keep you entertained for hours! In this game, you'll be tasked with connecting various blocks to solve puzzles and progress through the levels. But the fun doesn't stop there - you can also create your own puzzles and share them with other players.

Think outside the box and use your creativity to link, solve, and create endless puzzles. With a sandbox-style game design, the possibilities are endless. You'll start as a repairman fixing electronic machines, but as you progress through the levels, you'll take on new roles such as decoding secret codes, robotics, and more.

As you play through Linkito, you'll be challenged to use your problem-solving skills in new and creative ways. The game offers multiple ways to solve each puzzle, so you'll never get stuck. You'll be amazed at how much fun you can have connecting blocks and seeing what you can create.

And the best part? You can share your creations with other players from around the world. You'll never run out of new and exciting puzzles to play. So, join the Linkito community today and let your creativity soar!

Are you ready to think, link, and create endless puzzles? Wishlist Linkito now and start your journey!

Join the Community

Features

  • Build your own solution : open puzzles
  • Discover a story
  • Complete Modular & Generic System
  • A mix between sandbox, puzzles & visual programming
  • Create & Publish your own puzzles easily
  • Test puzzles from community with ingame browser
  • Connect the game with others system (Twitch, Arduino, OSC, etc.)

name: The Secret Door Demo
detailed_description:
You are a newly hired paranormal investigator. You've just completed your first successful rescue mission. You saved a woman from a demon who entered her subconcious and tried to drive her to insanity. As you return home you begin to notice weird things happening. Your neighbor from the apartment across is obsesively looking at you. Lamps start to flicker, alarm randomly goes off, telephone rings but no one is on the other line.

Welcome to "The Secret Door". The demon did not go away. It just decided to migrate in your subconcious. You need to do everything to prevent the demon from entering your soul. Shake wires, stop alarms, reject phone calls and don't open the door to anyone. If you rationalize the paranormal, you will be driven to insanity.

DEMO
In The Secret Door Free Demo you get to play the very first night, where you realize that you are a victim of possession and have to survive from 12 a.m. to 6 a.m. Experience 1/7th of a truly demonic experience and discover secrets that are darker than the night.

Approx. Playtime: 20-25 min.

name: Fantasy Grounds - Rultmoork
detailed_description:
"

Rultmoork

As Above, So Below
Deep in the Baevonian Mountains stands a monolithic spire of stone, peppered with ancient ruins, and mostly forgotten.
The spire contains a temple complex rich in history and steeped in the mysteries of the past, untouched for a millennium, but it is not without its dangers, for ancient evil stagnates within.
This is

Rultmoork , where, according to legend, the very land died to the sound of a single falling tear. 


Rultmoork is a deluxe adventure about duality. It is challenging, deadly, and intended for 4-6 characters of levels 5-7. 
  • The adventure marks Jonathan G. Nelson's return to adventure writing after his critically acclaimed success

    Rise of the Drow: Collector's Edition
    .
  • Playstyles of ruin exploration, investigation, and dungeon delving


  • Wasteland Archaeology:
    Explore ancient ruins, marvel at murals, decipher a lost language, and piece together clues


  • Visions of the Past:
    Live through horrors of millennia past in a roleplaying-rich investigation


  • Challenging Dungeon:
    Test your mettle against an interactive and dynamic dungeon


  • New Mechanic:
    Flow / Stagnation! Two different modes for monsters and magic items


  • Hardcore Mode:
    Make a difficult adventure truly unforgiving and deadly
  • Brutal, unique monsters that require both brains & brawn to defeat
  • Three nightmarish bosses to challenge even the most experienced groups
  • Logical environments reward players for paying attention and engaging with the wonders of Rultmoork
  • Extensive guidelines and "At a Glance" sections to keep your game running smoothly


  • Player Handouts:
    Show what the heroes see, rather than just describing it  
"

name: Dickland: Quest
detailed_description:
Dickland: Quest is an exciting and hilarious 2D and 3D visual hybrid quest. The game has many different puzzles, mini games and puzzles that you will have to solve. The main feature is the environment, namely an amazing penisworld with its corresponding inhabitants.

Features of the game:
- Unusual and original game world with its inhabitants, sounds and environment.
- Puzzles of varying difficulty. For example, from the usual search for keys to tasks with buckets of water.
- Achievements that you can get for your attentiveness and diligence.
The backstory:
You are a green-eyed dick who has been trapped in a dungeon by some unknown means. You have to escape from the dungeon, at the expense of your wit, cleverness, and attentiveness. After all, on the way you will have various challenges to overcome.

name: PACTUM + EPISODE 1
detailed_description:
WELCOME BACK.

ARE YOU BORED ?
ENTER THIS GAME TO FOLLOW THREE FRIENDS EXPLORING AN ABANDONED HOUSE.
YOU WILL HAVE TO CHANCE TO MEET ALL THREE OF THEM.

ZOE, THE GIRL OF THE GROUP, SHE IS A FOLLOWER AND YEARNS FOR ROMANCE.
LUKE, THE LEADER, HE IS ZOE’S BEST FRIEND AND NEVER STOPS TAKING HER ON FUN ADVENTURES.
AND ALEX, THEIR TAG-ALONG MEMBER WHO FOUND HIMSELF DRAGGED IN…

COMPLETING ALL ROUTES STRONGLY ENCOURAGED.
SERIOUSLY, IF YOU DON’T DO IT… YOU MIGHT JUST HAVE ONE BAD EXPERIENCE.
YOU WOULDN'T WANT THAT TO HAPPEN, WOULD YOU ?
GOOD LUCK.


Features and Content:
⦁ In this visual novel, you get meet and play three different characters.
⦁ Learn more about their relationships and the story by playing different routes !
⦁ Discover the hidden thoughts of each character by playing through first-person.
⦁ Make different choices to alter dialogues, and the story !
⦁ Find all the hidden footage in PACTUM, to try and retrace... Complementary content !
⦁ You might meet an additional character...
⦁ Make the choices the game would want you to pick !

name: DAIR
detailed_description:
A complex fighting game with one attack.


DAIR is a fast-paced, aggressive platform fighter featuring intricate ground and air movement, and a strong, air-only attack.
Carefully designed to teach fundamental skills such as edgeguarding, ledge trapping, and general option coverage, DAIR rewards careful planning to shut your opponent down and restrict their agency. Just don't get reversed.

Features

  • Online play using rollback netcode
  • Near-universal controller support
  • Controller rebinding
  • Wavedashing :)
  • One (1) entire attack
  • Alternate themes
  • Hitbox visualization

name: SpikerManX Demo
detailed_description:
The evil alien lizard Kromatone has returned to try and take over the galaxy! And he’s brought several of his former partners in crime to help him succeed! It’s up to SpikerMan to defeat all the crime bosses and defeat Kromatone himself before he takes over everything!
Take control of SpikerMan and blast your way through 8 levels of jump and shoot gameplay as you try to bring down the galactic criminals and stop the Kromasomes from conquering the galaxy!
Defeat Bosses and gain new weapon abilities to mow down enemies! Find the weak points to the bosses to bring them down faster! When all the bosses are defeated, go after Kromatone and take down his empire once and for all!

name: Slice and Bite
detailed_description:
Play as a pizza delivering vampire in demon infested medieval Italy. Choose your delivery routes and upgrade your magical carriage. Save your family pizzeria from certain doom by slicing your way through levels, defeating challenging boss fights, uncovering secrets and exploring the world.

DELIVER PIZZA

... to hungry demon custumers inspired by medieval Italian folklore with a cartoony twist.


DOUBLE PROTAGONIST ACTION

Slice your way through levels using both your demonic carriage and vampire abilities for unique combat opportunities. Constantly scrolling levels keep you on your toes, always dodging and platforming.


HELP YOUR FAMILY

You dream of the freedom of the road and the exploration of exotic lands, just like your father Count Pappi used to do. The job is even more difficult now that your dad’s nemesis, The Barone, has resurfaced, sending all of his goons your way. Reconnect with your family and meet a cast of silly vampires and demons.


DRIVE AND GUN

The roads are dangerous and full of unsatisfied customers, not to mention the Barone's goons. Sometimes your deliveries will fail. Lucky for you, your family is there to help you acquire temporary and permanent upgrades.

name: Unsung Ballads
detailed_description:
Embark on an exciting adventure of epic proportions inspired by the rich folklore of south-eastern Europe.
In this story-driven RPG deck-builder, take the role of a prince, third in line for the throne, who needs to find his place in a war-torn medieval world.
Find companions to help you overcome adversity, train and equip your party to give yourself a better chance in the ordeals ahead.

A Fresh Spin on the Deck-Building Genre
In Unsung Ballads, your equipment and your training will dictate what cards are available to you, and in what quantity. To illustrate, a novice swordsman will likely only swing the sword with the occasional thrust. A more experienced swordsman will use feints to create openings which they can then exploit with more precise swings or thrusts.
In addition, some character traits will also grant you special cards for certain types of equipment, increase their number, or make them available sooner.

It’s in the Cards
Not all cards are created equal. Some of them represent actions that will be taken by the characters during their turn, while others only need to be retained in hand, for them to be activated when certain conditions are met.

Character Progression
Manage the training of your party to properly prepare them for the trials that await them. Only through hard work combined with battle experience will they progress from novices to masters in their respective areas of expertise.


Your actions in the game will determine how people will remember you. Will they sing heroic ballads in every tavern, or will they whisper stories untold about your infamous exploits? Only time will tell if you become just another unsung ballad.

name: Hotel Renovator - Kawaii Furniture Set
detailed_description:
Invite your guests on the most adorable stay with the Kawaii Furniture set.

Give your hotel that cheerful glow with the Kawaii Furniture set, packed with the cutest 53 items that will make any of your customers' heart melt. With its bright colors and playful patterns, life truly is all sunshine and rainbows!

Chase away your blues as you decorate your rooms with the jolly and heartwarming blend of this set. From lovable cuddly animals to heart-shaped pillows, count on a whole range of new furniture, luminaries and wall decorations to keep your guests’ heads in the clouds as they experience a stay straight out of a daydream. Be a real home design sweetheart and let your disarming personality pop out.

The Kawaii Furniture Set contains the following DLC:

- 2 beds
- 2 chairs
- 2 armchairs
- 2 tables
- 2 dressers
- 2 wardrobes
- 2 coffee tables
- 2 shelves
- 2 sofas
- 2 carpets
- 2 wall lamps
- 2 ceiling lamps
- 2 standing lamps
- 17 standing decorations
- 10 wallpapers

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Flying Circus - Volume II
detailed_description:
It’s been over 100 years since the end of WWI, a conflict that shaped the modern world and killed tens of millions of people. It was an era that saw a new invention, the airplane, become a weapon of war. It also saw devastation like never before all along the vast Western Front in France. Trench warfare, artillery barrages, machine guns nests, and poison gas made ground combat an ugly, nasty affair. But above the brutal meatgrinder there was a ballet of winged machines made largely of canvas and wood, piloted by knights for a new age, who dueled to the death in a most personal way. Flying Circus: Volume II recreates the WWI aerial battlefield on your PC and expands upon the work of Flying Circus: Volume I with a more diverse plane-set. It includes the Western Front map map and a Pilot Career mode.

Flying Circus: Volume II continues our long tradition of bringing WWI aerial warfare to your computer with an explosive plane-set that includes not only fighters, but bombers and recon aircraft, resulting in a more diverse range of missions available to the user. When combined with the existing plane-set from FC1 most of the aircraft that saw combat from 1917 to the end of the war in 1918 are represented.

Realistic Environment and Physics

Flying Circus, just as in all our Great Battles titles, features a realistically modeled combat and flight environment with an advanced physics engine. Aircraft have realistic aerodynamics and are modeled to fly like their real-life counterparts. A detailed damage model along with beautiful cockpits and physiological modelling of pilot's fatigue accumulation after active maneuvering in a dogfight complete the picture. Real pilots tell us that the feeling of flight in the Great Battles series is amazingly accurate.

Several Ways to Play

You can choose several ways to play Battle of Normandy in either single-player or multiplayer modes. Just like all of our other Great Battles titles, Flying Circus takes full advantage of our mission design logic and multiplayer capabilities of the IL-2 Sturmovik simulation engine.

Quick Mission Builder

If you just want to jump into the cockpit and start shooting, we have several dogfights, duels and free flights available in the Quick Mission Builder (QMB). These quick missions are a great way to hone your flying and aerial combat skills before you tackle objective-based single-player missions or intense multiplayer missions. And if you own any other Great Battles title, you can also play quick missions with the Flying Circus aircraft on other maps, not just the included Western Front map.

Advanced Quick Mission Generator

Once you’ve mastered quick mission combat, and you want to fly a more challenging and detailed objective-based mission, but don’t want to learn our Mission Editor, then the Advanced Quick Mission Generator (AQMG) is for you. Simply pick an airfield, aircraft and mission type and a few other parameters and a fully detailed mission will be generated for you. No two missions will be identical guaranteeing hours upon hours of great sorties to fly!

Pilot's Career

Another step forward in complexity is the Career mode: here you can join one of more than 50 historical American, French, British or German squadrons and complete missions day by day, earning awards and rising in rank - after becoming a commanding officer you can direct your subordinates and alter the mission plan. Mission types change and represent the real missions this squadron was performing on this day. The weather changes according to history and squadrons fly rebase missions. You can even can ask to be transferred to another unit or read a newspaper with news articles of the time.

Multiplayer

As with all our Great Battles titles, Flying Circus supports both Dogfight and Co-operative multiplayer missions. These can be created with our Mission Editor or you can download multiplayer missions created by the community. You can host multiplayer missions from the in-game menus or utilize our Dedicated Server (Dserver) application that is included. We do recommend the Dserver for advanced users. Multiplayer is a great challenge for IL-2 Sturmovik pilots and many great friendships have started in our multiplayer community. There are even virtual squadrons you can join!

Community Content Support

As with all IL-2 Sturmovik: Great Battles series titles, Flying Circus supports content created by the community such as skins, missions and campaigns. Flying Circus fans are already creating additional skins and missions for you to download and enjoy. You can download our Photoshop templates and create your own paintjobs.

Flying Circus includes support for Scenario Missions that are custom designed single-player missions built by the team or by members of the community using our powerful Mission Editor. These can be one-offs or several missions not necessarily designed to be a campaign. There are lots of Scenario Missions available for download or create your own using our Mission Editor or a community supplied mission builder application.

Flying Circus includes support for what we call Scripted Campaigns. These are sets of missions that are created either by the Sturmovik team or by members of the IL-2 Sturmovik: Great Battles community using our powerful Mission Editor application. They are scripted in the sense that they are specifically designed and linked together to tell a story or portray a unique period during the war.

Part of a Larger War

Flying Circus - Volume II is part of the IL-2 Great Battles series and can be used both as a standalone product and together with other games in the series – Flying Circus: Volume I, Battle for Stalingrad, Battle for Moscow, Battle of Kuban, Operation Bodenplatte and Battle of Normandy. All together they form a single combat flight simulator of both world wars.

Additional Details

  • Large Western Front map (120,00 sq. km.) with cities, towns, airfields, factories, bridges, farms and the treacherous "No Man's Land".
  • Ten legendary aircraft of the era - Spad 7.C1, Airco DH.4, Sopwith Triplane, Nieuport 28.C1, Breguet 14.B2, Handley Page 0-400, DFW C.V., Fokker D.VIII, Gotha G.V., Pfalz D.XII
  • Numerous field and weapon modifications from the era for each aircraft.
  • 50+ historical squadrons to fly for and much more AI controlled historical squadrons to fly with and against.
  • Numerous types of buildings, hangars, ground vehicles and scenery objects to enhance mission environment.
  • Detailed and precise exterior models of aircraft with 4K skins.
  • Virtual Reality ready with support for major VR headset brands.
  • Full-scale 3D interior of each aircraft that looks amazing in VR - this is especially true for WWI era aircraft which have many wires and braces.
  • Ability for friends to join you and play online as an observer/gunner in properly equipped aircraft.
  • Quick Mission Builder to get you flying and fighting in minutes.
  • Advanced Quick Mission Generator with easy-to-use interface.
  • Pilot Career where you can earn medals and move up in rank.
  • Custom Single-Player Missions support.
  • Scripted Campaign support.
  • Co-Op and Dogfight Multiplayer Modes plus a Dedicated Server option.
  • Realistic ballistics modeling.
  • Realistic gunsight and bombsight visuals and operation.
  • AI that obey the same physics limitations as you.
  • Detailed physics model and performance of aircraft.
  • Detailed damage model.
  • Realistic G-force effects with blackouts and redouts and pilot fatigue.
  • Custom Input Profiles and Keymaps that are assignable to each aircraft.
  • Customizable graphics options.
  • Track recordings of your missions.
  • Custom skins support.
  • Motion-sim platform support.
  • Sim-shaker audio effects support.
  • Tacview compatible.
  • TrackIR support.
  • Powerful Mission Editor (Recommended for Intermediate and Advanced Users).
  • Large, Friendly and Helpful Community!

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Spitfire Mk.XIVe with Teardrop Canopy
detailed_description:
The Spitfire Mk. XIV, which entered service at the end of 1943, was originally built with a “high back” rear fuselage which restricted visibility to the rear of the plane. To rectify this problem, the Mk. XIV with a cut-down rear fuselage and tear-drop canopy began to be developed and built at the end of 1944.

These improved Spitfire Mk. XIVs featured full-span wings and were equipped with 2x .50 cal. machine guns and 2x 20 mm Hispano cannons; they could also be fitted with bomb racks to carry 250 lb. and 500 lb. bombs. The same Griffon engine that powered the original Mk. XIVs also powered this new model. For reconnaissance work, a camera could be fitted behind the canopy; such planes were known as Fighter Reconnaissance Mk. XIVs and were fitted with clipped wingtips as standard.

Spitfire Mk. XIVs with the cut-down rear fuselage and tear-drop canopy started entering service with the Royal Air Force’s 2nd Tactical Air Force in March 1945 and continued in operational service after the end of the war in Europe in May 1945. These improved Mk. XIVs also began to be sent to the South-East Asian Theater in June 1945 but arrived too late to see any combat against the Japanese.

In addition to Quick Mission Builder, Advanced Quick Mission Generator and Multiplayer modes, you can fly it in Career mode during the Battle of Bodenplatte timeframe.



  • Default armament: two 20mm guns "Hispano Mk.II" (150 rounds per gun, 650 rounds per minute) and two 12.7mm machine guns "Browning .50" (250 rounds per gun, 850 rounds per minute).
  • Bombs: 250 lb general purpose bombs "250 lb. G.P." and 500 lb general purpose bomb "500 lb. G.P."
  • Length: 9.9 m
  • Wingspan: 11.21 m
  • Wing surface: 22.48 m²

Armaments and Modifications

  • 150 grade fuel allowing +21 lb boost. Automatic supercharger gear shifting is disabled, stages should be manually switched at 11000ft altitude (20 km/h estimated speed increase at sea level).
  • Two 250 lb G.P. bombs with racks (250 kg weight increase, 22 km/h speed loss, 11 km/h speed loss after drop).
  • 500 lb G.P. bomb with rack (237 kg weight increase, 12 km/h speed loss, 6 km/h speed loss after drop).
  • Replacement of MkII Gyro Gunsight with MkII* Reflector Gunsight.
  • Clipped Wing (4 kg weight decrease).
  • Rear view mirror (1 kg weight increase, 1 km/h speed loss).
  • F.24 photo camera installation behind the cockpit (28 kg weight increase). Clipped wing only.
  • Rounded exhaust pipes.

Skins

  • Standard paint scheme (customizable tactical number).
  • Temperate paint scheme, British India, 1946 (customizable tactical number).
  • J. E. Johnson, awarded the Distinguished Flying Cross (DFC) and Bar, Distinguished Sevice Order (DSO) and Bar, OC of No. 125 Wing, April 1945. Johnson was the Commonwealth top-scorer of WWII (41 confirmed victories) and retired in 1966 as an RAF Air Vice-Marshal.
  • George Clinton Keefer, awarded the Distinguished Flying Cross (DFC) and Bar, Distinguished Sevice Order (DSO), No. 125 Wing Commander, Fassberg, Germany, 1945. He survived the war and died in 1985.
  • Douglas I. Benham, No. 41 Squadron Leader, Eindhoven, Netherlands, Spring 1945.
  • "Lazy Lady". Jim Bernard Prendergast, No. 414 (RCAF) Squadron Leader, Lüneburg, Germany, May 1945.
  • Flight Lieutenant Frederick A. O. Gaze, No. 41 Squardon, Kastrup, Denmark, May 1945.
  • Flying Officer Eric Gray, No. 41 Squadron, Celle, Germany, May 1st, 1945.
  • "Rabbit". No. 443 Squadron RCAF, Uetersen, Germany, January 1946.
  • "Yvonne". No. 416 Squadron RCAF, Uetersen, Germany, January 1946.
  • No. 151 Operational Training Unit, Peshawar or Ambala, British India, 1946.

    Technical details

    Indicated stall speed in flight configuration: 153..173 km/h

    Indicated stall speed in takeoff/landing configuration: 145..164 km/h

    Dive speed limit: 756 km/h
    Maximum load factor: 12.5 G
    Stall angle of attack in flight configuration: 19.0 °
    Stall angle of attack in landing configuration: 16.3 °

    Maximum true air speed at sea level, 2750 RPM, boost +18: 566 km/h
    Maximum true air speed at 4000 m, 2750 RPM, boost +18: 661 km/h
    Maximum true air speed at 8100 m, 2750 RPM, boost +18: 712 km/h

    Service ceiling: 13400 m
    Climb rate at sea level: 23.8 m/s
    Climb rate at 2650 m: 23.5 m/s
    Climb rate at 6750 m: 18.2 m/s

    Maximum performance turn at sea level: 18.1 s, at 270 km/h IAS.
    Maximum performance turn at 3000 m: 21.0 s, at 260 km/h IAS.

    Flight endurance at 3000 m: 1 h 45 m, at 350 km/h IAS.

    Takeoff speed: 170..195 km/h
    Glideslope speed: 180..210 km/h
    Landing speed: 140..160 km/h
    Landing angle: 12.5 °

    Note 1: the data provided is for international standard atmosphere (ISA).
    Note 2: flight performance ranges are given for possible aircraft mass ranges.
    Note 3: maximum speeds, climb rates and turn times are given for standard aircraft mass.
    Note 4: climb rates and turn times are given for 2750 RPM and boost +18.

    Engine:
    Model: Griffon 65
    Maximum power in Take-off mode (2750 RPM, boost +12, low gear) at sea level: 1565 HP
    Maximum power in International power mode (2600 RPM, boost +9, low gear) at 4270 m: 1520 HP
    Maximum power in International power mode (2600 RPM, boost +9, high gear) at 8070 m: 1375 HP
    Maximum power in Emergency Max All Out mode (2750 RPM, boost +18, low gear) at 2134 m: 2063 HP
    Maximum power in Emergency Max All Out mode (2750 RPM, boost +18, high gear) at 6400 m: 1845 HP

    Engine modes:
    Max Cruising power (unlimited time): 2400 RPM, boost +7
    International power (up to 1 hour): 2600 RPM, boost +9
    Emergency Max All Out power (up to 5 minutes): 2750 RPM, boost +18

    Water rated temperature in engine output: 105..115 °C
    Water maximum temperature in engine output: 135 °C
    Oil rated temperature in engine intake: 90 °C
    Oil maximum temperature in engine intake: 105 °C

    Supercharger gear shift altitude: automatic with possibility of manual switch to low gear

    Empty weight: 3322 kg
    Minimum weight (no ammo, 10% fuel): 3444.2 kg
    Standard weight: 3906.9 kg
    Fuel load: 363.3 kg / 504.6 l / 111 gallons
    Maximum useful load: 1052 kg

    Combat debut: March 1945

    Operation features

    • The engine is equipped with the automatic governor of the manifold pressure that works when the throttle is set to 1/3 position or above.
    • The engine has a two stage mechanical supercharger which does not require manual control. It can be switched to the low gear manually.
    • The engine is equipped with an automatic fuel mixture control which maintains optimal mixture.
    • The propeller governor has two settings: in aft position it adjusts the propeller pitch automatically to maintain the optimal RPM at the current engine throtle while in forward position it maintains the constant, maximum possible propeller RPM.
    • The water and oil radiators shutters are operated automatically, but there is a special manual mode that forces radiator shutters to open completely.
    • The aircraft has a neutral static stability. The elevator effectiveness is high, so the aircraft should be controlled carefully, not giving too much flight stick input.
    • The aircraft becomes unstable with extended landing flaps.
    • The aircraft is equipped with elevator and rudder trimmers.
    • Landing flaps have a pneumatic actuator so they can be extended to maximum position only. Speed with extended landing flaps is limited to 160 mph.
    • The tail wheel rotates freely and does not have a lock. Since the landing gear wheels are relatively close to each other, it is necessary to confidently and accurately operate the rudder pedals during the takeoff and landing.
    • The aircraft has differential pneumatic wheel brakes with shared control lever. This means that if the brake lever is held and the rudder pedal the opposite wheel brake is gradually released causing the plane to swing to one side or the other.
    • The aircraft is equipped with a siren that warns a pilot if the throttle is set to low position with landing gear retracted.
    • It is impossible to open or close the canopy at high speed due to strong airflow. The canopy has an emergency release system for bailouts.
    • The aircraft is equipped with two underwing formation lights.
    • Standard gunsight is adjustable: both the target distance and target base can be set.
    • The gyroscopic gunsight automatically calculates required angular deflection while firing at a target. It has 4 modes: fixed reticle, fixed and gyro reticle, gyro reticle, gyro reticle with the target range fixed at 150 yards (night mode). The angular deflection will be calculated correctly only if the target range is set properly. To set the range, adjust the target base first using separate controls and then set the range by adjusting the size of the range finding reticle to be the same as the target size.
    • Both gunsights have sliding sun-filters.
about_the_game:
The Spitfire Mk. XIV, which entered service at the end of 1943, was originally built with a “high back” rear fuselage which restricted visibility to the rear of the plane. To rectify this problem, the Mk. XIV with a cut-down rear fuselage and tear-drop canopy began to be developed and built at the end of 1944.

These improved Spitfire Mk. XIVs featured full-span wings and were equipped with 2x .50 cal. machine guns and 2x 20 mm Hispano cannons; they could also be fitted with bomb racks to carry 250 lb. and 500 lb. bombs. The same Griffon engine that powered the original Mk. XIVs also powered this new model. For reconnaissance work, a camera could be fitted behind the canopy; such planes were known as Fighter Reconnaissance Mk. XIVs and were fitted with clipped wingtips as standard.

Spitfire Mk. XIVs with the cut-down rear fuselage and tear-drop canopy started entering service with the Royal Air Force’s 2nd Tactical Air Force in March 1945 and continued in operational service after the end of the war in Europe in May 1945. These improved Mk. XIVs also began to be sent to the South-East Asian Theater in June 1945 but arrived too late to see any combat against the Japanese.

In addition to Quick Mission Builder, Advanced Quick Mission Generator and Multiplayer modes, you can fly it in Career mode during the Battle of Bodenplatte timeframe.



  • Default armament: two 20mm guns "Hispano Mk.II" (150 rounds per gun, 650 rounds per minute) and two 12.7mm machine guns "Browning .50" (250 rounds per gun, 850 rounds per minute).
  • Bombs: 250 lb general purpose bombs "250 lb. G.P." and 500 lb general purpose bomb "500 lb. G.P."
  • Length: 9.9 m
  • Wingspan: 11.21 m
  • Wing surface: 22.48 m²

Armaments and Modifications

  • 150 grade fuel allowing +21 lb boost. Automatic supercharger gear shifting is disabled, stages should be manually switched at 11000ft altitude (20 km/h estimated speed increase at sea level).
  • Two 250 lb G.P. bombs with racks (250 kg weight increase, 22 km/h speed loss, 11 km/h speed loss after drop).
  • 500 lb G.P. bomb with rack (237 kg weight increase, 12 km/h speed loss, 6 km/h speed loss after drop).
  • Replacement of MkII Gyro Gunsight with MkII* Reflector Gunsight.
  • Clipped Wing (4 kg weight decrease).
  • Rear view mirror (1 kg weight increase, 1 km/h speed loss).
  • F.24 photo camera installation behind the cockpit (28 kg weight increase). Clipped wing only.
  • Rounded exhaust pipes.

  • George Clinton Keefer, awarded the Distinguished Flying Cross (DFC) and Bar, Distinguished Sevice Order (DSO), No. 125 Wing Commander, Fassberg, Germany, 1945. He survived the war and died in 1985.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: SSW D.IV Collector Plane
detailed_description:
The SSW D.IV came very late to the Great War to change Germany’s fortunes, but what machines did make it to front-line squadrons acquitted themselves well. The SS.DIV was the end result of a robust line of aircraft that saw service in the war and it came with a unique feature. The 200-hp SH.IIIa rotary engine had a crankshaft that rotated opposite of the engine and the propeller ’s rotation in an attempt to reduce the torque. The four-bladed propeller gave it a fast rate of climb and a high speed. The SS.DIV was even faster than Germany’s mainstay front-line fighter, the very successful Fokker D.VII. It was also very maneuverable, but reportedly had nasty stall behavior when pushed too far. The SS.DIV was armed with two 2 × 7.92mm machine guns.

SSW D.IV is a completely new addition - it wasn't modeled in our earlier WWI sim Rise of Flight. It can be used in Quick Mission Builder, Advanced Quick Mission Generator and Multiplayer modes.

Free historical campaign

If you own both this collector plane and either of Flying Circus volumes, "Against the Tide" historical campaign on the Western Front map will open up for you in the game for free. In this 5 scenarios long story you'll become one of the Jasta (Jagdstaffel) 22 pilots that received these newest biplanes shortly before the end of the World War I.



  • Default armament: Two 08/15 Spandau 7,92mm machine guns, 500 rounds per barrel.
  • Engine: Sh.IIIa contra-rotary 11 cyl., 207 h.p.
  • Length: 5.58 m
  • Wingspan: 8.35 m
  • Wing surface: 15.12 m²

Armaments and Modifications

  • Wilhelm Morell needle scale Bullet Counters for 2 machine guns.
  • Wilhelm Morell Anemometer (45-250 km/h air speed indicator).
  • D.R.G.M liquid Inclinometer (indicates bank while on ground and sideslip while in flight).
  • Oigee Reflector-type Collimator sight (with or without daytime dimmer).
  • Cockpit light for night sorties.

Skins

  • Standard paint scheme (customizable tactical number).
  • Jasta (Jagdstaffel) 12, Autumn 1918 (customizable tactical number).
  • Jasta 13, Autumn 1918 (customizable tactical number).
  • Jasta 14, Autumn 1918 (customizable tactical number).
  • Jasta 15, Autumn 1918 (customizable tactical number).
  • Jasta 19, Autumn 1918 (customizable tactical number).
  • II. Marine Feld Jasta, Autumn 1918 (customizable tactical number).

Technical details


Empty weight : 552 kg
Takeoff weight : 735 kg
Fuel capacity : 80 l
Oil capacity : 20 l

name: Novastride
detailed_description:
Cyborg Battles


Join the battle of Novastride - where the fate of your civilization rests on your shoulders! Fight alongside your robotic comrades to emerge victorious.

High-Flying Action


Engage in aerial dogfights! With heart-pumping aerial battles and stunning graphics, Novastride delivers an immersive flight experience like no other.

Rich Story


Explore the sprawling cities of Novastride and uncover a rich, immersive story filled with intrigue and danger at every second!

Intense Space Experience


Embark on an interstellar journey like never before, where you can explore the vast depths of space and engage in thrilling space battles! With an immersive space simulation experience, Novastride offers a range of atmospheric environments for you to explore, from rogue planets to star systems. As you navigate the stars and encounter hostile civilizations, the fate of your people hangs in the balance.

Variety of Mechanics


Seamlessly blends thrilling mechanics with immersive side quests and heart-pumping action sequences. With a vast open world to explore and endless possibilities for adventure Novastride is the ultimate space sim.

name: Chronicles Of Errodean
detailed_description:
join Discord For All Updates!



Welcome to the world of Errodean, an immersive medieval RPG that takes you on a journey through a mystical land filled with dangerous creatures and magical relics. With stunning graphics and an engaging storyline.

As a lone adventurer, you are tasked with uncovering the secrets of three ancient relics that have been hidden in different parts of the land. The Heart of Fire, the Eye of the Storm, and the Soul of the Earth are powerful artifacts that have been lost for centuries, and it's up to you to find them.

Explore dense forests, treacherous caves, and ancient ruins in your quest for these relics. Battle fierce monsters and rival treasure hunters as you uncover clues and secrets along the way. With a vast magical world to explore, there's always something new to discover in Errodean.

Craft your own weapons and armor, learn powerful spells, and upgrade your abilities as you progress through the game. Customize your character to fit your play style and become the ultimate hero in this epic adventure.

With challenging quests and a rich, immersive world to explore.

Are You Ready to Embark On This Epic Quest?

key Features:


  • Discover the secrets of the Heart of Fire, Eye of the Storm and Soul of the Earth relics
  • Engage in immersive combat with a variety of enemies, from goblins to dragons
  • Explore a vast open world filled with hidden treasures and breathtaking landscapes
  • Customize your character with unique skills and abilities

Join the quest now and become a hero in a world full of danger and adventure!

Welcome to the world of Errodean, an immersive medieval RPG that takes you on a journey through a mystical land filled with dangerous creatures and magical relics. With stunning graphics and an engaging storyline.

As a lone adventurer, you are tasked with uncovering the secrets of three ancient relics that have been hidden in different parts of the land. The Heart of Fire, the Eye of the Storm, and the Soul of the Earth are powerful artifacts that have been lost for centuries, and it's up to you to find them.

Explore dense forests, treacherous caves, and ancient ruins in your quest for these relics. Battle fierce monsters and rival treasure hunters as you uncover clues and secrets along the way. With a vast magical world to explore, there's always something new to discover in Errodean.

Craft your own weapons and armor, learn powerful spells, and upgrade your abilities as you progress through the game. Customize your character to fit your play style and become the ultimate hero in this epic adventure.

With challenging quests and a rich, immersive world to explore.

Are You Ready to Embark On This Epic Quest?

key Features:


  • Discover the secrets of the Heart of Fire, Eye of the Storm and Soul of the Earth relics
  • Engage in immersive combat with a variety of enemies, from goblins to dragons
  • Explore a vast open world filled with hidden treasures and breathtaking landscapes
  • Customize your character with unique skills and abilities

Join the quest now and become a hero in a world full of danger and adventure!
short_description: Embark on an epic adventure to collect three powerful relics in this medieval RPG. Explore ancient ruins, fight mythical beasts, and master magic to save the kingdom from an evil sorcerer.

name: rTexViewer
detailed_description:
A simple and easy-to-use textures viewer, editor and image board.

What can I do with rTexViewer?


rTexViewer is a powerful image viewing and editing tool that allows you to organize images into an image board, perfect to generate moodboards for reference and inspiration. It also includes multiple image editing tools to optimize pixel format, crop, resize, flip or apply custom GLSL shader effects.

With rTexViewer, you can easily view and manage your game textures, and also export them in multiple formats.

Features


  • Three view image modes: IMAGE TABS, IMAGE BOARD or DIRECTORY SCAN
  • Load/Save images/full-board as .rtv project file (non-destructive, image data compressed)
  • Load image file formats: .png, .qoi, .bmp, .tga, .jpg, .gif, .hdr, .ppm, .pgm
  • Load compressed texture formats: .dds, .pkm, .ktx, .pvr, .astc (if supported by GPU)
  • Load images from URL, just copy & paste image URL into program
  • View image options: Zoom, Pan, Alpha, Background and Scale filter
  • View image information: Name, Size, Format, Memory, Selected Pixel info, Color Palette
  • Edit images: Change image pixel-format with real-time preview
  • Edit images: Flip, Rotate, Resize, Resize Canvas, Crop, Alpha Clean and more
  • Edit images: Visual crop mode, just draw a rectangle and crop
  • Edit images: Define a text description for the image, saved on .rtv
  • Edit images: Assign GLSL fragment shaders for custom effects, saved on rtv
  • Multiple sample GLSL shaders provided for reference and new effects creation
  • Export single images as .png, .qoi, .dds, .raw or byte array .h
  • Export full image board as a single image .png, .qoi or .dds
  • Export image palette as .png or .pal (up to 256 colors)
  • Multiple UI styles supported, select your best style
  • Multiple window options: clean mode, borderless, top-most, mouse pass-through
  • Command-line support for batch image processing and formats conversion
  • Completely portable (single-file, no-dependencies)

Handmade Software

rTexViewer is handmade software, it has been meticulously developed using the C programming language, with great attention put on each line of code written. This approach usually results in highly optimized and efficient code, but it is also more time-consuming and require a higher level of technical skills. The result is great performance and small memory footprint.

name: Windy Meadow - A Roadwarden Tale
detailed_description:
WISHLIST NOW


About the Game






Step into the enchanting visual novel of "Windy Meadow - A Roadwarden Tale" and rediscover the mysterious world of Viaticum. This peaceful commune may not be the wealthiest or most renowned, but it offers something far more valuable - a haven of tranquillity and harmony amidst the hustle and bustle of the outside world.

The heart of the story lies in the intertwined stories of Vena, Fabel, and Ludicia - three unique protagonists facing life-altering choices that will shape their destinies. Join them as their stories unfold, brought to life by animated sprites and set to an evocative musical score.

Brought to you by the creator of the award-winning RPG Roadwarden.

Three intertwined Tales

Follow three unique protagonists and uncover their problems, fears, and the challenges they face. Their varying personalities make for interesting and complicated relationships with the multitude of moody side characters.

An immersive, detailed village

Enjoy a serene story world rich in gorgeous views, gentle rivers, fertile lands, and welcoming forests. In Windy Meadow, even the beasts and dragons tend to keep their distance while the inhabitants’ varying personalities and complex relationships make this community feel alive and relatable.

Choices matter

From the seemingly small to the life-changing, choices players make can affect dialogue options, NPC feelings, and game endings.

name: Shogi!
detailed_description:
Elevate your Shogi! experience with this visually striking 3D boardgame! Built in the newly released Unreal Engine 5, showcasing breathtaking scenes and hand-drawn stylized graphics. Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Shogi, where intense strategic battles unfold in vividly rendered environments. This recreation takes the game into the future with an unparalleled, Custom-Built AI that challenges players of all skill levels. Unleash your inner strategist and forge your path to victory through intricate moves, advanced tactics, and mind-bending challenges that will captivate both newcomers and seasoned Shogi enthusiasts alike. Master the art of Shogi with this definitive gaming experience and become a true champion of the popular strategic game.



• Advanced AI Opponents: The game features a sophisticated Custom-Built AI that adapts to different skill levels and playstyles, offering a challenging and engaging experience for players of all abilities.

• Immersive 3D Experience: The game provides captivating 3D environments that brings the game of shogi to life, making players feel as if they're sitting at a real shogi board with a friend.

• High-Quality Graphics: Stunning graphics with intricate details allow for a realistic representation of the shogi board, pieces, and environments, enhancing the overall gaming experience. Developed in the state-of-the-art Unreal Engine 5.

• Multiple Environments: Players can choose from a variety of environments, each with its own unique ambiance and aesthetic, including traditional Japanese settings, cozy home scenes, futuristic landscapes, and fantasy realms.

• Customizable Board and Tiles: The game offers a wide selection of board and tile styles, from classic wooden to sleek modern designs, allowing players to personalize their shogi experience.

• Online Multiplayer: The game will support online multiplayer, enabling players to compete against friends or other shogi enthusiasts from around the world. In player vs player matches as well as AI tournament leaderboards.

• Multi-platform Compatibility: The shogi game will be available on various platforms, including PC, and mobile devices, allowing players to enjoy the game wherever they go.

• Tutorial and Learning Resources: The game includes tutorials and learning resources, making it accessible to newcomers while helping experienced players to improve their skills.

• Achievement System: The game features an achievement system that rewards players for reaching milestones and completing challenges, encouraging continuous growth and development in the game.

name: Pseudoregalia
detailed_description:
When reality feels like it's falling apart, one might retreat to a world in their dreams to escape it.

Unfotunately, dreams aren't made to last.

Explore a perverse image of noble living. Grow strong, and escape this rotten dream.

A game originally made for the Metroidvania Month 19 game jam, this extended edition brings new areas, enemies, story, and a visual overhaul, all while retaining the original dreamlike atmosphere.

Game Features


  • Classic metroidvania action in 3D! Find your own way through Castle Sansa with open ended level design.
  • Unique platforming gameplay! Abilities such as the air kick let you tackle problems how you see fit, with a blend of tight challenges and smooth exploration.
  • Face a littany of foes! Combat is light and keeps movement at its core.
  • Retro inspiration! Experience a visual and audio aesthetic inspired by 5th-gen consoles, with modern gameplay refinements.
  • A satisfying bite size experience! Pseudoregalia manages to give you a condensed but full metroidvania playthrough in just a few hours, but is highly replayable with different routes to take!

name: The Red
detailed_description:
In this comedic satire of working for a soulless megacorporation on Mars, players will experience a mix between a first-person-shooter and a tower defense game. In this game, players will:

  • Build and place a variety of turrets, light-walls, proximity mines, and energy shields at strategic locations to protect both main base and resource extraction points from waves of enemies.
  • Use a variety of first-person weapons to help shore up defenses and personally protect high-value assets.
  • Repair damage done to extractors.
  • Use extracted resources to build new extractors and use specialized equipment to determine optimal locations to place them based on resource density in the surrounding areas.
  • Earn enough money to pay for your trip back home.

The game begins at a leisurely pace and eventually evolves into complete mayhem. Dying often is expected even on the easiest difficulty, and the harder difficulties can be intentionally unfair.

---

Location: Mars
Salary: Extremely Competitive
Job Type: Full-time

Red Horizons, a subsidiary of ∑d/x, is seeking highly motivated and skilled individuals to join our team as an Extraction Security Associates on Mars. As an Extraction Security Associate, you will be responsible for protecting our FabriClay™ extraction operations, repairing damaged extractors, prospecting for new FabriClay™ deposits, and ensuring the safety of our employees.

Responsibilities:
Monitor the area for potential threats to FabriClay™ extractors and take appropriate action to address them.
Operate SentiScan device and place turrets in optimal locations to deter unwanted threats.
Maintain and repair equipment, including periodically collecting FabriClay™ from extractors when full.
Conduct regular safety drills and collaborate with other team members to improve overall efficiency and safety.

Requirements:
Grade school diploma or equivalent.
Strong problem-solving and critical thinking skills.
Ability to work in a fast-paced and demanding environment.
Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
Must be physically fit and able to operate heavy equipment.
No fear of enclosed sharp spaces.

Benefits:
Competitive salary and benefits package. Security Extraction Associates receive room and board and a generous equity share of all FabriClay™ they assist with extraction (exchanged at current market rate).
Opportunity to work on Mars and be a part of the space exploration industry.
Access to our exclusive recreational amenities, including the TuneMaster 5000 music-radio and the Castle Creator Chrome Recreation Enhancement System.
Join our team today and become a part of the future of space exploration!

name: TORIDAMA: Brave Challenge
detailed_description:
Press the button at the very edge of your limit!

『TORIDAMA: Brave Challenge』is mini game collection based on the courage test.

◆It contains 19 mini-games in total.
"Stop a car driving at high speed, just before the cliff."
"Grab the rope and stop the huge rock from falling down on top of you."
"Pour a glass of juice to the very last drop."
"Open the parachute just before the ground and land well."
You can play 19 kinds of mini-games to test your courage in various situations.

Test your weak feeling inside of you as we say “Chicken Level” based on timing of pressing a button, level, and pitch in various kind of critical situations.

◆You can enjoy heated brave battles! The "Two-Player Mode" is available!
You can play mini-games together while looking at each other's screen to measure your “Chicken Level” and compete with each other.
Enjoy the battle to see who is the "Chicken".

◆Aim for the top of the world! Crazy Mode!
"Crazy Mode" appears when all mini-games are opened, and corresponds to the global ranking.
In this game mode, you will be on the edge of the world, and you will have to keep on getting the highest rating of "CRAZY".
See for yourself how far your guts will take you against the best from around the world.

◆Compatible with Steam's "REMOTE PLAY TOGETHER" feature!
Supports the "Remote Play Together" feature to share local multiplayer games with friends!

With the "Remote Play Together" feature, one player only needs to install and run the game to play together with distant friends via the Internet.

◆Three additional languages are supported!
Newly Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), and Korean languages will also be supported!
Overseas customers can also enjoy the heated "Brave Challenge" just in time for the holidays.
*The supported languages for game descriptions will be updated at a later date.

name: Scarlet Record
detailed_description:
Summary:

Scarlet Record brings you back to the Great Library, the wondrous harbor of knowledge across the known and unknown realms. As a continuation from Archivist's Curse tale, this chapter of Great Library's saga tells the story of Ruby, the fledgling Wandering Scribe, on her case of investigating the relic that is stolen from the Great Library's repository. Her investigation will not be without hurdles as the relic changes hands multiple times and jumps from one place to another quite often.

With her pupil and a trusty travel mate from the Guild, Ruby is set to embark on a journey outside her domain and recover the stolen relic, even if that means she must endure the hazards and hardships the outer world has to offer. Fortunately, more people will lend a hand in her adventures across various places.

Synopsis:

Great Library's Archivists were notified of an event that resulted in the resurfacing of Pawnsmoor Hall, a section of the Library that was previously inaccessible. The Hall won't stay for a long time, however, for the nature of the Great Library may render the Hall inaccessible once more. Thus, the effort of securing the relics that were stored there was then issued.

Archivists, being short-staffed at the time the Hall resurfaces, sent requests to all able-bodied personnel within Great Library. Such opportunity can't be missed, especially when it's tied to elusive sections of the Library such as the notorious Pawnsmoor Hall.

The letter of request from Archivists eventually reached Ruby, a regular Scribe who was trapped in Pawnsmoor Hall three months ago. Unlike the previous time, she is now ready to tackle the assignment--unbeknownst to her, however, the assignment is just the beginning of what would be her first adventure outside of Great Library after countless years.

Features:

  • Grid Battle System
A hybrid of tactical and turn-based combat; positioning, area domination, and proper use of each unit's abilities matter. Pitted against enemies that will make attempts to dominate the field, your party must push forward and suppress enemies' advance with everything in your party's arsenal.

  • Story-rich Adventure
Ruby's journey is not without stories to tell. Enjoy an adventure with unique characters, each coming with their own story that intertwines with Ruby's investigation, presented in both on-map scenes and visual novel-like dialogues.

  • Domain Exploration
In order to pursue the stolen relic, Ruby and the party must get through multiple domains, each with a unique roster of enemies to overcome and unique accessories to discover. Some domains may be more equal than the rest of them...

  • Party Customization
Build and customize each of your party members via Perks which can be gained as they level up, Augments which can be found in domains or bought in shops and Weapon Type which allows a unit to alter their attack patterns, allowing for more distinct, specific combat styles.

  • Old-school Visuals, Enhanced
Enjoy exploring the hubs and domains as well as the banters between characters, all in retro-esque vibes.

Summary:

Scarlet Record brings you back to the Great Library, the wondrous harbor of knowledge across the known and unknown realms. As a continuation from Archivist's Curse tale, this chapter of Great Library's saga tells the story of Ruby, the fledgling Wandering Scribe, on her case of investigating the relic that is stolen from the Great Library's repository. name: Phantom Blade: Executioners
detailed_description:
▼Your Choices Affect the Story▼
Make difficult decisions to alter the course of events. Will you lie to a young girl looking for her father? Telling her he’s going to be ok when you know full well that he’s not? How about intervening between two feuding brothers? The choices are yours.


▼Freestyle Skills and Killer Combos▼
During combat players can create different skill chain combos according to their preferences. Long chains, short bursts, and other skills can be easily adjusted. To unleash a skill chain, you’ll need to make sure your timing is right, and may stack Phantom bonuses on each of your character’s unique skills to improve attributes.


▼Phantom Bonuses and Stories▼
Phantoms are related to the characters and story in the game and each time you acquire a new Phantom or upgrade one, you unlock a Phantom story. These Phantom stories may impact your decision-making and affect how you play out certain scenarios by providing additional story context for each character.


▼Plenty of Loot▼
Earn equipment and Phantoms after winning battles. Equipment attributes are random and players can mix and match their gear to suit their playing style and aesthetic. Highly-coveted Sin Gears are obtained in Purge Dungeons. Purify Sin Gear to enhance it further. And most loot can be produced in battle.

name: Le Château
detailed_description:
Le Château (French for "the castle") is a tiny city builder, mostly about showing creativity with limited resources and limited space.
Great for when you've got little to no time, but you have this itch to play a game.



Make your kingdom as small as 1 tile, or as big as 11x11 tiles, and enjoy the aesthetics of several different color palettes.



Features
  • 20 different types of objects to choose from
  • 5 different color palettes
  • Complete control over the size of your kingdom
  • A world that slowly comes alive as more tiles are filled

Le Château has no real goal. Just lots of freedom in building the kingdom of your dreams!

Inspired by Paul Shnepf's The Block:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1995590/The_Block/

name: My Dear Dad 父亲
detailed_description:
联系我们

如果您有什么建议或者想与其他玩家交流，请加入我们的玩家群（QQ）：544907793
游戏后续的更新内容与情报，请关注我们的新浪微博：@幻想曲制作组


About the Game

《父亲》是一款略带恐怖元素的冒险解谜游戏。玩家需要扮演一名父亲，在充满危险的心境之塔中冒险，最终拯救自己的女儿小芊。


一场大火吞噬了一个家庭的希望，小芊的父亲在火场中寻找自己的女儿，结果因为吸入过量浓烟而晕倒。再次醒来时，他发现自己身处一个陌生的地方，而女儿小芊也不见了踪影，一场拯救女儿的冒险之旅就此展开……



某化学研究所研究员，有一个天真可爱的女儿，妻子因生孩子时难产去世。平时的工作很忙，疏于对女儿的照顾，被女儿小芊称作“坏人”。


某小学六年级女生，从小与爷爷奶奶长大，后因为升学的缘故被父亲接回。聪明伶俐，是班上的数学课代表，却因为自己的家庭而感到自卑，她更渴望的是别人对她的关心。


游戏以场景调查解谜为主，因玩家扮演的主角在游戏中的调查进程不同，游戏可能出现2种不同的结局。
● 可自主调节的动态难度系统，不同游玩习惯的玩家都能在游戏中体验到乐趣。
● 单周目游戏时长在2~3小时。
● 接入成就系统，20+探索或解谜类成就，等待各位玩家收集！
● 更多神秘彩蛋等待各位玩法探索发现。


● 键盘：上下左右 = 控制方向，Z = 确定，X = 取消
● 手柄：上下左右 = 控制方向，A = 确定，B = 取消
更多操作按键说明，请查看游戏内说明。

卡牌：根据Steam新政策，卡牌会在游戏发行后达到一定的指标后掉落。

name: My Girl Hates Fruit
detailed_description: This is a shooting game that tests your reaction ability. In the game, the fruit will move in a clockwise or counterclockwise direction, sometimes fast and sometimes slow. Please use the mouse to control the release time of the weapon and destroy the fruit. If you fail to hit the fruit, you will fail to enter the level. The more fruit you eliminate, the more gold you will harvest. Gold coins can be used in the twist lottery, whether it's a CG or a weapon prop, who knows? A beautiful CG may be your most desired gift.

name: Grant of God
detailed_description:
This is a synchronous turn-based card battle game, you will form your own card deck through the combination of characters, weapons and equipment, to meet any challenges, currently support 1V1 battle.

Game characteristic gameplay


1, synchronous out of the card
Play card in the same time with your opponent, avoid turn-based waiting and first hand problems

2. Interactive battles
Use the transposition mechanism to avoid the opponent's possible attack, and use the normal attack card to directly cut down the opponent's powerful skills

3. The second-level group card mechanism reduces the learning cost
It consists of 8 hero and weapon cards to form the whole card group, and introduces the one-key card group function,it will greatly reduce the learning cost

name: 911: Cannibal
detailed_description:
911 is a scary Hide & Seek horror game with puzzle elements.💀

In this horror game you are a kidnapped teenager. Maniac - cannibal keeps you in his creepy house. Hide and search items that can help you find a way out of the scary place and survive the nightmare. Solve puzzles to get to inaccessible places. And do not forget about attentiveness - you need to carefully cover up your tracks so that the maniac does not suspect anything.

Can you hide and outsmart the cannibal and survive without missing a single detail? Or will he catch you in the very first minutes and in the evening you will find yourself in his plate? In this horror, survival depends only on your ingenuity, attentiveness and memory. 🤞
Explore the scary house and look for notes to learn more about Minnesota's scariest maniac.

Game features:

★ Branching detective story
★ Fascinating story and investigation
★ Interesting puzzles
★ Horror elements, hide and seek, and survival
★ Quality sound and detailed environment

Download the new horror game and try to survive. Test yourself and your mind! 💣

name: Mechanical Gods
detailed_description:
Updated 04/25/23
Mechanical Gods is a 3D Arena Fighting game. Choose your favourite fighter and test your skills against powerful AIs and players alike, hitting, slashing, dashing and kicking your way through every arena. Each fight you survive gets you closer to unveil the secrets of the Mechanical Gods.

FIGHT FOR SURVIVAL



Use your best strategy and powerful moves to survive through conutless battles. Don't charge your opponents ruthlessly, if your stamina goes to zero, so will do your chances of victory.

Beyond basic attacks, You have at your disposal many tricks to secure your life:

- Dashing to avoid attacks and put some ground between You and your enemy.
- Consumable items to recover your health or to pressure your opponent's defenses, like granades and ground mines.
- Long ranged weapons to sting the enemies from the distance.
- Special moves with different effects, ranges and purposes.
- Kicking and pushing your enemies out of the arena to kill them out of nowhere...
- Satisfying special moves that could turn the fight in your favour while releasing all your energy!

PICK THE CHALLENGE RIGHT FOR YOU

Like in classical fighting games, You can choose among popular different modes like:

- Story mode. Every fight has a meaning. At the end of the journey you'll know what lies behind the curtain.
- Arcade mode. Fight once against a finite number of opponents to claim the title of champion, without worrying about running out of resources!
- Time Attack mode. Close every match as soon as possible and share your best result with your friends or challenge yourself to do even better.
- Survival mode. Your enemies are endless like your will to go on. How many can you defeat before running out of items, energy and willpower?
- PvP modes. Both online or offline with a friend, test your skill against some human player if you feel really competitve!
- Training mode. If you're not ready to test the blade, don't worry, there's always a safe place to figure things out without pressure...

A DARK FUTURE


Mechanical Gods is set in a distant future where humanity is no more than a tiny gear in a much bigger mechanism. To survive a reality of death and oppression lead by invisible AIs, humans, mutants and cyborgs fight in a never ending tournament, trying to erode the steel menace's defenses, Champion after Champion. Will You be the greatest of them all?

name: Our Life: Beginnings & Always - Baxter's Story
detailed_description:
Enjoy exciting summer days in the company of Baxter Ward during Steps 3 and 4! This is an optional DLC for the free game Our Life: Beginnings & Always.



  • Unlocks 5 Step 3 Moments: Sightseeing, Hang, Drinks, Mountain, & Planning
  • Unlocks an entirely new storyline in Step 4
  • Allows you to form a deeper relationship with Baxter Ward (platonic or romantic) and spend time more with your friends
  • Includes new character sprite art, background locations, and CG images
  • Provides even more options for adding custom qualities to your character. Is your protagonist a good dancer or do they have two left feet?
  • Unlocks bonus scenes in the other Step 3 Moments where what happened in these events is referenced and reflected on
  • Increases the overall playtime by multiple hours

name: Training and War Simulation (TWS)
detailed_description:
Early Beta Access

By joining the TWS waitlist and pre-ordering, supporters will gain access to exclusive content and updates regarding the development of the product. This includes access to early builds of the game, discounts on pre-orders, and access to the TWS community. Additionally, pre-ordering the game allows supporters to contribute to the development of the product, helping to fund its development and make it a reality. Visit http://tws.world


About the Game

Training and War Simulation (TWS) is an AR/VR Global Combat Simulator (GCS) that allows players to take part in air, land, and sea simulations with advanced defense artificial intelligence spanning the entire Earth. The entire world and all forces are player controlled in both first person, and from a strategic command level with TWS STRATCOM. Players will have the opportunity to engage in virtual synthetic training and simulations that can provide the same experience military personnel leverage for combat skills proficiency training and mission readiness. The simulation will offer a variety of scenarios, campaigns, and missions that involve multiple types of combat operations. Players will be able to lead their own armies, coordinate air, naval, and land movements as well as utilize strategic command decisions to outwit and defeat their opponents. The AI included in the simulation will be able to respond to different strategies, making it more realistic and unpredictable, while also providing a challenge to the player. In addition, TWS will provide a variety of support options and tools for players to review their performance, as well as to plan for upcoming battles and missions. These tools will include detailed tactical maps, 3D models of the terrain, and a variety of other information that can be used to plan and strategize. Players will also be able to customize their forces to fit their own play-style, allowing for a more immersive experience. Overall, Training and War Simulation (TWS) is a commercialized DoD facing dual-use AR/VR Global Combat Simulator that provides players with an engaging and realistic experience that was designed to prepare soldiers for combat operations in the real world. With its AI, variety of tools and customization options, and realistic scenarios, TWS can provide players with an immersive and engaging experience.

name: Organs Please: OST & Artbook
detailed_description:
In this DLC you will find:

Digital Artbook


This digital artbook (pdf format) contains 68 pages full of high quality concept art, sketches and models - everything that helped create such a complex and ambiguous world of Organs Please.

How much is a human life worth? Is it worth sacrificing one for many? And what if humanity as a species is under threat? Organs Please puts you in a situation where you have to answer these questions — in 30 days you need to build an ark to save humanity, and it is advisable to get in there yourself 😉

However, we did not want to turn the game's universe into an average dystopia. Through satire and black humor, our team wanted to better reveal the complexity and versatility of the game world.



In the artbook, you can see step by step how we searched for the right concepts to convey the atmosphere, individuality and mood of the game’s characters, factions and locations.

Original Soundtrack


This soundtrack contains 9 original compositions that were created as a result of a long search for a suitable genre — jazz, acid jazz, doom jazz, lounge, and experimental were all used as reference points. As a result, we created something special that fits Organs Please and supports the game’s theme.



To locate the DLC please follow these instructions
After installing the DLC, you can find its files in the Steam folder for soundtracks (steamapps\music), and also listen to the audio files in the Steam Music Player.
