name: Quecksilber
detailed_description:
Roadmap

Are you a kid of the 80s? Enjoyed playing Kick Off, NHL or Speedball? Then help Quecksilber to happen by wishlisting! 🚀


About the Game

Welcome to Quecksilber, the ultimate future-sports game where ruthless aggression and brutal tactics are just as important as speed and skill!


In this blend of soccer, football and hockey, you'll lead your team of high-tech gladiators into the arena and battle it out with rival teams in a fast-paced, action-packed game of strategy and mayhem.

Whether you're retro gamer or a newcomer to the world of futuristic sports, Quecksilber offers an addictive and thrilling experience that will keep you coming back for more.

With its immersive graphics, pulse-pounding soundtrack, and intuitive controls, Quecksilber is the ultimate adrenaline rush for fans of fast-paced sports games.
Choose your team, customize your players, and dominate the competition as you climb the ranks and become the ultimate Quecksilber champion.



Powered by a custom-made physics engine, Quecksilber offers accurate, blazingly-fast and fun ball physics.

They are both fun and enjoyable, creating an immersive and engaging experience that will keep you coming back for more. From the way the ball bounces off walls to the way it interacts with players and objects in the arena, every aspect of Quecksilber's ball physics has been carefully crafted to deliver an experience that is both intuitive and rewarding.

Whether you're playing solo or with friends, the ball physics make for a dynamic and exciting gameplay experience.

With responsive and realistic movement, you'll feel like you're really in control of the ball, whether you're dribbling past defenders, sending a pass to your striker or scoring a sensational goal.



Quecksilber's AI is powered by advanced algorithms that enable it to analyze the game environment in real-time, taking into account variables such as the position of the ball, its trajectory, the location of the players, and even the current score. This allows it to make split-second decisions that are both intelligent and realistic, creating a dynamic and challenging gameplay experience.

Enjoy smart and life-like opponents, teammates and goalkeepers.



Here's a list of 🚧 planned features (no promises!) and those already available:

Smooth (60fps+) gameplay. The game offers smooth, fast and fluid gameplay.

Accurate & fun ball physics. I put great effort in developing a custom physics engine for the game, for maximum fun.

Local Multiplayer. Play pvp or coop with up to 4 players.

🚧 Online Multiplayer. Play online matches. (If I can pull it off, this will be based on custom network code for minimal lack instead of Steam Remote Play.)

🚧 Sticky controls. Assign controllers to single players instead of player switching. Massive fun especially with co-op!

🚧 Cup & League modes. Instead of single matches only, play a league or cup season.

🚧 Player skills. Individual player skills like speed, stamina, control etc. Probably upgradable during a season.

🚧 Linux & Mac support. The game should not only be available natively for Windows, but also for Mac and Linux - it's a perfect match for the Steam Deck, imo!

Notes from the Developer


👩‍💻 Quecksilber is made by a single developer, me, Thorsten - nice to meet you! 👋

⚽ It is based on a complete rewrite of my first self-published game - Natural Soccer - and heavily inspired by Speedball, Kick Off, NHL and other games I liked to play as a kid on my Amiga.

💡 “Quecksilber” is the German word for “mercury”, which describes perfectly both the metallic look of the game, and its quick, smooth and fluid gameplay.

🕹 I really hope you'll enjoy playing Quecksilber - thanks a lot for your support!

👉 WISHLIST NOW!

name: Angus and the Gates of Chaos
detailed_description:
Angus and the Gates of Chaos tells the story of Angus, the half-witted son of a tax collector in the fictional universe of Chanceburn. Through a series of coincidences, Angus finds himself on a quest to defeat the evil Inquisitor Ruthen and prevent him from opening the Gates of Chaos and destroying all of Chanceburn.

Enjoy a classic, retro style adventure featuring ice puzzles, hidden collectibles, three endings, varied difficulty modes, and jokes about taxes. Lots of jokes about taxes. Proceed with caution.


ABOUT DIFFICULTY MODES
Easy - Enjoy the game's story and solve some puzzles! Minimal Challenge.
Normal - Dodge obstacles and solve puzzles at the same time! The Intended Game Experience.
Hard - Game too easy? Good luck beating this mode. For those who want a brutally hard challenge.

short_description: An exciting and comedic retro adventure!

name: Fantasy Grounds - Spectacular Settlements
detailed_description:
"

Spectacular Settlements

An engine of inspiration, Spectacular Settlements will help you create all manner of places to populate the worlds in which you play, be they existing settings, or your very own.
Inside, you'll find easy-to-use settlement builder chapters, interesting NPCs, and a wide variety of other useful tables. For GMs in a hurry, 64 fully-realized pre-generated settlements, each with their own unique artwork and full color map, are ready to be slotted in to any game world in seconds.

With the help of this book, realize the places that have been locked within your imagination! "

name: Endless Pinball
detailed_description:
Welcome to the world of Endless Pinball, the addictive pinball game where you can challenge your skills and see how far you can go!

In this game, you play as a pinball and your mission is to travel as far as possible without getting stuck or hitting any obstacles. The pinball rolls automatically, so your only job is to tap the left or right side of the screen to control its movement and avoid the walls and obstacles.

As you progress, the game becomes more challenging with faster speeds and more complex obstacles. You'll encounter moving obstacles, narrow passages, and even gravity-defying loops that will test your reflexes and strategic thinking.

Endless Pinball features stunning graphics and a variety of themes, each with their own unique obstacles and challenges. You can unlock new pinball designs and themes by earning points and achieving high scores.

Endless Pinball is the ultimate test of skill and endurance, perfect for those who love challenging and addictive games. Download it now and see how far you can go!

name: Gadget Tycoon
detailed_description: Gadget Tycoon allows you to step into the shoes of an inventor and embark on a journey to become famous and take on the world with your inventions. It's a management/tycoon game, but it also has adventure game elements, and the game manages to find a balanced combination between the two. As you progress in the game, you can manage and control the production of your gadgets. The game starts slowly, but it's easy to get into the business. The 2D top-down views of the production halls and offices are impressive. Gadget Tycoon is a well-executed game that is fun, intricate, and goes beyond a standard tycoon game by including adventure and story portions. The game is reminiscent of Tycoon games in terms of the way it weaves together graphical style and gameplay styles.

name: IguaRPG
detailed_description:
Be an iguana and save the world from evil.

Features


  • Create your own adorable iguana with the charming character creator
  • Solve puzzles and get help from other iguanas to collect the 4 big keys
  • Collect precious valuables to spend on unique consumables and stat boosts
  • Defeat strong invaders with strategy and clever use of items

 

Controls


  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space - Jump, Confirm, Use potion
  • U - View potion supply
  • Q - ???

name: Anima Reprise
detailed_description:
Anima reprise is a turn-based rpg about a man, his addiction, chaos and the clown who caused it all. In this game you will meet wackos and manipulators. You will meet people that are broken, and shatter those that are not.

All to End That Sick Fool's Joke.



In this game you will find
  • 2 and a half to 3 hours of gameplay
  • No grinding
  • Retry battles after death
  • Clowns
  • Jesters
  • More clowns
  • 27 custom songs sent straight into your earholes
  • Even MORE jesters
  • Blood (On occasion)
  • Entropy (in droves)

name: Form Fitting
detailed_description:
Form Fitting is a casual puzzle game where players must pick up different shaped blocks and drag them into the corresponding empty slots. Victory is achieved when all the slots are filled. The game features hundreds of thoughtfully designed levels, each with a unique challenge. Players must use limited space to think strategically and complete all levels.

Game Features:

Simple and fun gameplay
Hundreds of thoughtfully designed levels
Each level presents a unique challenge
A variety of different shaped blocks to use
Difficulty gradually increases for a more challenging experience

name: The RailIdle
detailed_description:
The setting is a railroad shrine.
Choose one of the four apostles and off you go!

At the base location, you will mainly collect and manufacture materials by leaving the game alone.
Once materials are gathered, head into the adventure and use them to break through!

As you progress in your adventures,
you will have more friends to support you and you will be able to play side contents.

[Various functions and contents]


  • Basic functions to move around in JRPG style.
  • The base that gradually becomes more advantageous and convenient by acquiring treasures.
  • Unexplored areas that can be played by acquiring maps.
  • A group of people who will join you and help you in your base.
  • A challenging side trip area.
  • Extended areas that continue even after the main story is completed.
  • Endless looping content.
  • Random dungeon-like content
  • Support for Achievements

More to come in the future!
★Even a simple base at first becomes more and more luxurious as you acquire treasures!
★Seasonal event areas and more!

name: Fallen
detailed_description:
"Fallen" is a game about a small sphere's journey to become a bright light that shines on the world.

GamePlay

- You have to avoid many obstacles and go up.

- If you touch an obstacle while climbing, you lose your strength and fall.

- Avoid all obstacles in a total of 5 themes and reach the top.

Control

Control is simple. Move with direction keys + space bar

There are two ways to move.

If you press the space bar briefly, it moves for a short distance.

Also, If you press and hold the space bar, the distance traveled increases by the pressed time,
and you can pass through obstacles during this movement.

name: 龙栖 Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Hello everyone, I am gzsn, the sound design director of this game, and I am also responsible for the soundtrack.
First of all, I would like to thank you all for supporting Dragon's Habitat and the soundtrack album.
Although the work is presented in the form of the so-called "quadratic galgame", it is far from the general quadratic style in terms of its painting style, work content and spiritual core. Therefore, in terms of the music style, we did not use the common music style in the quadratic works, but imitate the music method of film and television works, and turned our eyes to the more traditional and classic instrumentation, in order to give the players the audio-visual experience.
The album is divided into three parts. "Disc 1" contains 10 songs, five post-credits tracks and their vocals in each of our seven branching directions. "Disc 2" contains 47 songs and is a set of scene-specific soundtracks arranged in dramatic order. Disc 3 consists of eight songs and is a soundtrack with no specific plot direction.
I hope that the songs on this album will make you think back to the humble village in 1995 and recall the story of that era that we have played for you.
Looking forward to seeing you again!

name: Kingdom Incremental
detailed_description:
Kingdom Incremental is a light-hearted city builder where cash is king. Starting from nothing, you build your civilization from the ground up and expand out into the vast unknown. Every penny you earn can be used to build new buildings, improve existing ones, or upgrade production chains. It's up to you to create a balanced economy where the profits flow right back into your pockets! After your city's growth stagnates, you can burn everything to the ground for powerful bonuses that multiply your profits in your next kingdom!

Build and upgrade your kingdom!

Each building increases your worker capacity and resource storage. Invest in upgrades to increase profits or improve the buildings to cram more peasants in.



Balance your economy

Each building type produces unique resources. In order to produce complex resources, you need to balance the production of base components. Optimize profits while not starving your citizens, or just let them starve... they can probably find some cake to eat.



Expand out into the great unknown

Who knows what kind of mysteries lie beyond your kingdom's borders. Expand out to transform your humble little hovel into a bustling metropolis! Maybe even uncover some hidden treasures that can be used to upgrade your production chains or warp through time.



Defend your kingdom!

Dragons have the potential to burn your kingdom to ash, but offer powerful rewards for an active playstyle. if you can manage to slay them of course.



Gain prestige for even greater rewards!

Eventually, you will have to make hard decisions about whether to invest exorbitant sums of money in price-gouged real estate or invest exorbitant sums of money in price-gouged upgrades. If that becomes too rich for your blood you can abdicate the thrown to gain powerful bonuses in a new land.




So, are you ready to start building?

FEATURES

  • 100+ Upgrades
  • 100+ In-Game Achievements
  • Auto-Save
  • Unlimited Offline Production
  • Unlockable Auto-Clicker
  • Unlockable Fast-Forward
  • Satirical Storyline
  • Dragons. Like too many dragons.
  • Random Events (Maybe you'll meet a goose! How exciting!)
  • An army of peasants to perform dumb tasks for their entire meaningless lives!
  • Bigger numbers! (Wow, how original!)
  • 1 Developer (Oh hey, that's me!)
*Zero peasants were harmed in the creation of this kingdom. Okay well maybe a few depending on your definition of "harm" and "zero"

Dragons have the potential to burn your kingdom to ash, but offer powerful rewards for an active playstyle. if you can manage to slay them of course.

Eventually, you will have to make hard decisions about whether to invest exorbitant sums of money in price-gouged real estate or invest exorbitant sums of money in price-gouged upgrades. If that becomes too rich for your blood you can abdicate the thrown to gain powerful bonuses in a new land.




So, are you ready to start building?

FEATURES

  • 100+ Upgrades
  • 100+ In-Game Achievements
  • Auto-Save
  • Unlimited Offline Production
  • Unlockable Auto-Clicker
  • Unlockable Fast-Forward
  • Satirical Storyline
  • Dragons. Like too many dragons.
  • Random Events (Maybe you'll meet a goose! How exciting!)
  • An army of peasants to perform dumb tasks for their entire meaningless lives!
  • Bigger numbers! (Wow, how original!)
  • 1 Developer (Oh hey, that's me!)
*Zero peasants were harmed in the creation of this kingdom. Okay well maybe a few depending on your definition of "harm" and "zero"
short_description: Kingdom Incremental is a satirical city builder and incremental game. To be the wealthiest ruler, you must build a fortified settlement and balanced economy, strategically invest in upgrades, and expand your kingdom across the globe! Then burn everything down to start again with even more power!

name: Sakura Kanji Ketchi
detailed_description:
Sakura Kanji Ketchi is an innovative RPG that combines education and entertainment in a unique and engaging way. Set in Japan, you play as Sakura, a girl on a mission to find her missing father. Along the way, you'll encounter challenging obstacles that can only be overcome by learning Japanese kanji.

With Sakura Kanji Ketchi, you can learn Japanese kanji in a fun and pleasant way. Fight monsters, catch kanji, and craft new kanji as you progress through the game. The more kanji you catch and train, the more powerful you become in battle.

One of the most unique features of Sakura Kanji Ketchi is the ability to merge kanji to form new ones. This not only allows you to expand your vocabulary, but it also adds a new layer of strategy to the game.

Sakura Kanji Ketchi is perfect for people who want to learn Japanese kanji in a fun and enjoyable way. It's also a great tool for anyone preparing to take the JLPT (Japanese Language Proficiency Test).

So why wait? Join Sakura on her quest to find her father and learn Japanese kanji at the same time!

name: The White Dreams : Road To Gate 1
detailed_description:
In this video game, the player takes on the role of a character who has become trapped in a loop of dreams. The character must navigate through a series of dreams, each one more surreal than the last, in order to collect keys of dreams that will allow them to escape and return to reality.

As the player progresses through the game, they will encounter a variety of obstacles and challenges, ranging from simple puzzles to intense boss battles. Along the way, they will also meet other characters who are trapped in the dream world, some of whom may offer clues or assistance in the player's quest.

Each dream world is a unique and immersive environment, with its own distinct visual style and atmosphere. The player will need to explore every nook and cranny of each dream in order to find all the keys of dreams that are hidden throughout.

As the player collects more keys of dreams, they will begin to unlock new abilities and upgrades that will help them navigate the increasingly challenging dreams. With each dream conquered and key of dreams collected, the player will move closer to their ultimate goal of breaking free from the dream world and returning to reality.

name: Drag Racing Kaos - "One More Run"
detailed_description:
After many failed attempts from other companies at an online drag racing game since the early 2000's, I gave it a try myself. Using things learned over the last 20 years from other coding ventures, I have came up with Drag Racing Kaos. The Kaos part will be the inclusion of almost everything drag racing. From Top Fuel and Funny Cars to Junior dragsters and Fuel Altereds. Drag Racing Kaos will have something for everyone. The "One More Run" tagline comes from an old saying describing the addictive nature of gaining the extra hundredth of a second. "I'm on my way, just one more run."

Current Features Include:
  • Choice of Top Fuel, Nitro Funny Car, AAFA or Nitro Promod.
  • Over 20 different tuning variables.
  • Currently 4 Different tracks to race on.
  • Ability to choose your color or paint scheme of racecar.
  • Weather conditions that effect tuning.
  • Custom part choices for many racecars.

name: Guardians of the Forest
detailed_description:
Collect Guardians!




Collect Forest Spells!




Defeat invaders!




Boss fight!




Protect the forest!




'Guardians Of The Forest (GOF)' is an action-packed RPG shooter where players must defend the forest from invaders who are burning trees, destroying animals' homes, and torturing them for their own selfish desires. As the planet's balance is threatened, heroes and guardians from various realms unite to protect nature and restore harmony.

Players must navigate through challenging levels, battle fierce enemies, and defeat powerful bosses to progress through the game. The game is designed to be enjoyable for players of all skill levels, so while it will offer a satisfying challenge, it won't be too difficult.

Join the fight to protect nature and restore the balance in GOF!

name: Mystillion
detailed_description:
Once. A certain village was destroyed by the hands of the devil.
"Red Village Tragedy - "
The only girl who survived the incident called that - Isla.
Even though she was tormented by the memories of her past, she lived each day to the fullest.

Genre: AVG (ADV), R18
Otome (Maiden) Adventure Game, Western Fantasy Setting
3 characters are the conquest of your love.
28 still images
This game can be played with only a mouse.


Islay
The sole survivor of the "Red Village Tragedy " incident.
After the incident, she was taken in by the Selo Orphanage and lives on the outskirts of town.
Although he is alone for the rest of his life, he also has the strength to try and keep a bright smile.
He is on good terms with Raphiel, a young priest apprentice.
I'm doing my best to be useful to the town that picked me up, but...?


Noin
A critically injured young man who appears before the protagonist. Call yourself a demon hunter.
Although he has a desire to take revenge on the devil "Ille Coronam", he is defeated.
The fact that Isla, who is in the same situation, doesn't think about revenge, throws a stone at him.
Personality is serious and cool-headed. He doesn't talk more than necessary, but that doesn't mean he's silent.
Always wields a pair of gold and silver swords.


Ille Colonum
A demon who drives Noin to the brink of death and breaks into Aira's house. Nicknamed "Devil of the Crown"
According to him, there are a lot of two names.
Even though he bares his fangs that he failed to kill Noin, he is interested in the main character who protects him,
Also, knowing that the main character is a survivor of the incident, he starts messing with Isla.
His remarks are very vague and he's always dizzy, but he seems to have a purpose...?


Raphiel Geri
A young man who is an apprentice priest at the church.
He's a little older than Isla, and has been watching over her since she was little.
A gentle personality who always has a smile on his face.

The player becomes the main character and chooses his own destiny.
Bring happiness to his beloved and many others.
Visual novel.

This work includes elements of sexual activity and disagreeable sex.
Contains nudity or sexual content.
There are depictions of drugs and alcohol.
Contains explicit or fresh adult sexual content.

name: Sheepdogs
detailed_description:
Join Max, Dolly and Echo for 20 levels of sheep herding fun!

Features:
  • Single-player pixel-art game perfect for anyone looking for a casual game but still enjoys a challenge.
  • Guide your dog with five simple commands ("come by", "away", "walk on", "lie down" and "that'll do") and herd the sheep in the right direction.
  • Level up to unlock Dolly and Echo.
  • Watch out for those stubborn rams!

Built with GameMaker Studio.

name: Mudborne Demo
detailed_description:
MUDBORNE... YOU HAVE BEEN CHOSEN

Mudborne is a laid-back nature sim game about breeding & collecting frogs! Visited in your dreams by a mysterious deity, you begin a journey to help rediscover Her lost children.



  • Finally reach your life goals and become an actual frog!
  • TINY LITTLE FROGS YOU CAN CATCH AND CHASE
  • Find and collect different mushrooms to help buff (or debuff) your frogs
  • Play god and manipulate your frogs genetics to find new species
  • One of the frogs has a tiny hat!!! GOTY contender????



Mudborne spawned as a small week-long gamejam, #FletchFest, organised by FletchMakes!
The result is the game you can play for free over on https://tngineers.itch.io/mudborne, with music by Mothense! :D

I've always joked about making "APICO but frog", but it's never been much more than that - with the gamejam theme of "pond" however it seemed like a good opportunity to make it a reality!

With Mudborne I wanted to play more with the idea of direct manipulation & min/max-ing of genetics to find new species (rather than just slapping bees together), as well as some more interesting nature mechanics - while still bringing the same menu management & crafting minigame vibes you all know and love (along with all the learning I've had making APICO!)

I've got lots of ideas for this concept and would love to turn this into a more fleshed out demo and maybe even a full game if people are interested, so if you are maybe give it a lil wishlist​??



If you want to follow along with the project you can catch us on Twitter, or hit up the TNgineers Discord, links are in the sidebar.

name: Sex Simulator - The Private Jet
detailed_description:
An interactive sex simulation game with visual novel elements, featuring high-definition graphics and videos with realistic looking characters, set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of a hot businessman, who has sex with three lucky women on the company's private jet.

GAME DESCRIPTION

New day - new babe. Isn’t that what they say?
For some people this might be a dream, but not for you. Luckily, we have just the right game to turn your fantasy into reality.

Enter the world of Sex Simulator - The Private Jet.

name: The Backpacker
detailed_description:
The Backpacker is a story rich, single-player first-person walking simulator game about a network engineer who goes to a project assignment for fixing network towers in the Himalayan mountain trails.
He connects with his supervisor with whom he develops a deeper connection and they both engage in sharing the life story with each other.

Includes:

A stunningly beautiful wilderness environment that expands as you explore.
A single-player game in an open world with dozens of locations to explore and over 100 puzzles.
A mind bending challenging walking sim puzzle game
A tailor-made story: the choices you make shape the narrative and build relationships.
An edge-of-your-seat mystery.
Secrets and discoveries to be made over every hill.

name: The Artist - Act One
detailed_description:
Under Development

'The Artist - Act One' is currently under development, and will be available on Steam for free once complete. Act Two and Act Three will be released as paid DLC so you can continue the story if you like it! You can keep up to date with development by joining our Discord server!


About the Game

Step into the shoes of a successful lawyer in ‘The Artist’, a gripping and dramatic visual novel. After a run of bad luck on the dating scene, and having seemingly explored every avenue available to you, you unexpectedly meet a woman named Ava who captures your heart and attention.



You find yourself falling into a deepening relationship that is hard to get a grasp of. Ava is an utterly mysterious muse that brings curiosity and so many feelings out of you that make you second guess yourself endlessly. She is the kind of woman that will make you question everything you know about relationships.

With multiple possible endings and a branching narrative that adapts based on your choices, ‘The Artist’ takes you on an emotional and thrilling journey through the depths of love, trust, and betrayal. Will you stay by Ava's side, even as the evidence against her mounts? Or will you cut ties and move on with your life?

Explore the intricacies of human relationships and make tough decisions that will shape the outcome of the story in this unforgettable visual novel. ‘The Artist’ will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end.

short_description: Do you feel good where you are? Some people do, some don't even if they have everything in the world. Does love fix that sort of feeling, even if such feelings feel so hard to grasp and such love could be toxic to yourself? What is a loving muse to the artist who paints them?

name: Pandash
detailed_description:
Pandash is a strategic Roguelite that takes the player Ryu on a journey to a world where he receives support from a mysterious ghostly realm. In this Roguelite platformer, the player must traverse various areas to gradually free his world from the unknown threat.
During the game, the player can discover and use various perks to defeat enemies and overcome obstacles. However, these perks are not easy to find and require a lot of skill and strategy to obtain.
Each use of the perks disrupts the balance of the worlds. The current world and the ghostly realm must remain in harmony. If this harmony is disturbed, Ryu's strength falters and he will feel the direct effects. But perhaps there are also ways to take advantage of this imbalance...
The threatened world that Ryu travels through is full of secrets and dangers. The environment changes every time the player begins his journey. Each journey also means new challenges that he must face.
The goal of the game is to restore peace to the world by uncovering and defeating the cause of the threat. The player must constantly improve and strengthen their character to defeat increasingly difficult opponents.
Pandash offers a unique and captivating gaming experience that is suitable for both casual players and Roguelite enthusiasts. The combination of perks and the attempt to keep them in balance, the changing environment, and the search for peace in a threatened world make the game a new experience.

name: Hypermarket Tycoon Manager
detailed_description:
Hypermarket Tycoon Manager is an engaging business simulation game where you take on the role of a young entrepreneur who aims to build and grow a successful supermarket business.

You start with a small store and a limited budget, but with your hard work and determination, you can turn your store into a thriving hypermarket that attracts customers from all over the city. Your primary objective is to manage your store effectively and grow your business by making strategic decisions.

As you progress, you can unlock new features such as additional parking spaces, more checkout counters, and more extensive product categories, which will enable you to attract more customers and generate higher profits.
With Hypermarket Tycoon Manager, you can experience the thrill of running a successful business & the satisfaction of making profitable decisions.
Become the most popular and successful hypermarket in the city and attract all the inhabitants to come to buy only from you!

Game Features :
- Upgrades and expansion ( Parking spaces, more employees and more other)
- Financial management
- User-friendly Interface

name: The World of Pirates
detailed_description:
Welcome in this simulation-action game of "The World of Pirates" where you take the role of a pirate battling to take over the sea. With a range of ships sailing towards the peninsula, you must use your fire cannons to take them down before they destroy your own ship. But be careful - these pirates won't go down without a fight and they'll be firing back at you!

To increase your chances of winning, you can collect treasures that are scattered around the water. These treasures will give you an extra boost in HP and help you level up to become a stronger pirate. You can also use different skills such as bullet speed, mobility, and increased damage to help you in your battle.

Can you defeat them and become the king of the pirates? Only the strongest and most skilled pirate can claim victory in this game.

Game Features :
- Open world gameplay with a vast ocean to explore, multiple islands to discover
- Realistic naval combat with physics-based movement
- Special skills ( increasing HP ,critical damage, bullet speed)

Your progress will be count just in time playing, so don't leave the pirates, play play and play!!!

name: Find the Way Out Samurai!
detailed_description:
Find the Way Out Samurai! is an indie-action game where you play as a skilled samurai who has been tasked with taking down the big boss who is causing chaos and destruction throughout the land. To do so, you must navigate through a series of increasingly difficult levels filled with dangerous enemies who will stop at nothing to take you down.

Using your sword and other weapons at your disposal, you must fight your way through hordes of enemies while also avoiding obstacles and traps in your path. Your ultimate goal is to find the exit from each level and move one step closer to confronting the big boss. As you progress through the game, you can collect coins and other rewards that can be used to upgrade your samurai's abilities and unlock new weapons. With each level, the difficulty increases, and you'll need to use all your skills and strategy to succeed and emerge victorious.

Can you make it to the end and defeat the big boss?

Game Features :
- Heroes/weapons shop
- Running for big boss
- 3 lives per level
- Multiple levels

detailed_description:
If you have any questions, welcome to join the player QQ group: 794568148

In the independent adventure game 'Respawn', plays the ghost , embarking on an adventure belonging to the ghost, breaking through numerous obstacles, facing difficulties, and fighting for redemption!

Game background:
The ghost you played
Unable to tolerate the darkness underground
Deciding to leave one's own home
Finding Your Own Future
Launch an adventure exclusively belonging to the ghost
Walking all the way from deep underground to under the sun
Killing and Protection
Everything is up to you!

https://discord.gg/gF5q4TeF

Start the war now and build buildings for your nation!
The goal is to best develop your territory and make the most beautiful kingdom!

Be careful with your buildings because war can break out at any time and everything you've built can disappear if you don't defend yourself!

name: Zombie jokers 2
detailed_description:
Zombie jokers 2 is an arcade game where you have to survive in different locations with zombie ! You can improve the speed of your character, as well as buy him a more powerful gun! Each time, the number of zombies increases. In the game you will have to shoot different zombies.

The game has:
1) Several variations of weapons. (Starting with pistols ending with a machine gun)
2) The ability to equip the player in armor.
3) The ability to pump player's characteristics. (Dexterity, speed, immunity)
4) With each time zombies become more aggressive.
5) Your equipment also affects the speed of your player!
